description.hltext_display: Уилл Смит и Марк Уолберг могут сойтись на ринге
description.content:
Голливудские актеры , чтобы выяснить, кто из них лучше готовился к роли известных боксеров. Только вот тренировались эти ребята в разное время. Смит играл роль Мухаммеда Али в картине 2001 года "Али", а Уолберг изобразил Микки Уорда в фильме 2010 года "Боец".
Тем не менее поединок двух знаменитостей уже стал одной из самых обсуждаемы тем киноманов. Предположительно, он может состояться 26 февраля в Лас-Вегасе.
"Мы не думаем, что оба актера нанесут друг другу серьезные травмы. Мы просто надеемся, что оба они выйдут на ринг, чтобы позабавить себя и зрителей", - подчеркивается в заявлении Голливудской ассоциации бокса, уже не в первый раз организующей звездные спарринги.
За три раунда по одной минуте каждый из актеров может получить миллион долларов. О реакции Смита и Уолберга пока ничего не известно. Как уже отмечалось, у Уолберга будет преимущество в физической подготовке – съемки фильма велись все последнее время. Зато у Смита есть явное превосходство в весе и росте.Рост Уилла Смита - 188 см., тогда как Марка Уолберга - 175 см.

description.hltext_display: Semiconductor Industry Outlook - Industry Outlook
description.content:
The Semiconductor Industry serves as a driver, enabler and indicator of technological progress. Developments in the industry determine the way we work, transport ourselves, communicate, entertain ourselves and respond to our environment. The PCs we work on, the cars we drive, the phones we communicate with, the electronic gadgets on which we watch movies, listen to music and play games on, and the planes and weapons used to transport or protect us use semiconductor devices.
As environmental issues have become more of a concern today, semiconductor devices are being made to reduce power consumption, reduce heat dissipation, capture solar energy, create more efficient lighting solutions, and so forth.
The past decade has seen big changes in the industry, with most players streamlining operations and transferring more routine production to low-cost locations. This led to the development of the Asian market, where most memory production and backend operations have shifted.
2009 Was Better Than Expected
The industry performed much better in 2009 than was originally anticipated. According to the Semiconductor Industry Association (SIA), worldwide sales of semiconductors were $226.3 billion in 2009, significantly better than the $219.7 billion forecasted for the year. This was a 9% decline from 2008.
The SIA estimates that around 52% of revenue came from the Asia/Pacific region (excluding Japan), followed by Japan and the Americas with a 17% share each and the balance from Europe. The sales by geography were similar to 2008, indicating that the recession, which started in late 2008, did not result in any major change in market dynamics.
The SIA attributed the better-than-expected performance to much superior inventory management than in the prior downturn, as manufacturers cut production drastically instead of running the fabs at full capacity to maintain margins. New product launches and strength in the consumer and computing markets toward the end of the year also contributed.
Looking Back at 2010
This year started with a bang, as most companies reported results that were significantly better than the prior year, exceeding the companies’ own expectations and blowing past consensus estimates.
However, most of the excitement started wearing thin by the middle of the year, as order patterns and customer inventories indicated slowing demand. Industry watchers contended that the strength in the first half was more on account of pent-up demand than the beginning of another growth phase.
With the third quarter results, it was apparent that fears of a jobless recovery persisted. As a result, consumer spending failed to pick up in line with normal seasonality and holiday buildups dropped below expectations.
Semiconductor companies are now even more conservative, both in terms of internal inventories and revenue projections. Therefore, while we do not expect significant positive surprises over the next few months, we believe that negative surprises will be limited, if at all.
The Semiconductor Industry Association expects semiconductor sales to increase 32.8% in 2010, 6.0% in 2011 and 3.4% in 2012, or a compounded annual growth rate of 13.4% for the period 2009 to 2012. The significant increase in 2010 is on account of weak sales in 2009, which made comparisons easier.
Computing and Consumer Markets Biggest Drivers
These two end markets together consume around 60% of total semiconductors sold. Therefore, they have the ability to significantly influence total sector performance.
Computing
A number of factors, in combination, are bringing about a complete turnaround in the computing market. Gone are the days when component suppliers were limited by a maturing market, worsened by commoditization and corresponding pricing pressures.
Today, the computing business is being driven by Microsoft Corp’s (MSFT) Windows 7 for one. Even with operating systems, such as Apple Inc’s (AAPL) Macintosh platform gaining popularity, and cloud alternatives such as Google Inc.’s (GOOG) Chrome coming to market, Windows 7 adoption rates have been very high.
Second, Apple’s run of success is a big driver, since the Macintosh OS runs on Apple devices alone, which means more hardware and consequently, more semiconductor devices being sold. Third, with the advent of less sophisticated and ultra mobile devices (netbooks and tablets), the market continues to expand. Fourth, increased computerization in emerging markets, such as China, India, Brazil and Russia are also helping growth.
Perhaps the biggest driver of business is the growth in the data center segment, which has increased focus on servers, storage and networking equipment that consume semiconductors of the high-end variety. The cost advantages of moving to the cloud are encouraging many small and medium-sized businesses, as well as some large organizations to transfer either a part or the whole of their operations to the cloud. We expect this change to be a major driver of growth for the industry.
Consumer Electronics
With ultra-portable computing devices gaining popularity, the distinction between consumer and computing is blurring in some cases. Of course, the consumer electronics market also includes other gadgets such as LCD TVs, Blu-ray players and smartphones.
The problem with this segment being a major driver of revenue is its inherently low margins. Competition is fierce and aggressive pricing is the rule of the day. Since semiconductors made for consumer goods are in the nature of components, there is ever-increasing pressure on their prices that correspondingly squeeze margins.
According to the Consumer Electronics Association (CEA), the 7.8% revenue decline of consumer electronic goods in 2009 was entirely on account of weaker pricing, as unit volumes of consumer goods increased around 10%.
Consumer confidence in the economy touched bottom early in the third quarter of 2010, improving steadily thereafter. However, the recovery is slow and very gradual, resulting in a muted 2010 holiday season. An offsetting factor noticed by the CEA is individual buying habits this holiday season that are increasingly favoring electronic gadgets, with 3 of the top 5 and 4 of the top 10 most-wished-for items being electronic goods.
The CEA has not refreshed full-year expectations and remains optimistic about slight growth in 2010 to $165 billion. The primary driver will be smartphones, which are expected to generate $17 billion in shipment revenue and 52 million in units. Notebooks will be the second largest driver, with shipment revenue of $14 billion and units of 30 million.
Blu-ray player units, which increased 155% in 2009, are expected to grow to more than 7 million units and generate $1.4 billion in shipment revenue. And finally TVs, which grew significantly in 2009, are expected to grow again in 2010 to 37 million units, driven by high definition, FPD and other advanced technologies. However, shipment revenue is expected to decline to $22 billion due to weaker pricing.
Other Markets
Communications infrastructure spending is currently being driven by China and India. The SIA expects infrastructure spending in these geographies to remain the major driver of semiconductor sales. The domestic market will be driven by increasing data volumes. Medical Devices is an upcoming area and some chipmakers have started developing products targeted at this market as well.
Gartner estimates that the automotive semiconductor market will grow 23.5% in 2010 to $19.334 billion, as automotive inventory corrections are no longer troubling sales and growth rates appear to be steady. Infineon technologies, NEC Electronics and Freescale Semiconductor are the major beneficiaries here.
However, we may see some changes in days to come, since nearly a fifth of vehicle production has moved to China and we may expect more to follow. Moreover, semiconductor manufacturers serving this market have a few advantages. The most important is the growing electronic content per vehicle, driven by the need for fuel efficiency, entertainment and automated navigation.
As a result, semiconductors serving this market should grow stronger than the industry over the next few years. The fact that an automobile model has a significantly longer life than a consumer device model is an added bonus, as once a semiconductor has been designed in, it continues to generate revenue for a number of years.
The aerospace and defense markets are considerably dependent on government spending and policy making. The commercial aerospace market (which lags an economic downturn or recovery) may be expected to start looking up, given the increasing passenger and cargo traffic. The outlook for defense spending on the other hand is not as bright.
Moreover, the focus on terrorist activity remains, so spending on intelligence systems and basic weaponry is stronger. A longer-term driver for semiconductor manufacturers is the growing importance of electronic weaponry. So semiconductor manufacturers serving these markets are seeing mixed results, depending on the customers served.
Given the end markets driving the current strength in the industry, we believe that manufacturers of DRAM and flash (particularly NAND and also NOR) will continue to see strong demand. The transition from DDR2 to DDR3 will add to growth in this segment.
Ever Smaller & More Powerful
The demand for greater functionality in smaller and more power efficient gadgets is leading to greater integration within the semiconductor device. This is leading to increased demand for the system-on-a-chip (SoC), which is a single device incorporating a microprocessor, digital signal processor or graphics core, as well as memory and logic.
Within SoCs, both application-specific integrated circuits (ASICs) and application specific standard products are expected to do well. ASICs are usually customized for a single buyer, while ASSPs may have multiple buyers.
Major Players
The major players in the industry may be categorized into chipmakers (OEMs-whether fabless or otherwise), equipment and material suppliers, and foundries.
According to Gartner Dataquest and iSuppli Corp, Intel Corp (INTC), Samsung and Toshiba Corp were the top three semiconductor suppliers in 2009. Texas Instruments (TXN) remained in the fourth position, as the company continued to phase off its wireless baseband business.
STMicroelectronics (STM) was in fifth position, followed by Qualcomm (QCOM), which rose from the eighth position in 2008. Hynix also gained, moving from the ninth position in 2008 to the seventh position in 2009. Japan’s Renesas slipped a couple of places to number eight. Applied Micro Devices (AMD) re-entered the top ten at number nine, followed by Sony (SNE), which slipped a few places to end at number ten.
VLSI Research estimates that semiconductor equipment sales by the top ten suppliers declined 38.2% in 2009, following a 26% decline in 2008. Therefore, the segment has shrunk by over 50% over the past two years. North American suppliers declined 36.9%, Japanese suppliers declined 35.6%, while European suppliers declined 44.5%.
However, despite the difficulties related to the recession and the new trend of equipping fabs with used materials, Applied Materials (AMAT) easily maintained its number one position in 2009. Tokyo Electron Ltd moved from the third to the second position, exchanging places with ASML Holdings N.V. (ASML). Nikon Corporation was at number four, followed by KLA-Tencor (KLAC) and Lam Research Corp (LRCX). The other players in the top ten included Dainippon, ASM International N.V. (ASMI), Novellus Systems, Inc. (NVLS) and Teradyne, Inc. (TER) in that order.
The Foundry segment has undergone a major change in 2009 according to research from IC Insights. Although Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSM) remains the leader by far, followed by Taiwan-based United Microelectronics Corp (UMC) and Singapore-based Chartered Semiconductor Manufacturing (CHRT), the fourth position has gone to U.S.-based GlobalFoundries, which commenced business in March last year. Semiconductor Manufacturing International Corp (SMI) of China was pushed to the fifth position.
OPPORTUNITIES
Manufacturing digital ICs is expensive, as it requires state-of-the-art technology and processes. On the other hand, digital products are cheaper, so cost recovery is more difficult. This has led to specialization in the industry and a greater contribution from Asian manufacturers. However, a significant portion of the intellectual property remains with the domestic companies.
One of the primary beneficiaries of the growth in mobile phones, tablets and the like is ARM Holdings (ARMH), with its power-efficient low-performance chip architecture that dominates the growing mobile phone and tablet markets. Others would be Qualcomm (QCOM), Samsung and Texas Instruments (TXN). As such, we remain upbeat about these companies in 2011.
The ongoing strength in these markets has also spurred growth at foundries which actually performed much better than expected in 2010 and can look forward to a good 2011 as well. As a result, we have turned bullish on the sector, encouraging investors to accumulate shares of Taiwan Semiconductor (TSM), United Microelectronics Corp (UMC) and Semiconductor Manufacturing International (SMI).
We are also increasingly optimistic about Intel and AMD, given their focus on the data center segment. Although we are a wee bit cautious on Intel’s other growth initiatives and are unsure about where it wants to go with the two big acquisitions announced this year, the company’s market position, cash balance, technology lead and management strategy and execution are positives in our opinion.
AMD is also worth watching, as management has been delivering on its promises. Moreover, the company has been rationalizing its debt, increasing focus on R&D and operating a lower-cost model, in short, doing all the right things.
The analog and mixed-signal market is dependent on innovation. Consequently, these products generate higher margins than digital products. They are also more customized and have longer life cycles. These advantages are not lost on U.S. players, so the number of companies entering the market is on the rise.
Our favorites in this area include Texas Instruments, Linear Technology (LLTC), Analog Devices (ADI), Semtech Corp (SMTC), Intersil Corp (ISIL) and Maxim Integrated Products (MXIM). Although some of these companies would no doubt perform better than others, they are, for the most part, highly diversified, high-margin businesses. We believe these companies will generate moderate growth in 2011, representing good defensive plays.
WEAKNESSES
We believe that the good fortune enjoyed by equipment suppliers in 2010 will not continue in 2011. All the companies here had been severely impacted by the recession, as foundries, memory and logic makers decided to cut capex.
Both Gartner and SEMI projected triple-digit growth in semiconductor capex spending this year and most companies are tracking in line with that forecast. However, order patterns across the segment are indicative of a slowdown in 2011, as forecasted by Gartner and SEMI. Consequently, we have now turned a bit cautious about companies like Applied Materials (AMAT), KLA-Tencor Corp (KLAC) and Novellus Systems (NVLS) that were very hot six months ago.
We do not anticipate significant growth in the semiconductor sector in 2011, although we do not really see any great weaknesses either. However, we would caution investors about companies with relatively weak financials, such as Exar Corp (EXAR) and FormFactor (FORM). For instance, FORM continues to burn cash despite strong demand for its specialized probe cards. It also has significant customer and market concentration that increase execution risks.

description.hltext_display: No. 89: UConn tops UCLA, beats Florida St 93-62
description.content:
Connecticut's Caroline Doty, left, Tiffany Hayes, center, and Maya Moore, right, celebrate the team's 93-62 win over Florida State in an NCAA basketball game in Hartford, Conn., Tuesday, Dec. 21, 2010. Connecticut set the NCAA record with 89 consecutive wins. (AP Photo/Jessica Hill) Jessica Hill
Loading…
No. 89 came and went as effortlessly as nearly all their previous games. This season. Last season. And the season before.
UConn women's basketball coach Geno Auriemma, never at a loss for words, was close Tuesday night.
"It's pretty amazing. It really is," he said.
No exaggeration there.
His No. 1-ranked Huskies topped the 88-game winning streak set by John Wooden's UCLA men's team from 1971-74, beating No. 22 Florida State 93-62. Playing with the relentlessness that has become its trademark _ and would have made Wooden proud _ UConn blew past the Seminoles as it has so many other teams in the last 2 1/2 years.
"I don't want my team to compare themselves to anyone," Auriemma said. "I'm not John Wooden and this isn't UCLA. This is Connecticut and that's good enough."
Maya Moore had a career-high 41 points and 10 rebounds and freshman Bria Hartley added 21 points for the Huskies, who have not lost since April 6, 2008, in the NCAA tournament semifinals. Only twice during the record run has a team come within single digits of UConn _ Stanford in the NCAA championship game last season and Baylor in early November.
When the final buzzer sounded, UConn players sprinted across the floor to shake hands with the student section as fans held up "89" signs and "89" balloons bobbed in the stands behind center court. Two other fans raised a banner that read "The Sorcerer of Storrs" _ a play on Wooden's nickname, "The Wizard of Westwood."
After a brief huddle in front of their bench, UConn players re-emerged wearing "89 and Counting" T-shirts. As fans roared, the players bounced around at center court before posing for photos.
It is one more chapter of history for UConn, and perhaps the grandest.
Asked what he would recall from the incredible run, Auriemma mentioned a pair of experienced stars on this team: "I'll probably remember Maya Moore and Tiffany Hayes. And how incredibly difficult it is to play that many games in a row and win 'em all."
Connecticut long ago established itself as the marquee program in the women's game, the benchmark by which all others are measured. The Huskies already own seven national titles and four perfect seasons under Auriemma, and they've produced a galaxy of stars that includes Rebecca Lobo, Diana Taurasi, Jennifer Rizzotti, Sue Bird and Tina Charles.
The streak, though, takes it to another level, certainly raising the profile of women's basketball and maybe all of women's athletics.
Two days after beating No. 11 Ohio State to tie UCLA, UConn toppled the mark in front of a sellout crowd of 16,294 at the XL Center that included Wooden's grandson, Greg, attending his first women's game.
"My grandfather would have been thrilled. He would have been absolutely thrilled to see his streak broken by a women's basketball team," the 47-year-old Wooden said. "He thought, especially in the last 10 years, that the best basketball was played at the collegiate level _ and it wasn't by the men."
John Wooden was 99 when he died on June 4.
There was a festive atmosphere throughout the city, where building lights gleamed blue and white, and it was as electric as any Final Four inside the arena. Charles and UConn men's star Kemba Walker sat behind the Huskies' bench, and football coach Randy Edsall was there, too. Former NFL star Warrick Dunn, meanwhile, was cheering for his alma mater, Florida State.
With the game tied at 6, Moore and UConn (11-0) took command. The senior All-American had seven points during a 15-2 run to give Connecticut its first double-digit lead, and Moore's fadeaway jumper from the baseline extended the advantage to 34-15. Florida State (9-3) made a quick run to cut the lead to 11, but the Huskies weren't about to let anyone spoil this night.
UConn ripped off the next 16 points, capped by consecutive 3-pointers from Hartley and a pull-up by Moore. Auriemma gave Hartley a kiss at the next timeout, and the tough-to-please coach was still grinning at halftime.
"She doesn't feel any of this," Auriemma said as he left the court. "She's kind of immune to all of this as a freshman. I love kids like that."
With a minute left to play and victory assured, Moore stood up and whirled a towel around her head. The All-American tossed it in the air briefly before sitting down for the final seconds, beaming as she and her teammates on the bench yelled encouragement at the players on the floor.
"All you guys from Florida State, it wasn't easy to be part of all of this," Auriemma said. "I hope you don't feel disrespected by all this. You played a heck of a game."
During his postgame news conference, Auriemma took a congratulatory phone call from President Barack Obama.
"Mr. President I really appreciate that. It's an incredible thing that these kids have done and we owe you a little bit of gratitude. That lesson you gave on the White House basketball court really paid off. I appreciate you doing that for them," Auriemma said. "We have not lost since you have been inaugurated and how 'bout we keep that streak going for a couple of more years, huh?"
UConn's rise to prominence began in 1995, when Lobo led the Huskies to their first national championship and unbeaten season. Since then, the best players in the country have made their way to the rural campus in Storrs, 30 miles outside of Hartford.
"This streak is result of the program Geno has been building at UConn for a long time. Great players want to play for him," Taurasi said in an e-mail to The Associated Press. "What UConn has done is important and significant on its own merit. All this talk about comparison to Wooden's UCLA men is just silly. It's not about women vs. men, it's about basketball. Both teams beat their respective competition night in and night out."
The excellence and confidence that defines great teams defines this one because Auriemma won't have it any other way. Perfection is expected, not simply a goal, and Auriemma goes to extraordinary lengths to get it.
He goads his players with criticisms of their games _ sarcastic remarks that may strike outsiders as harsh but somehow trigger just the right response with gusto. He makes them play games of seven-on-five in practice. He rounds up bigger, stronger male students around campus to serve as practice players. He runs endless drills to hone skills the players thought they had mastered in junior high.
It hardly seems to matter who is on the floor because UConn players don't wear names on the back of their uniforms. The only one that counts is the one on the front.
When UConn _ led by Taurasi _ won 70 straight games from 2001-03, a record in the women's game, it seemed unfathomable that it would be toppled, like UCLA's 88. But what fans have learned over the years is that nothing this team does should be surprising.
"I didn't think that it would be possible," Florida State coach Sue Semrau said. "It's still impossible to me that it's happened. But I've watched Geno grow his program and the job that he's done and I'm not surprised its Connecticut."
The Huskies have beaten 16 top-10 teams during the latest streak _ four more than UCLA did during its run _ and five of those wins came against the No. 2 team. It's been more than 17 years since UConn lost consecutive games.
The Huskies have won by any average of more than 33 points during the streak and rarely found themselves in trouble. They have trailed for 134 minutes, including only 13 in the second half. They've won back-to-back national championships, and are now one short of Tennessee's record for overall titles by a women's team.
"It's really something special to watch," Bird said by phone from her home in Seattle. "Both UCLA and UConn's streaks have been something special. Neither team ever took a night off."
Even before UConn tied UCLA's record, the two programs were linked.
Auriemma acknowledges that his team runs the same offense that Wooden perfected 37 years earlier. But it's not just the Xs and Os. The top block of Wooden's pyramid of success reads: "Competitive Greatness: Perform at your best when your best is required. Your best is required every day."
That's been Auriemma's mantra all along.
Greg Wooden, who lives in California, said he came East because, "I kind of thought that somebody should come here from the family and show support."
He also was aware that "certain players have said they're not really supportive of the streak."
But he came knowing "my grandfather would have loved to have been here to see this."
The day Notre Dame broke UCLA's streak, John Wooden was asked how long it would be before somebody surpassed it.
"I have no idea how long it will be before somebody else wins that many. I know it takes at least three years," he replied.
Try 36 years, 11 months, and 2 days.

description.hltext_display: Bischof Hein kommt nach Asterode
description.content:
ode. Eine Ehre erfährt die Kirchengemeinde in Asterode. Am Zweiten Weihnachtstag, 26. Dezember, 10.45 Uhr, wird der Bischof der Landeskirche, Prof. Dr. Martin Hein, zum Gottesdienst nach Asterode kommen.
Er würdigt damit auch das Engagement der Gemeinde und die Wiedereinweihung der Kirche. Hein wird den Gottesdienst gemeinsam mit Pfarrerin Nora Dinges gestalten. Er hält die Predigt und wirkt bei der Feier des Abendmahles mit. Menschen aus anderen Orten sind gerne eingeladen. (red)

description.content: 阿里巴巴集团董事局主席马云最近刚刚为自己46岁的生日送去了一份迟到的大礼：9,000万元现金和足以证明其独到投资眼光的神奇回报率。从2006年开始，马云便陆续投资中国内地最大的民营影视制作公司之一华谊兄弟，现在他决定趁着内地创业板处于高位的机会卖掉部分股份，兑现了约9,000万元。此次出售之前，他一共持有该公司8.23％的股份，按目前该公司约100亿元的市值计算，他这些投资的价值超过8亿元，而他获得这些股份的成本可能还没... ... 原文地址:http://www.techweb.com.cn/people/2010-12-22/727650.shtml

description.hltext_display: Приморской спортсменке присвоено звание заслуженного мастера спорта России
description.content:
Двукратная чемпионка Европы Елена Воинова стала первой спортсменкой в истории легкой атлетики Приморского края, которой присвоено звание "Заслуженный мастер спорта России".
Как рассказали в управлении по физической культуре и спорту Приморского края, это высшее звание для спортсменов нашей страны.
Легкая атлетика в Приморском крае имеет хорошие традиции. Подрастает молодое перспективное поколение, одним из представителей которого является Ильгизар Сафиуллин - неоднократный победитель и призер всероссийских и международных соревнований.
"Достижения наших спортсменов - лучший вклад в пропаганду и популяризацию физической культуры и спорта в крае, - уверен губернатор Приморья Сергей Дарькин. - Своим примером они придают уверенность и новые силы тем спортсменам, которые только начинают карьеру, привлекают все больше приморцев к спорту и здоровому образу жизни".
Сегодня легкой атлетикой в Приморье занимается более 9 тысяч человек. Кроме того, эта спортивная дисциплина вошла в список опорных видов спорта краевой целевой программы "Развитие физической культуры и спорта в Приморском крае на 2011-2015 годы".
Как сообщили корреспонденту REGIONS.RU в пресс-службе краевой администрации, главные направления программы - пропаганда массовой физической культуры, подготовка спортивного резерва и поддержка спорта высших достижений.
Отдельной строкой в программе предусмотрена подготовка приморских спортсменов к участию в Олимпиаде 2012 года в Лондоне и Всемирной Универсиаде 2013 года в Казани.
Всего на реализацию краевой целевой программы "Развитие физической культуры и спорта в Приморском крае на 2011-2015 годы" будет направлено более 16 миллиардов рублей.

description.hltext_display: 子づくり終了宣言は、必要ですか？ - そんな宣言するって、？？？
description.content:
2010年12月22日 10:13
１人目は、自然妊娠だったのですが、２人目不妊です。
治療もしていましたが、１人目出産後、２度の子宮外妊娠を経験してから（気持ち的にも体力的にも、金銭的にもハードだったので）、もう子供はあきらめようか、と思ったりしています。
そこで質問なのですが、義理の両親（うちは姑は、結婚前に亡くなっているので、舅しかいません）や実両親に
「もう子供は、つくりません」
ということを宣言しなければならないのでしょうか？
実母に『子供を作らないのなら、お義父さんに「ひとりっ子でいく」と云っておかないといけない』と云われたので・・・。
子供の数なんて、いわば夫婦間の問題なのに、そんな報告って必要なんでしょうか？みなさんのご意見をお聞かせ下さい。

description.hltext_display: UPDATE: Merafe May Raise Stake In Xstrata Venture, Smelter
description.content:
Merafe Resources Ltd. (MRF.JO) said Wednesday it may raise its minority stake in a chrome joint venture with Xstrata PLC (XTA.LN) and take a greater interest in the Swiss mining company's planned 360,000 metric ton a year ferrochrome smelter in South Africa.
Xstrata in October gave the go ahead to the second phase of its Lion ferrochrome expansion, which will boost the Xstrata-Merafe venture's capacity to more than 2.3 million tons a year. Merafe at the time said it would decide by the end of the year whether to participate in the expansion project, which would mean investing about 1 billion rand ($147 million).
The Johannesburg-based company said it is discussing with Xstrata an option to increase its interest in the Lion II project and the chrome venture to as much as 26% from 20.5% currently.
Lion II had been waiting to proceed for about three years while Xstrata waited for South Africa's state power company to allocate electricity capacity to the project. Xstrata has said the development of the project, including the smelter, will cost about $710 million. Construction is set to begin in the first quarter of 2011.
-By Robb M. Stewart, Dow Jones Newswires; +27 11 783 7848; robb.stewart@dowjones.com

description.hltext_display: Mavericks beat new-look Magic for Florida sweep
description.content:
Dallas Mavericks center Tyson Chandler, left, hangs in the air after dunking the ball in front of Orlando Magic forward Earl Clark during the first half of an NBA basketball game in Orlando, Fla., Tuesday, Dec. 21, 2010.(AP Photo/Phelan M. Ebenhack) Phelan M. Ebenhack
All the uncertainty around Orlando couldn't have worked out better for the Dallas Mavericks.
Not that they've had a problem with anybody lately.
Caron Butler scored 20 points, Dirk Nowitzki had 17 and the streaking Mavericks became the latest team to topple the reconstructed Magic in a 105-99 victory Tuesday night.
"We still know who they had," Nowitzki said of a Magic team that just overhauled its roster. "Dwight (Howard) is their focus. They have a bunch of shooters, Jameer (Nelson) and all those guys."
In other words, still not good enough to beat the NBA's elite.
Nowitzki also passed Celtics great Larry Bird for 25th on the NBA's career scoring list, finishing the night at 21,798 points. Tyson Chandler added 16 points to help the Mavericks pull away in the fourth quarter for their 16th win in 17 games.
A night after snapping Miami's 12-game winning streak, they shot 50 percent from the floor, including 46 percent from 3-point range.
"We feel like we're one of the best teams in the league, if not the best right now," Butler said. "We're playing great basketball, so we want to capitalize on every opportunity."
And Orlando provided a perfect one.
The Magic again looked like a team that hasn't had time to hold a practice since newcomers Gilbert Arenas, Jason Richardson and Hedo Turkoglu were acquired on Saturday. They've lost the first two games since the pair of blockbuster trades and dropped eight of their last nine.
The latest came on another monster night for Howard, who had 26 points and 23 rebounds but got no help from his new teammates. Howard has had at least 20 rebounds in three straight games.
"It can't get any worse," Howard said of his team's slide.
The Magic can only hope not.
Their next two games come against the league's top two teams: San Antonio and Boston.
The struggles were a big reason they orchestrated two trades that brought Arenas from Washington and Turkoglu, Richardson and Earl Clark from Phoenix. They gave up Rashard Lewis, Vince Carter, Mickael Pietrus and Marcin Gortat, plus a 2011 first-round draft pick, in the deals.
The three biggest newcomers have so far been unspectacular. After a loss at Atlanta in their first outing together, their home debuts were equally troubling: Arenas had two points (1 for 6), Turkoglu nine points (2 for 11) and Richardson 10 points (4 for 13).
"None of those guys are shooting the ball very well right now," Magic coach Stan Van Gundy said. "I don't know if it's being in a new situation or putting too much pressure on themselves. All three of them are struggling to shoot the ball."
The problem now is sorting out how this revamped roster is supposed to work.
It wasn't until the Mavericks went ahead by 12 points in the fourth quarter that the Magic _ at least those other than Howard _ showed any consistent fight.
Richardson's 3-pointer with 56 seconds remaining trimmed the deficit to three. Then Jason Terry came back with a mid-range jumper from the wing, and Richardson followed with another from beyond the arc with 24 left to bring Orlando within two.
But the Mavericks would shoot free throws the rest of the way, and Orlando couldn't find any more Magic on this night. While they sort out how their revamped roster is supposed to work, opponents have already exposed their biggest weakness.
Dallas coach Rick Carlisle activated four centers against the suddenly undersized Magic, who are without a true backup center with Gortat gone but are exploring options to receive another inside presence. The big lineup turned out to be a big plus.
The Mavericks went ahead by 12 points in the first quarter behind strong play from Nowitzki. The 7-foot sharpshooter benefited often when he was guarded by Turkoglu, usually a small forward, and other undersized opponents.
Orlando did show some zip with a a 17-2 run between the first and second quarters. The spurt was sparked by Arenas and Clark _ and, surprisingly, with Howard and Jameer Nelson on the bench _ and pushed the Magic ahead 31-29, with Howard leading a chest-bumping bonanza with every player and even Van Gundy during a timeout.
Turned out to be a premature celebration.
NOTES: Howard also had three straight 20-plus rebound games from Dec. 28-31 in 2007. ... Magic PF Malik Allen sat out the game with a sprained left ankle. ... The Mavericks don't play again until Monday at Oklahoma City.

event_or_fact.property: We still know who they had; Dwight (Howard) is their focus. They have a bunch of shooters, Jameer (Nelson) and all those guys.

None of those guys are shooting the ball very well right now; I don't know if it's being in a new situation or putting too much pressure on themselves. All three of them are struggling to shoot the ball.
We feel like we're one of the best teams in the league, if not the best right now; We're playing great basketball, so we want to capitalize on every opportunity.

description.hltext_display: このままでは鬼母 - 子供は味方なのに
description.content:
中学生の娘が二人いる母親です。
夫と別居中、女三人で、私はフルタイムで働き、暮らしています。
三流高等学校も入るのが難しい中３、彼氏に夢中な活発な中１。そして更年期に近づいている私。
毎日イライラしている自分を何とかしたい、でも心がけてもまたモヤモヤ。とにかく母親に成り切れてないんです。
勉強しろとガミガミいったり、習い事の努力が足りないとガミガミいってしまったり。
余裕がありません。
何か秘訣はありますか…家の片付けが苦手でまず整理整頓から気持ちを落ち着けていこうと思います。他にどんなことを心がけたら鬼のような母親から優しいママになれるでしょうか。
ユーザーID：1918834544
お気に入り登録数：0
古いレス順
レス数：1本
タイトル
投稿者
ちょこ
2010年12月22日 14:04
私は昔から生理前にそうなり、気持ち判ります。
まずは漢方等。
病気に近いって言われてますし改善するかも。
苛々を日常的に繰り返されたら子供は歪みます。
そしてあなたを怨みます。
理由なんて関係ないですね。
母親はしっかりするしかない。
それが仕事！
覚悟を決めて。
子供に甘えているんです。
そんな風に八つ当たりしても絶対にこの関係は揺るがないって。
私はそうです。
それって信頼に泥を塗る最低の行為なんです。
自覚してください。
思いとどまる回数が増えます。
気分の良い時にプラスの交流を。
子供＝苛々をぶつける
という今のサイクルをまず変えないと。
100の関わりの内100が苛々では帰りたくない家そのもの。
50/50なら平均？まずそこを目指してはどうですか。
優しいママなんて桃源郷ですよ（笑
素質有るものだけが出来る境地です。
みんな敵にしたら敵になるだけ。
その内子供にすら反発されて行き場がなくなる
自分で自分を追い詰めて最後には周りに恨みをぶつけるしか方法がなくなる。そんな道を辿ってる事を自覚し自戒するしかない。。
子供は世界で一番の味方なのに、敵に回してどうする？

description.hltext_display: パパの帰りが遅い場合、乳幼児のお風呂はどうしてる？ - 午前中
description.content:
新米の５ヶ月の乳幼児がいる母親です。
パパの帰りは、平均夜９時で、現在は帰ってからパパにお風呂に入れてもらっているのですが、子供の寝る時間が遅くなり（夜１１時ごろ）、生活リズムが整わないので、私が夕方でもひとりで早めに入れるようにしようと考えています。
その場合・・・
自分の入浴はいつするのか？など、段取りがいまいちわかりません。
寝かしつけてから急いで入浴するのも考えていますが、お風呂は和室の寝室の隣にあり、シャワーの音もよく聞こえます。
うちの子は、少しの音でもすぐに起きてしまう神経質なタイプなので、すぐに泣いて起きます。
パパの帰りが遅いご家庭のママさんは、乳幼児の入浴等どうしてますか？
入浴方法や、時間スケジュールなど、教えてくださると参考にしたいです。
ユーザーID：7968361527
お気に入り登録数：41
古いレス順
レス数：55本
1 2 3 すべて
タイトル
投稿者
みさえ
2010年12月21日 10:44
赤ちゃんと一緒にお風呂に入り、その後赤ちゃんを拭いて服を着せたら、脱衣所に置いたクーハンに寝かせ、ドアを開け放して私がお風呂に入ります。
少し大きくなったら、お風呂上がりに小さめのベビーサークルに入れて、やはりお風呂場のドアは開け放して私が入ります。
身体を洗っている間は赤ちゃんと目を合わせて話しかけます。
髪を洗うときは、目は合わせられないけれど、話しかけてます。
両方合わせて10分くらいでささっと済ませるようにしてます。
最初は泣いたけれど、慣れてきたらそういうものだと思っているようで、問題なく過ごしています。
平日は私がゆっくり入ることができないので、パパが休みの日にゆっくり入ることにしています。
ユーザーID：5579983157
カナタ
2010年12月21日 10:48
わが家のパパは消防士で、仕事は朝出勤の翌朝退社です。２４時間勤務で、息子２人と私の３人きりです。
わが家では、先月生まれた次男坊は、脱衣所にすっぽんぽんでタオルに包み、ハロゲンヒーターをたいて室内をあたたかく保ってる間に自分と長男が体を洗います。
洗い終えたら、次男坊を洗い、浴槽に３人で浸かります。
そして、次男坊をタオルにまた包み、自分はぱぱっと着替え、次男坊の着替え→長男の着替えで、次男坊におっぱいです。
大変ですが、自分で欲しくて２人産んだわけだし、育児にはとてもやり甲斐があり毎日楽しいです☆
パパいなくて淋しいですがね…笑
お互い頑張りましょうね！
ユーザーID：8696729469
レイチェル
2010年12月21日 11:00
現役で働いている実母と二世帯同居していますが、帰りが遅い日が多いので私が1人でいれている事もあります。
暖かい日なら上の子が幼稚園の間に入れて、寝ている間に上の子とお風呂に入りますが、現在は下の子が寝ている間に上の子と入り、その後下の子も入れています。
うちは隣がリビングで、ハイハイするのでそこで寝かせていますが、大丈夫です。 うちも眠りが浅いのですぐ起きるタイプですけどね。
どうしてもすぐ起きちゃって無理なら最初に一緒に入ってしまって、旦那さんが帰ってきてから自分が入るとか、バスチェアーを購入して座らせておいて一緒に入るとか、スイマーバという商品もありますよ。

description.hltext_display: Gesetzliche Konsequenzen nach Schneechaos gesucht
description.content:
Berlin/Frankfurt/Main (dpa) - Das Schneechaos auf vielen Straßen lässt die Rufe nach politischen Konsequenzen lauter werden. Die Deutsche Polizeigewerkschaft (DPolG) forderte ein winterliches Tempolimit für Lastwagen.
Hessens Verkehrsministers Dieter Posch (FDP) plädierte zudem für eine Nachbesserung bei der Winterreifenpflicht für Autos. «Ein M+S-Reifen mit 1,6 Millimeter Profil reicht halt nicht aus», sagte Posch der Nachrichtenagentur dpa.
Spätestens zum nächsten Winter müsse klar definiert werden, was ein Winterreifen im Sinne der Straßenverkehrsordnung ist, mahnte Posch in Frankfurt. Die Kennzeichnung «M+S» sei nicht geschützt und sage nichts über die Wintertauglichkeit der Reifen aus. Weitere Symbole wie die Schneeflocke oder das Bergpiktogramm müssten künftig einheitlich verwendet werden. Darüber hinaus seien auch die Mindestprofiltiefe und die Laufflächenmischung festzuschreiben.
Die Polizeigewerkschaft machte sich dafür stark, dass Lkw bei Schnee und Eis auf allen Straßen höchstens 50 Stundenkilometer fahren dürfen. Außerdem müsse in den Wintermonaten ein generelles Überholverbot für Laster gelten, sagte DPolG-Chef Rainer Wendt in der «Neuen Osnabrücker Zeitung». «Nur so lässt sich bei extremen Wetterverhältnissen verhindern, dass Menschen im Verkehr massenhaft zu Schaden kommen.»
In den vergangenen Tagen war bereits über eine Schneekettenpflicht für Lkw und eine verschärfte Winterreifenpflicht debattiert worden. Der Deutsche Speditions- und Logistikverband (DSLV) sieht hingegen die Räumdienste stärker in der Pflicht und beklagt einen vielerorts nicht ausreichenden Winterdienst.
Während der Städte- und Gemeindebund dafür kürzlich die klammen Kassen der Kommunen verantwortlich gemacht hatte, lässt man dieses Argument beim Deutschen Landkreistag nicht gelten. «Wir sind für die Sicherheit auf den Straßen verantwortlich», betonte Hans-Günter Henneke, Hauptgeschäftsführer beim Landkreistag. Die Aufgabe, für freie Straßen zu sorgen, ist seiner Ansicht nach auch lösbar: «Wir haben keine Katastrophe, wir haben Winter.»

description.hltext_display: Pensionärerna är förbannade!
description.content:
Inkomstpensionen sänks nästa år med 4,3 procent. Samtidigt sänks skatten för pensionärerna, vilket medför att de flesta ändå kommer ut på plussidan. Det visar beräkningar från Pensionsmyndigheten. Pensionärerna själva och pensionärsförbundet SPF är dock inte imponerade. Mellerud 10 260
Vänersborg 11 143
Trollhättan 11 004
Lilla Edet 10 994
I år var det första gången som pensionssystemets skulder översteg tillgångarna. Då trädde den så kallade bromsen, eller balanseringen, i pensionssystemet i kraft.
Den säkerställer att de pensionsavgifter som betalas in av alla i arbetslivet räcker till de pensioner som betalas ut.
Därför sänktes pensionerna 2010. Även för nästa år blir det en sänkning. Denna gång med 4,3 procent.
– Men det blir ingen större skillnad även om vi har balanseringen, hävdar Kristina Kamp på Pensionsmyndigheten.
– Det beror på att regeringen har utlovat en skattesänkning som balanserar upp detta.
För en ålderspensionär med 12 000 kronor per månad i inkomstpension betyder det en sänkning med 512 kronor i månaden. Men med skattesänkningen, som omfattar pensionärer som är 65 år eller äldre, ger det cirka 515 kronor mer i månaden eller 3,9 procent.
– Så de flesta behöver inte bli oroliga, säger Kristina Kamp.
– För dem med den lägsta pensionen innebär det här dessutom en inkomstförstärkning, påpekar hon.
Detta då garantipensionen höjs med 0,9 procent för dem som enbart har garantipension. Garantipensionen höjs också av att inkomst- och tilläggspensionen sänks.
Sämst blir det för den grupp pensionärer som har en pension på mer än 18 000 kronor i månaden.
– De kan få ett minus i plånboken, men det är inget stort minus. Det blir också mindre i plånboken för dem som tar ut pension innan de fyllt 65 år, för de får inte skattesänkningen, säger Kristina Kamp.
Ekonomin går inte ihop
Pensionärerna är dock inte imponerade.
– Jag är förbannad. Vi får ju ingen höjning. De har tagit allting, säger Kent Ek från Trollhättan.
– Blir det ingen höjning får de sänka priserna ute i handeln, tycker Gun Rasmusson.
– Det går knappt runt som det är, påpekar Lohla Ek.
Inte heller på pensionärsförbundet SPF är man nöjda.
– Det är oroväckande att pensionerna inte följer den normala utvecklingen, säger Bengt Englund, distriktsordförande i SPF Älvsborgs norra distriktet.
– Vi stödjer vår förbundsordförandes påpekande att pensionssystemet är felaktigt uppbyggt. Vi måste försöka få till en förändring av systemet. Vi var väldigt omnämnda i valsammanhang, men att gå från det till pengar i portmonnän är ett stort steg.

description.hltext_display: Moore the difference on UConn's historic night
description.content:
Connecticut forward Maya Moore (23) and fans celebrate in the closing moments of an NCAA college basketball game in Hartford, Conn., Tuesday, Dec. 21, 2010. Connecticut won 93-62 to to set an NCAA record with 89 consecutive wins. (AP Photo/Bill Sikes) Bill Sikes
Loading…
With a minute left, Maya Moore stood up on the bench and whirled a towel above her head, the grin on her face so bright it could light up all of Connecticut.
Just when it seems there's nothing more she can do, the senior All-American finds a way to dazzle anew. In a game for the ages, Moore put on a performance that was more than equal to the occasion.
"Every night when you need her to be at her best, she's at her best," UConn coach Geno Auriemma said.
And because of that, top-ranked UConn has surpassed the 88-game winning streak set by John Wooden's UCLA men's team from 1971-74. Moore had a career-high 41 points and 10 rebounds Tuesday night, setting the tone as Connecticut blew by No. 22 Florida State 93-62 for win No. 89 in a row.
"You take those 41 away and it's a little better ballgame," Seminoles coach Sue Semrau said. "She's as tough as nails."
Moore has been the constant in these 89 games, a streak that has spanned 2 1/2 seasons and two national titles. Like Diana Taurasi, Rebecca Lobo, Sue Bird and all the other UConn greats who came before her, she is as driven as she is gifted. She takes over games when she needs to, finds ways to make her teammates better and never, ever stops working.
Just as UCLA had Bill Walton, UConn has Maya Moore.
"They are really a special, special team and with a leader like Maya Moore, they can do special things," Semrau said.
Florida State managed to stay close for the first 2 minutes, and that was long enough for Moore. With the game tied at 6, she scored seven points during a 15-2 run to gave Connecticut its first double-digit lead, and extended the lead to 34-15 with a fadeaway jumper from the baseline.
Florida State (9-3) made a quick run to cut the lead to 11, but Moore and the Huskies weren't about to let anyone spoil this night.
UConn ripped off the next 16 points, capped by consecutive 3-pointers from freshman Bria Hartley and a pull-up by Moore.
At halftime, it was Florida State 27, Moore 26.
But even with the game in hand, Moore kept pushing. She hustled for rebounds, dove for loose balls and barked at her younger teammates when they missed their assignments on defense. Part of the reason UConn has been so spectacular for so long is the older players are as hard on the newcomers as Auriemma is, demanding they live up to the program's tradition. Moore is no different.
Her influence can already be seen on Hartley, who scored 21 points and shot 5 of 6 from 3-point range.
"We value the intangibles," Moore said. "To come to practice, to work as hard as we do, to focus as much as we do, to be aware, to pay attention, to put that much emotional energy and effort into everything we do on the court, it's remarkable."
Only after scoring on a layup with 2:14 left to top the 40 points she scored against Syracuse on Jan. 17, 2009, did Moore begin to let loose. She pumped her first as the ball dropped through the net and, after Auriemma took her out about 30 seconds later, slapped hands and exchanged hugs with her coaches and teammates on the bench.
She finished with three assists, three blocks and a steal.
"It's kind of cool that this game happened not even in the middle of our season," Moore said. "Now we have this high, but we can still play. So I love it. I'm ready to play the next game, actually."
As the final seconds ticked down, Moore drummed her hands on her thighs and yelled encouragement to her teammates still on the floor. Perched on her seat like a coiled spring, she slumped back when a timeout was called, delaying the celebration.
Finally, when the buzzer sounded, she jumped to her feet and sprinted onto the court. She and her teammates ran to the student section to exchange high-fives, then returned to the bench to don brand-new "89 and Counting" T-shirts.
As Auriemma did his usual postgame prize giveaway for the students _ befitting such a big night, Tuesday's gift was a Wii _ Moore and her teammates mugged for the cameras at center court. And when Auriemma showered praise on Moore and Tiffany Hayes, UConn's other veteran star, the two players hugged while their teammates patted them on the head.
"Maya, during all these 89 games, has been at her absolute best when it was absolutely needed," Auriemma said. "I'll always remember that and I'll always admire her for that. Because that's not easy to do."

event_or_fact.property: Maya, during all these 89 games, has been at her absolute best when it was absolutely needed; I'll always remember that and I'll always admire her for that. Because that's not easy to do.
It's kind of cool that this game happened not even in the middle of our season; Now we have this high, but we can still play. So I love it. I'm ready to play the next game, actually.
You take those 41 away and it's a little better ballgame; She's as tough as nails.
Every night when you need her to be at her best, she's at her best

We value the intangibles; To come to practice, to work as hard as we do, to focus as much as we do, to be aware, to pay attention, to put that much emotional energy and effort into everything we do on the court, it's remarkable.
They are really a special, special team and with a leader like Maya Moore, they can do special things

description.hltext_display: 働く母。三人目はどうする？ - 職場には迷惑だと思います
description.content:
勤続15年余、二児の母で、二人目の育休中です。育休は規定で1年半です。
三十路過ぎて結婚し、漠然と子供は三人くらい欲しいな、と考えていました。しかし部署異動で妊娠を控えたり、解禁後もなかなか授からなかったりで、二児を生んだらアラフォーになっていました。二人授かっただけでもありがたいと思います。しかし年齢にリミットがあるだけに「今諦めてしまって、それでいいのか？」と悩んでいます。
なぜ諦めかけているかと言えば、体力的な心配もありますが、何といっても職場との兼ね合いです。今の年齢で次の子を考えるなら年子も視野に入れた方がいいと思います。しかし、続けて産・育休を取るにしても、復帰後まもなく産休に入るにしても職場には大迷惑…でももう数年空けるには私の歳が…。
WMが多く、出産はめでたき事という会社ではありますが。同僚の男性社員が私の二回目の産・育休(一度目から三年)が不満で、色々されて疲れた経緯もあります。穴を空けてるのは事実だから黙って耐えましたが。
退職は考えていません。やはり仕事も子供も…は贅沢な悩みでどちらかを取るしかないのでしょうか？同じ悩みを持った事がある方、いませんか？
ユーザーID：6535492060
お気に入り登録数：48
古いレス順
レス数：42本
1 2 3 すべて トピ主のみ(3)
タイトル

ジャスミン

３人目を産みたいのなら、二人目の育休をとらず
産休明けで復帰すればよいのではないのでしょうか？
３人目を妊娠したら臨月まで働き、産後も育休は取らず
産休のみで復帰すれば、職場には３カ月位の休みですみますが。
仕事はしたい、子供も欲しい、でも職場にはなるべく迷惑をかけたくない
となると育休を我慢するしかないんじゃない？
産休明けで復帰し、頑張っているお母さんも沢山いますよ。

子供さんの体調悪くなったりの欠勤 行事を盾に休みの要求も一人っ子の三倍なんですよね
気を遣って でも休む理由も子供と言われたら 正直何も言えないし 同僚の立場なら 二人で勘弁してよ
と 思います
飲み会にも 預け先無いからと連れて来られても嫌ですし
こんだけ不況で正社員の職が無く 育休ダラダラ取る人が権利だけ主張している人が多いからだと思わずにいられません
三人目育休とれる職種は 教員位しか思いつかない
教員は必ず変わりの補充が入るけど 同じ公務員でも 職種によっては残されたメンバーで育休中の人の仕事を割り振り 民間も今の不況なら補充しないかのうせいも有り得ます
私が経営者なら 義務（仕事）を果たさず 権利（育休子供の用事の有休）ばかり主張する人は雇いたくないし 周りのやる気も損ないそう
三人目や四人を目指す人は 是非退職し 大切な子供と楽しく過ごし 待機児童の多い保育園は是非辞めて頂きたい
ユーザーID：6218366746
まり
2010年12月17日 18:30
私もＷＭです。
一人目の時、１年弱の育休をいただいたので、同じ期間は妊娠せずに働らこうと思いました。
結果的には倍の約２年、身軽な状態で働いてから妊娠。
現在二度目の育休中です。
主さんの気持ち、わかりますし、応援もしたいのですが…正直に言うと迷惑です。
会社は、主さんが１年半後には帰ってくると信じて、業務を回しているはず。
なのに、復帰してすぐに妊娠って…迷惑もいいとこでしょ。
会社は｢これだからＷＭは…｣と思うでしょうね。
同じＷＭとしても、こう思われるのは大変迷惑です。
私だったら、とにかく1日でも早く復帰し、ある程度働いてから、子作りを再開します。
年がきになるなら、すぐに病院に相談に行きます。
これが嫌なら、二度目の休みをとらず、退職すべきでしたね。
大変辛口になりますが、計画性がなさすぎです。とにかく、こんなところでウダウダ言っている暇、ないです。
規定で１年半、育休がとれるようですが、無理して全部消化する必要ありません。
今すぐ保育所、託児所をさがし、年明けにでも復帰しましょう。
すべてはそこからでしょ。
ユーザーID：5116428242
まんまん
2010年12月17日 18:52
私の場合子供が３月産まれの為、２学年差にしたいので年子計画中です
育休延長は前例がないらしいのですが、家族計画も大事ですよね！
もちろん周りには迷惑がかかると思いますが、今までほとんど休まず７年近く夜勤もある交替制をやってたし、これくらい良いじゃん！って思っちゃいます
私も３人欲しいです！
お互い頑張りましょー！！！
ユーザーID：5650950878
気持ちはわかるけど
2010年12月17日 22:16
私自身がWMの母の元、3人兄弟で育ち。。。あまりいい経験だったとも思えないことが多かったので、生後すぐ保育園に入ること前提で産むというのも母として無責任じゃないかと正直感じます。基本的には子供がある低度の年齢になるまでは、親が手を掛けるべきだと思うからです。
育休を削るアイデアには賛同いたしかねます。それは大人にあまりに都合が良すぎる為です。会社に迷惑を掛けたくない理由はご自身の会社での立場を考えるからであり、赤ちゃんに負担を掛ける事前提で産むことは感心できません。
子供が3人いるWMも沢山いますよね。でも、やはり余裕がなかったり、子供に無理をさせることがわかっていて妊娠を望むのは大人の勝手というか、無計画だと思います。また、3人産むことによって2番目の子供さんの心理的な負担のケアも年齢によっては必要になるので、育児は質とは言えど。。最低限の時間を取れるかも疑問です。
よって、全てを手に入れようとするのは無理じゃないかと。
とは言え、1人育てるにも心配や不安が尽きないご時勢に3人産みたいと思われてる気持ち、なぜかわかりませんが嬉しく思いました。

description.hltext_display: Hartz-IV-Kompromiss: Gespräche auf Januar vertagt
description.content:
Berlin (dpa) - In diesem Jahr wird es keinen Hartz-IV-Kompromiss mehr geben. Die dazu eingesetzte Bund-Länder-Arbeitsgruppe kommt das nächste Mal erst wieder am 7. Januar zusammen.
Das teilte Bundesarbeitsministerin Ursula von der Leyen (CDU) heute in Berlin nach der zweiten Gesprächsrunde mit. Es seien «harte, aber konstruktive Verhandlungen» gewesen. Nach ihrem Eindruck sei «allen Seiten an einer konstruktiven Lösung gelegen». Die offenen Fragen sollen nach ihren Worten nun «über die Feiertage aufgearbeitet werden».
Dazu erteilte das Gremium Prüf- und Berechnungsaufträge zu zehn Einzelfragen. Als Themenschwerpunkte nannte von der Leyen die Berechnung der Hartz-IV-Regelsätze, das Bildungspaket für bedürftige Kinder und die Hinzuverdienstgrenzen für Langzeitarbeitslose «gekoppelt mit der Frage des Mindestlohnes». Es geht dabei im wesentlichen um das Lohnabstandsgebot und die Frage, in welchem Zusammenhang Sozialleistungen und Niedrigeinkommen stehen.
Die Kompromisssuche ist notwendig, weil das Hartz-IV-Paket am vergangenen Freitag im Bundesrat durchfiel. Damit liegt die von der schwarz-gelben Koalition zum 1. Januar geplante Erhöhung des Hartz- IV-Regelsatzes für Erwachsene um 5 auf 364 Euro ebenso auf Eis wie das Bildungspaket mit Musikschulunterricht, Nachhilfestunden und Schulmittagessen. SPD und Grüne verlangen deutliche Nachbesserungen.
Für die Verhandlungsführerin der SPD, Mecklenburg-Vorpommerns Sozialministerin Manuela Schwesig, wird eine Einigung davon abhängen, «wie weit uns die Gegenseite entgegenkommt». Sie gehe davon aus, dass es «noch zu sehr schwierigen und harten Verhandlungen» kommen werde. Die SPD dringt wie die Grünen auf bessere Bildungschancen für Kinder, auf höhere Regelsätze und einen allgemeinen Mindestlohn: «Alle drei Punkte stehen für uns auf einer Augenhöhe», sagte Schwesig.
Für die Grünen zeigte sich Fraktionsvize Fritz Kuhn zur nächsten Runde am 7./8. Januar «hoffnungsfroh». Wenn es keinen Durchbruch gebe, werde man doch wenigstens «einen guten Schritt weiter kommen». Es brauche aber «substanzielle Änderungen» bei den drei Schwerpunktthemen. Mit dem bundesweiten Mindestlohn von 8,50 Euro will die Opposition Geld in Milliardenhöhe für Bildungsaufgaben frei machen, das bislang zur Aufstockung von Niedriglöhnen dient.
Der Linke-Vorsitzende Klaus Ernst kritisierte die Verhandlungen als «Farce» und als «Kungelei auf dem Rücken der Betroffenen». Da verhandelten «Hartz-IV-Parteien mit Hartz-IV-Parteien.» Am Verhandlungstisch fehlten Gewerkschaften, Sozialverbände und Arbeitsloseninitiativen.
Ulrich Schneider, Hauptgeschäftsführer des Paritätischen Wohlfahrtsverbands, kritisierte, das schwarz-gelbe Bildungspaket sei «ein statistischer Schrotthaufen». Vieles sei immer noch beliebig gesetzt, ohne valide Zahlen, «beispielsweise die acht Euro pro Monat für Schulmaterial im Schulbasispaket», sagte er dem «Hamburger Abendblatt».

description.hltext_display: Stonehenge ready to mark solstice
description.content:
Hundreds of people are expected at Stonehenge to see the sun rise on the winter solstice.
The solstice annually attracts an eclectic mix - Druids, hippies, sun worshippers and those who are curious to experience the ancient festival.
Members of the public will also visit the site, near Salisbury Plain, Wiltshire, hoping to see the sun rise through the ancient stones.
The shortest day of the year often falls on December 21, but this year the druid and pagan community will mark the first day of winter today because the modern calendar of 365 days a year - with an extra day every four years - does not correspond exactly to the solar year of 365.2422 days.
Peter Carson of English Heritage said: "We are delighted to offer people a warm welcome to Stonehenge this Winter Solstice.
"Over the years, the event has grown from a handful of people to a celebration enjoyed by a couple of thousand of people.
"We work very closely with the Druid and Pagan community to ensure that the event is a success."
The word solstice comes from the Latin phrase for "sun stands still". During the winter solstice the sun is closer to the horizon than at any other time during the year, meaning shorter days and longer nights.
The day after the winter solstice marks the beginning of lengthening days leading up to the summer solstice in June.

event_or_fact.property: We work very closely with the Druid and Pagan community to ensure that the event is a success.
We are delighted to offer people a warm welcome to Stonehenge this Winter Solstice.

description.hltext_display: جامعہ کراچی میں بدامنی
description.content: ملک کی اہم ترین اور موقر درس گاہ جامعہ کراچی ایک عرصہ سے بدامنی کا شکار ہے۔ رینجرز کی مسلسل موجودگی اور خود جامعہ کے حفاظتی نظام کے باوجود پرتشدد کارروائیاں ہوتی رہتی ہیں جن پر جامعہ کی انتظامیہ کی طرف سے کوئی سخت اور فیصلہ کن قدم نہ اٹھانے کی و جہ سے حالات بدتر ہوتے جارہے ہیں۔ گزشتہ پیر کو ایک لسانی تنظیم کے طلبہ ونگ نے زبردستی اپنی تنظیم سے وابستہ کارکن نوید صدیقی کو جامعہ کراچی کا سیکورٹی انچارج بنوادیا جس پر اقدام قتل سمیت کئی مقدمات درج ہیں۔ ایسا شخص صرف اپنے وابستگان اور کارکنوں ہی کو سیکورٹی فراہم کرے گا اور کسی بھی کشیدگی کی صورت میں دوسروں کو نقصان پہنچانے سے گریز نہیں کرے گا۔ اس پر اسلامی جمعیت طلبہ نے بجا طور پر احتجاج کیا ہے اور لسانی بنیادوں پر اس تقرر کی مذمت کی ہے۔ جامعہ کراچی کی انتظامیہ نے حالات پر قابو پانے کے بجائے پیر کی شب جامعہ کو دو دن بند رکھنے کا اعلان کیا تاہم گورنر سندھ کی ہدایت پر رات گئے فیصلہ تبدیل کردیا جس کی اطلاع سب کو نہیں ہوسکی ہوگی۔ جامعہ کے کھلے رہنے کے اعلان کے ساتھ ہی یہ خبر بھی تھی کہ تدریسی سرگرمیاں اور امتحانات ملتوی رہیں گے۔ اسلامی جمعیت طلبہ جامعہ کراچی کے ترجمان کا کہنا ہے کہ جامعہ میں امن و امان کی صورتحال اور پے درپے جرائم اس بات کے متقاضی ہیں کہ سیکورٹی کے حوالے سے سنجیدہ فیصلے کیے جائیں۔ انتظامیہ کی طرف سے سیاسی دباﺅ پر غیر معقول فیصلے خود جامعہ کے امن و امان کے لیے خطرہ ہیں۔ نوید صدیقی کو جس طرح سیکورٹی انچارج بنایا گیا ہے وہ خود مجرمانہ فعل ہے۔ اطلاعات کے مطابق گزشتہ پیر کو متحدہ کی طلبہ تنظیم اے پی ایم ایس او نے جامعہ کراچی میں دفاتر میں توڑ پھوڑ کی، عملہ کو یرغمال بنالیا اور سیکورٹی سپروائزر اور ڈپٹی رجسٹرار جنرل کے تبادلے کے احکامات زبردستی جاری کروادیے۔ اے پی ایم ایس او نے رات 9 بجے تک ایڈمنسٹریشن کے ملازمین کو یرغمال بنائے رکھا۔ اس دوران پرووائس چانسلر ڈاکٹر شاہانہ عروج سے نوید صدیقی کو سیکورٹی سپروائزر بنانے کے احکامات جاری کروالیے۔ اسی طرح ڈپٹی رجسٹرار کو بھی تبدیل کروادیا۔ اس ساری ہنگامہ آرائی میں رینجرز بھی لاتعلق رہی اور جامعہ کی سیکورٹی نے بھی مداخلت نہیں کی۔ انتظامیہ نے صرف اتنا کیا کہ جامعہ دو دن بند رکھنے کا اعلان کردیا۔ لیکن طلبہ تنظیمیں طاقت کے زور پر اسی طرح من مانی کرتی رہیں تو درس و تدریس کیا خاک ہوگی۔ اہم سوال یہ ہے کہ اے پی ایم ایس او نے عملہ کو یرغمال بنا کر زبردستی جو فیصلے کروائے کیا وہ برقرار رہیں گے اور اگر نہیں تو کیا ایک بار پھر ہنگامہ ہوگا۔

description.hltext_display: Mluvčím agentury CzechTourism Klicpera
description.content:
mluvčí, agentura, CzechTourism, Pavel Klicpera
Státní agentura pro podporu cestovního ruchu CzechTourism mění mluvčího. Nově bude za agenturu hovořit dosavadní vedoucí marketingových projektů Pavel Klicpera (49), končící tiskový mluvčí Filip Remenec se přesune na pozici vedoucího PR oddělení. Informoval o tom Remenec s tím, že změna souvisí se zavedením nové struktury organizace.
"Nová organizační struktura zahrnuje čtyři odbory: Strategie a marketingová komunikace, Informační podpora oboru cestovního ruchu, Výzkum, trendy a inovace, Ekonomika a interní služby," uvedl Remenec. Na pozici ředitele odboru strategie přichází do CzechTourismu dosavadní šéf společnosti České Švýcarsko Marek Mráz (36).
"K novým klíčovým marketingovým projektům agentury CzechTourism budou patřit mimo jiné projekty financované z evropských fondů," řekl Remenec. Jmenoval například kampaň na podporu domácího cestovního ruchu a marketingové aktivity na podporu zavedení značky Národního systému kvality služeb.
Česká centrála cestovního ruchu - CzechTourism je příspěvková organizace, která spadá pod ministerstvo pro místní rozvoj. Mezi její činnosti patří například účast na veletrzích nebo pořádání kampaní v tuzemských a zahraničních médiích.

description.hltext_display: 生物柴油成为“正规军”尚需时日
description.content:
生物柴油进入主流市场应该是一个系统工程。尽管B5标准明确了生物柴油的合法身份，但它作为一种机动车的燃料真正进入全国成品油流通市场尚需时日。
日前，国家质检总局和国家标准委出台了生物柴油B5标准，并将其纳入成品油零售网络。该标准将于2011年2月1日正式实施。这说明国家对生物柴油发展有明确的支持态度，该产业具有了进一步发展的政策背景。
最近几年，为应对传统能源紧缺，生物柴油在全球范围内发展迅猛。以美国、欧盟和巴西等为代表的国家和地区采取政策措施，积极推进生物柴油的产业化进程，但最关键的还是原料问题。生物柴油产业要发展，除了要发展先进的生产技术外，寻找能够支持可持续发展的原料至关重要，同时也必须关注生物柴油的增长有可能会影响全球食品供应与农业生产的长期可持续性发展问题。
生物柴油产业属于新兴产业，对于国家整体能源产业发展具有正面意义。大力发展生物柴油对经济社会可持续发展，优化能源结构，减轻环境压力等方面都具有重要的战略意义，符合国家整体能源发展战略和政策。但与其他传统化石能源一样，生物能源发展最致命的问题仍然是资源有限。没有足够的原料资源，任何一种产业都将是无本之木，长期可持续发展都将难以维系。因此，生物柴油产业的发展不仅要考虑技术成熟度有多高，关键是要看一个国家是否拥有足够的原料基础。
过去几年，我国生物柴油的原料基本是以地沟油为主，但地沟油的资源十分有限，而且几乎没有正规回收企业，回收成本很高，而且一些不法商人将地沟油提炼后再次重新回到餐桌上，因此单纯依靠地沟油作为原料来支称一个产业是绝对不现实的。其实，生物柴油的原料资源还有其他选择，例如大豆和油菜籽等油料作物、油棕和黄连木等油料林木果实、工程微藻等油料水生植物以及动物油脂等都可以成为生物柴油的原料。但总体上看，由于人口众多，自然资源匮乏，我国发展生物柴油的资源条件十分有限，大规模发展该产业不具备现实基础和长远条件，因此该产业只能是一种对传统化石燃料不足的有限补充，试图大规模替代传统化石燃料不具可能性。
在我国，尽管过去几年存在着生物柴油投资冲动和热情，但生物柴油市场十分不规范，市场规模小而分散，基本上处于小打小闹的局面。许多小型民营企业被“绿色能源”概念吸引，纷纷进入该领域，生物柴油行业由此进入活跃发展期，但也给产业发展埋下了无序、盲目的“伏笔”。
在国家政策层面上，为调整能源结构和弥补能源短缺，预计对生物柴油产业发展会保持一定程度的鼓励和扶持态度，但也会本着规模、有序、健康发展的原则，谨慎推进生物柴油产业化进程。
国家正式颁布生物柴油B5标准并加以实施，为我国生物柴油进入成品油市场创造了基本条件，使得将生物柴油添加到石化柴油中销售和使用成为有法可依，使其可能成为继乙醇汽油推广应用以后的又一进入主流市场的非传统燃料。但是正如乙醇汽油没有足够的生命力一样，我们也千万不要过度指望生物柴油会在未来机动车燃料市场中发挥令人鼓舞的作用。
尽管B5标准明确了生物柴油的合法身份，中海油在海南省的生物柴油也开始在岛内部分加油站封闭试点运行，但生物柴油作为一种机动车的燃料要真正进入全国成品油流通市场还需要一个过程。
生物柴油进入主流市场应该是一个系统工程。它不仅包括生物柴油必须具备质量标准，还包括不同混比产品标准、原料储存标准、生物柴油加工设备的规范等一系列完备标准体系。另外，在成品油市场管理方面，生物柴油进入主流市场还需要国家商务主管部门完善市场管理办法，制定相应的生物柴油市场准入条件，绝对不能让市场放任自流，只能允许那些符合国家产业政策的生物柴油生产企业和产品进入成品油批发、仓储和零售市场。

description.hltext_display: Prenatal iron-folic acid supplementation increases intellectual, motor function in children
description.author: Editors
description.content: In developing countries where iron deficiency is prevalent, prenatal iron-folic acid supplementation increased offspring intellectual and motor functioning during school age, according to researchers from the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health. They examined the intellectual and motor functioning of children whose mothers received micronutrient supplementation during pregnancy and found that aspects of intellectual functioning including working memory, inhibitory control, and fine motor functioning were positively associated with prenatal iron and folic acid supplementation. The results are published in the December 22/29 issue of the Journal of the American Medical Association. "Iron is essential for the development of the central nervous system," said Parul Christian, DrPH, MSc, lead author of the study and an associate professor with the Bloomberg School's Department of International Health. "Early iron deficiency can alter neuroanatomy, biochemistry, and metabolism, leading to changes in neurophysiologic processes that support cognitive and sensorimotor development."

event_or_fact.property: Iron is essential for the development of the central nervous system; Early iron deficiency can alter neuroanatomy, biochemistry, and metabolism, leading to changes in neurophysiologic processes that support cognitive and sensorimotor development.

entity.property: Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health
the Journal of the American Medical Association

description.hltext_display: Fortfarande osäker kring färdtjänstresor i jul trots bättre väderprognos
description.content:
– I de fall det går att köra så kör vi. Vi följer SMHI:s prognoser och får också in rapporter från våra chaufförer hur det ser ut.
Hon uppmanar kunder som beställt färdtjänst att avvakta besked.
– Det är ingen idé att ringa till oss för vi vet ingenting. I de fall resan blir inställd eller ändrad så tar vi kontakt. Men vi tar gärna emot ombokningar ifall någon som ska resa på julafton kan tänka sig att åka tidigare.

description.hltext_display: Nový sci-fi časopis XB-1
description.content: Na trhu se v prosinci objevil nový měsíčník XB-1 zaměřený na sci-fi, fantasy a horor. Vydavatelem je společnost Konektor XB-1. Informoval o tom Filip Humplík z vydavatelské společnosti s tím, že nový měsíčník by měl na trhu nahradit zastavený časopis Ikarie. Vydávání Ikarie letos po 21 letech zastavilo vydavatelství Mladá fronta. Podobný literární časopis tak na trhu podle Humplíka chyběl. Redakci má přitom XB-1 totožnou se zaniklou Ikarií. Vydavatel má vazby na reklamní a komunikační agenturu Konektor. Přibližně třetinu obsahu nového časopisu by měly tvořit zahraniční povídky, třetinu domácí a třetinu publicistika. "Je to zavedený model, který fungoval a funguje v amerických SF časopisech, právě tak jako například v polské Fantastyce," uvedl Humplík. Náklad časopisu by se podle Humplíka měl pohybovat mezi 15 000 až 20 000 výtisky. Cena je 75 korun. Do budoucna vydavatelství uvažuje také o částečném přechodu na elektronickou distribuci. "To ovšem až se vyřeší problematika ochrany vydávané tiskoviny," uvedl Humplík.

description.hltext_display: Rama Yade en voie d'être nommée mercredi ambassadrice à l'Unesco
description.content:
AFP - Publi le 22/12/2010 � 09:06 Par Thibaut Danancher Par Laurence Neuer Par Marie-Sandrine Sgherri Par Pablo René-Worms Par Olivier Ubertalli
Rama Yade a été secrétaire d'Etat aux droits de l'Homme (2007-2009) puis secrétaire d'Etat aux Sports (2009-2010). Après avoir fait ses premières armes � l'UMP, poussée par Nicolas Sarkozy, elle a rejoint récemment Jean-Louis Borloo au parti radical.
L'ex-secrétaire d'Etat Rama Yade devrait être nommée mercredi en Conseil des ministres ambassadrice, déléguée permanente de la France auprès de l'Unesco en remplacement de Catherine Colonna, a-t-on appris de source proche du dossier, confirmant une information de RTL.
Figurant parmi les personnalités les plus populaires en France, Rama Yade, 34 ans, devrait être nommée ambassadrice auprès de l'Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture, dont le siège est � Paris. Ex porte-parole de l'Elysée sous Jacques Chirac, ex-ministre de Affaires européennes, Catherine Colonna occupait cette fonction depuis 2008.
Rama Yade a été secrétaire d'Etat aux droits de l'Homme (2007-2009) puis secrétaire d'Etat aux Sports (2009-2010). Après avoir fait ses premières armes � l'UMP, poussée par Nicolas Sarkozy, elle a rejoint récemment Jean-Louis Borloo au parti radical.
De la visite de Kadhafi � sa critique -tardive- du discours de Dakar, en passant par ses caprices électoraux, la jeune femme, qui a eu 34 ans en décembre, a incarné au gouvernement l'anti-conformisme plus que la "diversité", aux Droits de l'homme puis aux Sports. Née � Dakar d'un couple d'enseignants proche de Senghor, elle est arrivée en France � onze ans. Elle est diplômée de Sciences po, administratrice du Sénat, avant d'apparaître pour la première fois sous les feux des projecteurs le jour de l'investiture de Nicolas Sarkozy comme candidat UMP � l'élection présidentielle en janvier 2007.
Battue aux municipales � Colombes en 2008, Rama Yade a tenu tête � deux reprises au chef de l'Etat et � l'UMP en refusant de se présenter aux Européennes en 2009, puis en choisissant de se présenter dans les Hauts-de-Seine et non dans le Val-d'Oise aux régionales de 2010. Soyez le premier réagir sur cet article 3C Paris 4C Annecy 11C Marseille 3C Paris 4C Annecy 11C Marseille 8C Lyon 5C Toulouse 1C Reims 3C Paris 5C Poitiers 0C Cherbourg 0C Amiens 3C Paris 2C Metz 2C Nancy 5C Tours 3C Orléans 4C Auxerre 3C Paris 5C Bourges 3C Strasbourg 4C Annecy 3C Mulhouse 3C Paris 6C Besançon 1C Lille 0C Abbeville -1C Rouen 2C Brest 3C Paris 1C Rennes 3C Nantes 3C Paris 6C Clt-Ferrand 8C Perpignan 9C Ajaccio 5C Limoges 8C Lyon 3C Paris 7C Bordeaux 9C Biarritz 16 décembre 2010
Déc. 2010 - Fév. 2011 - Retrouvez l'actualit internationale et l'actualit de la France sur le portail Le Point ainsi que les nouveauts High Tech, des informations sur l'conomie mondiale et l'actualit sportive du moment. La frquentation de ce site est certifie par l'OJD.

description.hltext_display: Knirpse ins Märchenland entführt
description.content:
Die Knirpse versammeln sich um die Weihnachtstanne, bevor es zum Vorlesen an den Tisch geht.Traudel Leske
STERNBERG - In der Gruppe der Vierjährigen der Kindertagesstätte "Sonnenschein" in Sternberg - Erzieherin ist hier Ines Döscher - hatte sich dieser
Tage wieder lieber Besuch angemeldet. Eine "Märchentante", so hieß es, wolle kommen und den Kleinen die Vorweihnachtszeit mit lustigen Weihnachts geschichten versüßen. Die Kinder, von ihren Muttis so richtig "in Schale"
geworfen, sind schon Stunden zuvor mächtig aufgeregt. Denn Märchen-
Hören ist das, was die meisten besonders lieben. Ebenso macht das Besuche-Empfangen auch viel Spaß, weil es
immer etwas gibt. Als die Kleinen dann ihren Gruppenraum betreten, empfängt sie ein kleiner, festlich gedeckter Tisch, gerade so groß wie im Märchen von Schneewittchen und den sieben Zwergen. An den aber alle Steppkes passen. Auf dem Tisch leuchtet eine große Kerze. Und auch die herausgeputzte Weihnachtstanne in der Ecke verströmt schon ihr warmes Licht in den Raum. Dann, poch poch poch, geht die Tür auf, und herein kommt die Vorlese-Patentante Inge Wohlgemuth, den Kindern bestens bekannt. Denn die ehemalige Musiklehrerin und Erzieherin ist alle
14 Tage zu Gast. Sie besucht reihum die Gruppen und hat stets spannende
Geschichten in ihrem Gepäck.
Wunschzettel aus
verschiedenen Ländern
Nach der ersten Begrüßung wird aber erst mal gemeinsam ein Weihnachtslied gesungen, das gehört zum Ritual: Bald nun ist Weihnachtszeit … Dann holt die "Märchentante" ihr großes, buntes Märchenbuch hervor. "Das habe ich extra für euch gekauft, weil es so schöne Geschichten und bunte Bilder vom Weihnachtsmann, von den Engeln und weiteren Gehilfen enthält", erklärt die Vorleserin. Dann wird das neue Buch erstmal gemeinsam angeschaut. Und alle Kinder wissen zu den einzelnen Bildern was zu erzählen. Es ist erstaunlich, wie die Phantasie der Kinder in ihrem Alter schon Blüten treibt und was sie schon alles wissen. Inge Wohlgemuth weiß gut mit den Kindern umzugehen. Was wohl auch ihrem einstigen Beruf geschuldet ist. Aber bei jedem Wort ist auch die Liebe zu den Kindern zu spüren. Den erzieherischen Aspekt vergisst die 73-Jährige dabei nicht, und sie ermahnt den einen oder anderen freundlich, aber bestimmt bei Fehlverhalten. Dann wird in einer wunderschönen Geschichte dem Weihnachtsmann in Lappland, wo er im Walde mit seinen Helfern wohnen soll, ein Besuch abgestattet. Der Bärtige und seine Engel gehen Brief für Brief der Kinder aus den verschiedenen Ländern durch, den diese mit einem Wunschzettel an ihn geschickt haben. Und dann werden die Wünsche der Kinder erfüllt. Die Pakete verstaut der Alte in seinem großen Sack und lädt ihn auf seinen Rentierschlitten. Der kleine Max aus Deutschland wünscht sich sehnlichst eine selbstgebaute Eisenbahn, die ihm seine Eltern nicht kaufen können. Ob er sie bekommt? Diese Frage wird von den Krippenkindern gleich beantwortet: "Ja, wenn er lieb ist!" Aiko aus Japan möchte gerne eine Puppe, und auch ihr Wunsch wird erfüllt. Aus der Gruppe der Zwischenruf: "Nicht alle Kinder
haben soviel Spielzeug wie wir." Richtig erkannt von den Vierjährigen. Nano aus Grönland möchte zu gerne mal eine
eigene Angel haben, damit er einem Vater beim Fischen helfen kann. Lebensnotwendigkeit für die Grönländer. Lillis sehnlichster Wunsch - sie wohnt in Australien - ist es, dass sie fliegen könne; sie bekommt einen Drachen. Und John aus Amerika erhält ein Haustier. Ein afrikanisches Mädchen möchte so gerne ein Kleid haben. Fazit der Lesestunde: Nicht alle Kinder haben es so gut wie wir. Doch nach dem Besuch im Märchenbuch wissen alle: Am Weihnachtsabend gibt es wieder ein paar glückliche Kinder mehr. Dann erzählen Felix, Taja, Merle, Laris, Joeline, Finny, Luisa, Tara und Angelina, was sie sich vom Weihnachtsmann gewünscht haben. "Ich war eine der Ersten, die eine Vorlese-Patenschaft für Kinder übernommen haben. Denn Kinder sind nun mal meine Welt", schwärmt Inge Wohlgemuth. "Ich habe selbst zwei Töchter und fünf Enkel und warte sehnsüchtig auf einen Urenkel. Doch meine Enkel lassen sich Zeit damit."

description.hltext_display: افغانستان میں شکست کا بدلہ پاکستان سے
description.content: امریکا نے 2014ءتک افغانستان سے فوجیں نکالنے کا اعلان کردیا ہے لیکن افغانستان کا پیچھا نہیں چھوڑا جائے گا، صرف فوجیں نکلیں گی، امریکا نہیں۔ امریکا کے نائب صدر جوبائیڈن نے چند ہفتے پہلے لزبن کی ناٹو کانفرنس میں اعلان کیا تھا کہ امریکا اور افغانستان میں لڑنے والی تمام ناٹو افواج اس پر متفق ہیں کہ 2014ءتک وہاں سے لڑاکا افواج نکال لی جائیں گی۔ گزشتہ پیر کو وائٹ ہاﺅس کے ترجمان رابرٹ گبس نے بائیڈن کے اس اعلان کی توثیق کی اور کہا کہ خواہ کچھ ہوجائی، لڑاکا افواج افغانستان سے نکل جائیں گی۔ مسٹر گبس نے عراق کی مثال بھی دی کہ جس طرح وہاں ہم نے سیکورٹی کے معاملات عراقیوں کو منتقل کردیے اسی طرح افغانستان میں کیا جائے گا۔ ایک صحافی کے اس سوال پر کہ 2014ءتک زمینی حقائق کا ادراک کیے بغیر یہ وعدہ کیسے کرلیا گیا، ترجمان نے اس سے اتفاق کرتے ہوئے کہا کہ صورتحال دیکھ کر فوج کی تعداد میں کمی بیشی کا فیصلہ کیا جائے گا۔ یعنی یہ کوئی حتمی فیصلہ نہیں اور اگر چار سال بعد بھی افغانستان میں حالات امریکا اور ناٹو افواج کے قابو سے باہر رہے تو انخلا نہیں ہوگا، ممکن ہے کہ لڑاکا فوج میں کچھ کمی کردی جائے۔ تاہم امریکی صدر کے اعلان کے مطابق جولائی 2011ءسے امریکی فوج کے انخلا کا آغاز ہوجائے گا۔ جوبائیڈن اور وائٹ ہاﺅس کے بیانات سے لگتا ہے کہ یہ عمل 2014ءتک جاری رہے گا اور اگر یہ محسوس ہوا کہ افغانستان میں امریکا کے مقاصد پوری طرح حاصل نہیں ہوئے تو امریکی فوج کا ایک حصہ افغانستان ہی میں رہے گا۔ ترجمان نے عراق کی مثال دی ہے کہ لوگ سمجھ رہے تھے کہ ہم نے عراق سے انخلا کی جو تاریخ دی ہے اس پر عمل نہیں کرسکیں گے لیکن ہم نے یہ کر دکھایا۔ اب یہ کون نہیں جانتا کہ عراق اور افغانستان کے حالات میں بڑا واضح فرق ہے۔ بنیادی بات یہ ہے کہ عراق پر فوج کشی کا امریکا کے پاس کوئی اخلاقی جواز ہی نہیں تھا گوکہ امریکا کو اخلاقیات سے کوئی علاقہ نہیں تاہم وہاں اس کی اور اس کے صلیبی حواریوں کی موجودگی سراسر مجرمانہ تھی جس پر خود امریکا و برطانیہ میں تنقید ہورہی تھی۔ دوسرے یہ کہ عراقیوں کی طرف سے اس مزاحمت کا مظاہرہ نہیں کیا گیا جو افغانستان میں نظر آرہی ہے۔ تیسرے یہ کہ امریکا عراقیوں اور عراق کو تقسیم کرنے میں زیادہ آسانی سے کامیاب ہوگیا۔ اس نے شمالی عراق میں کردوں کو داخلی خود مختاری دلوادی اور وسطی و جنوبی عراق کو عملاً سنی اور شیعہ حلقوں میں تقسیم کردیا۔ اس طرح عراق کی رہی سہی طاقت اور یکجہتی کو پارہ پارہ کردیا گیا جو ایک عرصہ تک بحال نہیں ہوسکے گی۔ امریکا کو اپنے اس دعوے پر شرم آنی چاہیے کہ وہ عراق کے معاملات عراقیوں کے سپرد کرنے میں کامیاب ہوگیا اور وہاں اس نے اپنے معیار کے مطابق جمہوریت نافذ کردی۔ اس کے پاس اب تک اس بات کا جواز نہیں ہے کہ اس نے عراق پر حملہ کیوں کیا اور لاکھوں عراقیوں کو قتل کس لیے کیا۔ اب وہ اپنی کامیابی پر فخر کررہا ہے۔ امریکا کو عراق میں جس بڑی تعداد میں اپنے ہم نوا مل گئے تھی، افغانستان میں یہ ممکن نہیں ہوسکا اور افغان اپنی آزادی اور خود مختاری کے لیے عراقیوں سے زیادہ جرا¿ت مند اور غیرت مند ثابت ہوئے جس کی بنیادی وجہ یہ ہے کہ افغان ہمیشہ سے آزاد رہے ہیں اور وہ اپنی آزادی کے لیے گزشتہ 31 برس سے مسلسل حالت جنگ میں ہیں۔ ان مجاہدین کی دوسری اور تیسری نسل میدان میں آچکی ہے۔ یہ ٹھیک ہے کہ افغانستان میں بھی امریکا اور اس کے صلیبی حواریوں کو شمالی اتحاد اور پختونوں میں سے بھی ایجنٹ دستیاب ہوگئے ہیں لیکن عام افغان کو غیر ملکی تسلط کسی طرح بھی قبول نہیں۔ افغانستان پر امریکی حملہ بھی بلا جواز تھا کیونکہ نائن الیون کے واقعہ میں کوئی افغان ملوث نہیں تھا۔ اگر امریکا کا مقصد تمام ناٹو ممالک کی افواج جمع کرکے اسامہ بن لادن کو پکڑنا تھا تو اس میں اسے شدید ناکامی ہوئی ہے جس کی قیمت اربوں ڈالر کے علاوہ اپنے فوجیوں کی لاشوں کی صورت میں چکانی پڑ رہی ہے۔ گزشتہ 9 سال میں امریکا اچھی طرح جان چکا ہے کہ آئندہ 9 سال بھی یہی صورتحال رہے گی اور اس کے فوجی ذبح ہوتے رہیں گے۔ مسٹر اوباما کو اپنا اقتدار بھی بچانا ہے جو امریکا میں خطرے میں ہے۔ اس کے پاس افغانستان سے جان بچا کر نکل جانے کے سوا کوئی اور راستہ نہیں۔ لیکن وہ یہاں سے پوری طرح نہیں نکلے گا اور اس نے اپنی نیابت کے لیے بھارت کو بھی تیار کر رکھا ہے لیکن بھارت کو خوف ہے کہ امریکا کے نکل جانے کے بعد اس کی بری طرح درگت بنے گی۔ لیکن اس سے بڑا خطرہ پاکستان کے لیے ہے۔ امریکا سے جو بیانات آرہے ہیں ان سے ظاہر ہے کہ امریکا افغانستان سے فارغ ہو کر اب پاکستان پر توجہ دینے کی ٹھان رہا ہے۔ یہ بات تواتر سے کہی جارہی ہے کہ القاعدہ اور افغان طالبان کی قیادت پاکستان کے قبائلی علاقوں اور کوئٹہ میں روپوش ہے۔ شمالی وزیرستان میں فوجی آپریشن کا مطالبہ زور پکڑ رہا ہے اور اطلاعات ہیں کہ آئندہ 6 ماہ میں یہ آپریشن شروع ہوسکتا ہے۔ خیبر ایجنسی پر ڈرون حملے بڑھ گئے ہیں۔ پاک فوج کی قربانیوں کے باوجود اس پر دباﺅ بڑھ رہا ہے اور دھمکی دی جارہی ہے کہ پاکستان نے خود کچھ نہ کیا تو امریکا کارروائی کرے گا۔ ہماری طرف سے صرف یہ حرف تسلی کہ ہم اپنے دفاع کی صلاحیت رکھتے ہیں۔

description.hltext_display: Abgeordnete werben für begrenzte Gentest-Zulassung
description.content:
Berlin (dpa) - Eine Gruppe von Bundestags-Abgeordneten aus allen Fraktionen wirbt für die begrenzte Zulassung von Gentests an künstlich gezeugten Embryonen.
Die Präimplantationsdiagnostik (PID) an den noch nicht in den Mutterleib eingepflanzten Embryonen soll nach ihrer Ansicht aber nur dann zulässig sein, wenn Fehl- oder Totgeburten drohen oder schwere Erbschäden zu erwarten sind. So steht es in dem heute vorgestellten Gesetzentwurf.
«Ziel unseres Gesetzes ist es, Paaren, die einen sehnlichen Kinderwunsch haben, aber bei denen ein oder beide Elternteile die Veranlagung für eine schwerwiegende Erbkrankheit haben, eine Chance auf die Geburt eines gesunden Kindes zu geben», begründete die FDP- Fraktionsvize Ulrike Flach den Entwurf. Unterstützt wird Flach von den Abgeordneten Peter Hintze (CDU), Carola Reimann (SPD), Petra Sitte (Linke) und Jerzy Montag (Grüne).
Doch auch die Anhänger eines strikten Verbots der Präimplantationsdiagnostik (PID) sind zuversichtlich, bei der im Frühjahr erwarteten Parlamentsentscheidung eine Mehrheit zu bekommen. Zu ihnen zählen unter anderem die Kanzlerin und CDU-Chefin Angela Merkel. Unterdessen kündigte eine dritte Parlamentarier-Gruppe um Priska Hinz (Grüne) und René Röspel (SPD) für Mitte Januar einen weiteren Gesetzentwurf an. Sie wollen die PID ausschließlich dann zulassen, wenn Tot- oder Frühgeburten drohen, nicht aber bei einer befürchteten Behinderung.
Mit der PID können im Reagenzglas erzeugte Embryonen vor der Einpflanzung in den Mutterleib auf Erbkrankheiten untersucht und dann aussortiert werden. Nach einer Entscheidung des Bundesgerichtshofs vom Juli stellt die PID keinen strafbaren Verstoß gegen das strenge deutsche Embryonenschutzgesetz dar. Bei Verabschiedung des Gesetzes vor fast 20 Jahren war diese Diagnostik noch nicht bekannt. Der Bundestag will die Gesetzeslücke schließen. Entschieden wird die ethisch heikle Frage ohne Fraktionszwang.
Flach und die anderen Befürworter einer begrenzten PID-Zulassung wehrten sich gegen Vorwürfe, die «Büchse der Pandora» zu öffnen. Ihr Gesetzentwurf verbiete Designer-Babys und die Auswahl des Geschlechts der Kinder. Flach betonte, die Gruppe sei grundsätzlich durchaus für ein PID-Verbot. Gleichwohl solle sie in Ausnahmefällen zulässig sein. Zur Vermeidung von Missbrauch solle eine Beratung Pflicht sein, eine interdisziplinär zusammengesetzte Ethikkommission zustimmen, die Frau schriftlich einwilligen und die PID nur an Zentren mit Lizenz vorgenommen werden. «Über die Durchführung der PID wird in jedem Einzelfall entschieden.»
Die SPD-Abgeordnete Reimann betonte, ohne eine solche Regelung lasse man Paare und vor allem Frauen sehenden Auges in einen Schwangerschaftskonflikt laufen. Reimann rechnet auf der Basis von Beratungsstatistiken mit etwa 100 bis 200 PID-Fälle pro Jahr.
Linke-Fraktionsvize Sitte sagte, zwei Drittel der betroffenen Eltern hätten bereits ein oft krankes oder pflegebedürftiges Kind und sagten: «Wir möchten dieses Leiden einem zweiten Kind ersparen, aber wir möchten gerne ein zweites Kind.» Betroffen seien auch Frauen, die oft wegen Anomalien bei den Chromosomen bereits mehrfach Fehl- und Totgeburten hatten. Der Grünen-Rechtspolitiker Montag betonte: «Ich halte ein völliges Verbot der PID gegenüber den betroffenen Paaren für verfassungswidrig und menschenrechtswidrig.»
