description.hltext_display: Hungary passes law boosting government control of media
description.content:
BUDAPEST (Reuters) - Hungary's parliament passed legislation on Tuesday to tighten government control over news outlets which media watchdogs say is arbitrary and ill-defined.
The new National Media and Communications Authority (NMHH), dominated by people loyal to the ruling Fidesz party, will oversee all public news production and its powers will include levying big fines on private media that violate the law.
Luxembourg Foreign Minister Jean Asselborn criticised the move in an interview with Reuters in Germany, saying the European Commission must take swift action against it.
"The plans clearly violate the spirit and the letter of EU treaties," Asselborn said, adding: "It raises the question whether such a country is worthy of leading the EU."
Hungary takes over the European Union's rotating presidency on January 1.
"It's a direct danger for democracy," Asselborn said in a telephone interview. "The state will control opinion."
Asselborn said the law would put Hungary in a similar boat as Belarus. "Until now (Alexander) Lukashenko was considered to be the last dictator in Europe. When the law takes effect, that won't be the case any more."
In Hungary about 1,500 people protested near parliament late on Monday against the media law.
Since Fidesz won a two-thirds parliament majority in April, it has put its own people into key posts at public institutions such as the financial regulator and the state audit office, as well as the NMHH.
The media law, seen as the latest piece of that drive, received 256 votes with 87 against and no abstentions in parliament.
Critics have called the law heavy-handed, saying it does not clearly lay out what news outlets have to do to comply.
The Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe (OSCE) said it severely restricted print and online media, which runs counter to OSCE standards.
"Regulating print media can curb media freedom and free public debate, which are indispensable elements of democracies," Dunja Mijatovic, the OSCE media freedom representative, wrote in a report.
"Regulating online media is not only technologically impossible but it exerts a chilling, self-censoring effect on free expression."
Besides regulatory changes, all public service news production, in television, radio and the national news agency MTI, will be merged and its contents disseminated free of charge.
The government said the new law was long overdue to bring outdated legislation up to date with changing technology and content. It said the law respected press freedom and was in line with those in fellow EU countries.
(Reporting by Marton Dunai; additional reporting by Andreas Rinke in Berlin; writing by Erik Kirschbaum; editing by Andrew Dobbie)

description.hltext_display: Czech government survives no-confidence vote
description.author: Jan Korselt and Jason Hovet
description.content:
By Jan Korselt and Jason Hovet
PRAGUE (Reuters) - The Czech center-right government survived a no-confidence vote in the lower house on Tuesday, avoiding a collapse after five months in office and promising to push ahead with planned economic reforms.
Junior coalition party Public Affairs, elected on pledges to fight graft, threw its support behind the government just before the vote, becoming the last of the three ruling parties to back the administration after a corruption scandal at the Environment Ministry erupted last week.
Earlier on Tuesday the three parties had met for more than two hours with President Vaclav Klaus, who said they had worked out a deal to allow the government of Prime Minister Petr Necas to stay in office.
The three parties -- the Civic Democrats, the conservative TOP09 and the centrist Public Affairs -- had held meetings since Friday to try to resolve the most serious rift in the coalition since it swept to victory in a May election on pledges to cut the budget deficit and fight corruption.
The lower house voted 113-80 against the no-confidence motion initiated by the main opposition party, the center-left Social Democrats, preventing it from getting the 101 votes needed to dismiss the cabinet.
Necas said after the vote that the government had withstood the test.
"I strongly believe that... after the new year the government coalition will primarily deal with the key tasks that are ahead of us," he said.
"Which means above all steps that will lead to reforms, steps that will enable the anti-corruption strategy, steps that will clearly lead to a stabilization of public finances."
CORRUPTION FIGHT
The no-confidence motion was prompted by accusations that Environment Minister Pavel Drobil, a member of Necas' Civic Democrats, was covering up corruption at his department. Drobil, who has denied wrongdoing, has since resigned.
Public Affairs had been reluctant to support the government, and is demanding among other things the removal of the police chief who is involved in the investigation into the ministry scandal. Necas has so far refused to replace him.
Klaus said after meeting the parties during the day that they had agreed on ways to fight corruption and other issues that have irked Public Affairs. "There is an elementary deal how to handle these problems in coming days and weeks," he said.
Government officials have not unveiled details of the deal between the parties.
With 118 seats in the 200-member lower house, the center-right cabinet has the strongest parliamentary support of any government since the Czech Republic split from Slovakia in 1993.
The strong backing could help the cabinet push through reforms, including of the pension and healthcare systems, which previous administrations were too weak to implement.
The cabinet, praised by investors and rating agencies for its fiscal austerity and reform ambitions, has pushed through a 2011 budget projecting a total fiscal gap of 4.6 percent of economic output, down from 5.1 percent expected this year.
It pledged to balance budgets by 2016.
(Additional reporting by Roman Gazdik and Robert Mueller, writing by Jana Mlcochova and Jason Hovet; editing by Mark Trevelyan)

description.hltext_display: 陈宝国入戏深动真格 为拍戏失手?倒冯远征道歉
description.content:
由陈宝国、冯远征等主演的史诗剧《钢铁年代》，将作为开年大戏于明年1月1日起在山东卫视播出。日前，该剧主创聚首济南亮相首播发布会。在回忆起拍摄《钢铁年代》时因入戏太深而真的一巴掌将冯远征搧倒在地的情节，陈宝国禁不住泪洒当场，并向冯远征深鞠一躬以表歉意。
入戏太深动真格
剧中，陈宝国和冯远征是一对“冤家”，冯远征扮演的杨寿山是国民党军的连长，而陈宝国扮演的尚铁龙以前是解放军的连长，东北解放后，曾经战场上的敌人分别成了鞍钢两个分厂的厂长，又由于同一个女人，两人从解放前一直斗争到解放后，在错综复杂恩恩怨怨中较量了一辈子。
陈宝国透露，当初导演拿剧本找到他出演尚铁龙的时候，他第一时间便推荐了冯远征，“虽然我们之前互不相识，但是我一直很欣赏冯远征，看角色第一时间便想到找他来演对手戏。角色表面很知性斯文，但内心又阴又狠、坏着呢，这种角色他演最合适。”不过谈起两人第一次合作，陈宝国则对冯远征内疚得落下了心结，“我失手打了他！ ”原来，有一场戏是要求两人喝酒聊天，然后陈宝国突然掌掴冯远征，“本来不是真打，我们走戏的时候还特别测量了位置，但是没想到拍戏的时候，远征演得太真了，把我也带入戏来真的了，啪就一耳光过去，打到他的太阳穴和耳朵都泛红了，帽子也被打掉了，人也从桌上打到桌下去了，但是没想到冯远征还能把帽子捡起来继续演。”说到这事，陈宝国愧疚万分，甚至当场洒泪，不停给冯远征道歉，并深鞠一躬，“远征，我真不好意思，这是我的一块心病，我给你鞠躬赔个不是！ ”
不演皇帝演农民
由于已经演过五次皇帝戏，就连陈宝国自己都有些厌倦了，“勾心斗角得实在受不了，我曾经发过毒誓再也不接皇上戏。 ”而且他还非常希望通过一个成功的剧本来接上“地气”。近两年，他终于在两部戏中如愿以偿地演了普通人，一个是《茶馆》，一个就是《钢铁年代》，而后者更是被其看作自己的转型之作。 “尚铁龙这个角色特别能打动我，他身上有种生命的豁达感，幽默的气质。他性格奔放但不是张扬，内心很复杂，他的精神气质有那个年代人物的信仰。 ”
尽管跻身国内一线男星行列，但是近年来陈宝国出现在荧屏上机会并不多，对此陈宝国解释说，“你们都炒作我的片酬有多高多高，但恰恰这时我拍戏减少了，我接戏不纯是为了挣钱，我不会降低接戏标准的，这两年好剧本确实少，所以我拍的就少。 ”从《大宅门》里的白景琦到《汉武大帝》里的汉武帝、《江山风雨情》的桂王等等，陈宝国说自己原来似乎总在上面飘着，这次扮演钢铁工人接了地气了，“我曾发过毒誓，一定要让自己的表演落地，现在我演过工人了，也演过当兵的了，就差农民的角色了。因为外形和人生经历，一直都没人找我演农民，但我一直在体验学习，也跟很多导演打过招呼，目前我最大的梦想就是演一次农民，给全中国的9亿农民朋友看。 ”

description.hltext_display: 石元春建言：生物质能源解困“三农”
description.content:
中国“三农”困境的病根，是将8亿农民捆绑在人均不到0.1公顷土地上从事附加值极低的粮食和初级农产品生产上。免农业税、发种粮补贴、搞新农村建设等非常必要，更重要的是改变现行落后的农业产业结构，培育自身“造血功能”和“成长机制”。生物质产业的原料生产一头在“三农”，加工和市场一头在工业和城市，是“构建新型工农、城乡关系”的最佳“纽带”和“抓手”。
如果使每年可用于能源的4亿吨秸秆（其中1亿多吨被白白焚烧）得到开发，可相当于8座三峡电站发电量，并帮农民每年增收800亿～1000亿元；如果利用非粮低质边际性土地种植甜高粱和薯类，可每年转化为1亿吨燃料乙醇并使农民增收1000亿～1500亿元；如果开发农林及加工业的有机废弃物，可转化为900亿立方米的天然气（相当于全国现消费量）并使农民增收1000亿元。同时还可促进农村工业化、城镇化，农村富余劳动力就近转移就业。这种对农民、对国家功德无量的事情，应该成为“十二五”规划中浓墨重彩的一笔。
当前，对生物质能源的一个最大质疑或误会就是怕影响国家粮食安全，但实质上非粮乙醇和生物柴油不会影响粮食安全。今年5月在北京举行的中美先进生物燃料论坛上，我们提出了“1.5代乙醇”的概念，即以中国优势的非粮能源作物甜高粱、薯类和菊芋等为原料生产燃料乙醇，技术成熟，设备国产，可较快形成产业化和规模化生产。薯类和高粱从来就是生产淀粉和酒的工业原料以及饲料，而不是人的口粮，是种在那些种不了粮食的低质土地上。所谓的影响粮食安全主要是一种误解。
质疑之二是生物燃料会不会引起作物秸秆和薯类甜高粱等原料的价格上涨。随着社会需求和商品价格而调整原料价格是一种正常的市场行为。使毫无或经济价值很低的秸秆和畜禽粪便等污染物无害化、资源化和增值化有什么不好？再者，在需求旺盛和附加值较高的能源产品拉动下，合理提高薯类和甜高粱等的价格，增加农民收入有什么不好？
质疑之三是国家的补贴将增多。这应是针对目前100多万吨粮食乙醇而言，因为对成型燃料和产业沼气至今还没有国家补贴政策，对生物质发电的补贴也低于风能和太阳能发电。国家为发展战略新兴产业和减排，扶持与补贴是正常和必要的，各国都是如此，且力度比我国大得多。如果说国家对风能和太阳能的补贴给的只是企业，那么生物质发电和燃料乙醇成本中原料占六七成，政府对企业的补贴实际上是转移支付给了农民。国家正在想方设法增加农民收入和缩小城乡差距，这种补贴方式不仅增加了农民收入，还培育了农村工业，既有“鱼”又有“渔”，何乐而不为？
质疑之四，生物质能源的技术不成熟。中国的生物质能源技术与国外差距并不大，且自主性强，装备国产化程度高。相反，风能和太阳能的核心技术与材料被国外少数大公司所垄断。此外，生物质原料分散和能源密度低的不足也是可以通过成型燃料和分布式布局解决的。
“十二五”的可再生能源规划应为国家《可再生能源中长期发展规划》的一部分。经统一换算为标煤后，《可再生能源中长期发展规划》提出的2020年发展目标中，生物质能、小水电、风电、太阳能和地热分别为299万、100万、21万、37万、和12万吨标煤，分别占43%、33%、7%、13%和4%，体现了以生物质能源为主导的思想。但是“十一五”期间没有认真执行这一精神和完成生物质能源的2010年各项指标，加重了“十二五”期间的任务。
针对上述情况，提出以下政策性建议：
其一，我国油气资源极缺，需求、缺口以及进口依存度急增，建议在进口以应急需的基础上，加大石油和天然气替代进程，“十二五”规划中可安排“加快发展非粮燃料乙醇和产业沼气专项（或重点工程）”。
其二，鉴于生物质原料的分散性，宜发展中小规模及分布式布局的加工厂，建议发挥民营中小企业的优势和给以足够的政策支持。大型央企拥有资金与技术优势，建议与国家绿色“三田”建设计划结合，总体规模与分布式布局相结合，原料生产与地方和农业部门结合。
其三，总结“十一五”期间生物质发电的成功经验和未能完成液体生物燃料的政策教训，在“十二五”期间放开政策，鼓励和支持民营中小企业参与燃料乙醇和生物柴油的发展。
其四，鉴于生物质能源亦工亦农的特点，建议借鉴国外做法，成立由国家能源局、农业部、国家林业局、环保部组成的协调领导小组和办公室。

description.hltext_display: Indians sign OF Buck to minor league contract
description.content:
Travis Buck #6 of the Oakland Athletics bats against the Los Angeles Angels of Anaheim on May 4, 2009 at the Oakland Coliseum in Oakland, California. (Ezra Shaw, )
Updated: 12/21 3:04 pm
The Cleveland Indians have signed outfielder Travis Buck to a minor league contract with an invitation to spring training on Tuesday.
The four-year veteran spent his entire career to this point with Oakland .
Last spent he spent the majority of his time with Triple-A Sacramento. Over 14 games with Oakland, he batted just .167 with one home run and two RBI.
In 170 games, he has hit .250 with 18 homers and 71 RBI. Also, he has never made an error in the field.
Buck is scheduled to make $625,000 if he gains a spot on the major-league roster.

description.hltext_display: Wooden's grandson: Coach would have loved UConn
description.content:
file photo shows former UCLA coach John Wooden pausing as he takes questions from the media at the Los Angeles Athletic Club. Wooden and George Steinbrenner, two towering figures in sports, died in 2010, each having transformed his game in a distinct but enduring way.(AP Photo/Damian Dovarganes, File) DAMIAN DOVARGANES
Loading…
John Wooden's grandson thinks the Hall of Fame coach would have been thrilled to see UCLA's 88-game winning streak surpassed by a women's basketball team.
Greg Wooden flew in from California to watch top-ranked Connecticut win a record 89th consecutive game on Tuesday night, 93-62 over No. 22 Florida State.
"I kind of thought that somebody should come here from the family and show support," the 47-year-old Wooden said. "Certain players have said they're not really supportive of the streak, and I know my grandfather would have loved to have been here to see this."
John Wooden's UCLA teams won 88 straight games from 1971-74. Wooden died June 4 at age 99.
Greg Wooden said in the last decade of his life, coach Wooden thought the best basketball was being played at the collegiate level, "and it wasn't by the men."
He said his grandfather believed that women's teams, especially Connecticut, were playing his style of basketball, and liked the way they emphasized team above all else.
"He liked the way they passed the ball, the way they had quite a few stars who could have scored probably a lot more points on other teams, but were willing to sacrifice for the best of the team," Greg Wooden said.
Auriemma said he hopes that's the comparison people make between his team and Wooden's UCLA squad. He said the streak isn't about which team is better, but how each one played the game.
"That's all I've ever wanted is for these kids to be appreciated for what they do and how they do it, not to be compared to how Bill Walton and Jamaal Wilkes did it," Auriemma said.
Greg Wooden said it was the first women's game he had attended.

description.hltext_display: Reilly mit bisheriger Sanierung zufrieden
description.content:
- RÜSSELSHEIM
Ein Jahr nachdem der Brite Nick Reilly das Ruder bei Opel übernommen hat, zieht er jetzt eine positive Zwischenbilanz: Die Sanierung des Rüsselsheimer Autoherstellers verlaufe planmäßig, die neuen Modelle kommen bei den Kunden gut an. Nur eines bedauert Reilly: Das Ansehen der Marke erholt sich in vielen europäischen Ländern merklich, nur in Deutschland gehe diese Entwicklung sehr langsam voran. „Das ist etwas frustrierend“, räumt der Auto-Manager im Redaktionsgespräch ein.
Das Verhältnis zum Mutterkonzern General Motors habe sich merklich entspannt, sagt Reilly. Und den Rüsslsheimern gelinge es, sich in der Konzern-Zentrale in Detroit Gehör zu verschaffen. „Ein gutes Beispiel dafür ist der Kleinwagen Junior“, so der Opel-Chef. Man habe GM davon überzeugen können, dass ein kleines, interessantes Auto für junge Leute auf dem europäischen Markt dringend benötigt werde. Innerhalb des Konzerns habe Rüsselsheim aufgrund seiner wichtigen Entwicklungsarbeit große Bedeutung. Opel und GM verbinde eine „gegenseitige Abhängigkeit“.
Großbritannien habe Industrieabwanderung selbst verursacht
Mit Blick auf Europa als Wirtschaftsstandort übt Reilly deutliche Kritik an Großbritannien. Die dortige Regierung habe in den vergangenen Jahren fast ausschließlich auf Finanzmärkte und Dienstleistungsgewerbe gesetzt und damit eine Abwanderung der produzierenden Industrie verursacht. „Das war ein schwerer Fehler“, sagt Reilly. Denn die westeuropäischen Industrie-Nationen benötigten eine gesunde Mischung aus Dienstleistung, Entwicklung und Produktion. Deutschland und Frankreich hätten hier die Weichen richtig gestellt: „Es gibt Strategien für eine vielfältige Wirtschaft.“ Deshalb sieht Reilly für die deutschen Werke von Opel im Inland eine gute Position.
Zurückhaltend äußerte sich der Opel-Chef zu möglichen Retro-Modellen wie einer Neuauflage des Manta. Er will zunächst die ganze Fahrzeugpalette erneuern und insbesondere beim Verbrauch und den CO2-Werten in den verschiedenen Auto-Segementen die jeweils Klassen-Besten haben.
Mehr dazu inklusive einem Interview mit Nick Reilly lesen Sie morgen in unserer Printausgabe.

description.hltext_display: 里帰り出産のストレス・・・後悔。 - 戻るべき
description.content:
初めての出産ということもあり実家に里帰りしているのですが、ストレスが大きく、毎晩涙を流しています。
ヒステリックな母、自己中心でわがままな妹の言葉に心が傷ついています。
いつもなら距離を置く、聞き流す・・・で対処しているのですが、
私の神経も過敏になっており心がつぶれそうです。
母は全く料理をせず、実家に帰ってからというもの私が家族分の料理を作っています。それでも、食材は買ってきてくれるのでありがたいのですが、
臨月に入ってから身体がしんどく、私もついイライラして
「子どもが生まれてからぐらいは、料理作ってくれる？」と言うと、
「親に何か期待するのは間違い！」
「食事宅配サービスでも自分で探してきて頼んだら？」と言われ、
気分が悪くて自室で休んでいたら、
「あんたが帰ってきてから、家の雰囲気が暗くなった！」
と言われます。
また、妹は大音量でテレビを見、大きな音でドアを開け閉めし、
もっと静かにしてもらえないか、と言うと、
「流産でもしちゃえば〜。」とか、
「お腹の子ども死んじゃったら私の責任にするわけ〜（笑）」と
平気で言います。
父と母は不仲で、ケンカがはじまると（たとえ夜中でも）大声で罵声を浴びせあってますし、父は家族に対して無関心です。
今では、家族と顔を合わせるだけで悲しくなり、できるだけ自室に引きこもり会わないようにしていますし、家族も私を無視するようになりました。
自分の判断で「里帰り」をしたので確かに自己責任で反省＆後悔をしてます。（実家からしばらく離れていたので、ここまで環境が悪いことを忘れていました。）
子どもが無事に生まれたら、すぐにでも夫の待つ自宅に帰りたいのですが、
新幹線で４時間。生後すぐに動けるものでしょうか？

確かに心配はありますが、一度実家にいくと中々出にくいので、勢いでそのまま帰るのがいいと思います。
今のうちに自分、赤ちゃんの荷物を自宅に送っておいて！

もし、帰ったとしても、トピ主さんのような状況になるのがわかってたので、最初から頼りませんでした

description.hltext_display: 蝙蝠侠克里斯蒂安-贝尔确定出演《金陵十三钗》
description.content:
2010年12月22日15:08 来源：人民网-娱乐频道
【字号 大 中 小】
E-mail推荐:
好莱坞男星克里斯蒂安-贝尔（资料图）
人民网娱乐讯 今日，张艺谋新片《十三钗》发布会举行。发布会上张伟平宣布，“蝙蝠侠”的扮演者克里斯蒂安・贝尔将出演《金陵十三钗》并担任主角。张伟平还称本片成本将达6亿，更大胆预测票房将达10亿，预计明年上映。
主演资料：
姓名：克里斯蒂安・贝尔
性别：男
出生年：1974年
生日：1月30日
地区：欧美
星座：水瓶座
身高：183cm
职业：演员个人简介
出演过《美国狂人》（American Psycho）的克里斯蒂安・贝尔被《娱乐周刊》10周年庆特刊列为过去十年间“8位最有影响力的偶像”和“娱乐界最有创意者”之一，还登上《Premiere》杂志“30岁以下最性感男主角”的排行榜。史蒂文・斯皮尔伯格1987年影片《太阳帝国》（Empire of the Sun）选角时，克里斯蒂安从4000个应征的孩子中脱颖而出，赢得詹姆斯・格拉汉（James Graham）一角，他的表演令评论家赞赏不已，更让他的拥趸者遍及全球，他还凭借此片获得美国国家影评人协会颁发的“最佳青少年表演奖”。
出生在威尔士的克里斯蒂安在伦敦西区初次登台，就有幸与“憨豆”先生罗温・阿特金森（Rowan Atkinson）合作。此后10年间，他活跃在莎士比亚剧、剧情片和喜剧片等领域，戏路宽广又不乏深度，令他坐上当今最受好评和互联网最受欢迎的演员宝座。

description.hltext_display: Kings halt Colorado's win streak at six games
description.content:
Jonathan Quick stopped all 23 shots he faced for his third shutout of the season, as the Los Angeles Kings blanked the Colorado Avalanche, 5-0, at Pepsi Center.
Dustin Brown recorded two goals and two assists for the Kings, who finished their five-game road trip with a 3-2-0 mark and will host Edmonton on Thursday. Brad Richardson, Rob Scuderi and Justin Williams also scored in the victory.
"Overall, this road trip was a tough one, but (winning) three out of five games is not bad," said Brown. "This is one of the best defensive games we've played in some time."
Craig Anderson allowed all five goals on 32 shots for Colorado, which was shut out for the first time this season and in the process saw its six-game win streak halted.
The Kings opened the scoring at 12:26 of the first period on Scuderi's first goal of the season. He maneuvered his way into the lower right circle and sent a backhander through traffic and past Anderson.
At the 6:31 mark of the second stanza, the visitors moved ahead by two on Richardson's fifth goal. Drew Doughty held control at the centerpoint and faked a shot to move around a Colorado defender, then skated toward the outer rim of the right circle. Doughty fired a centering pass, which was redirected into the net by Richardson from the top of the crease.
Less than eight minutes into the final frame, the Kings made it 3-0. Anze Kopitar drove to the net from the right wing and his stuffer from in close was saved, but the rebound sat loose in the crease and Brown was there to punch it home over the sprawled-out Anderson at 7:27.
"They create all their chances from playing good defensive hockey," said Anderson about the Sharks. "They control the puck from their defensive zone, and they created good opportunities all game."
Brown struck again with 4:57 to play in regulation with a wrister from the slot before Williams capped the scoring at 17:49 on the power play with a laser one-timer from the left circle.
Game Notes
The St. Louis Blues are now the only team in the NHL this season that has not been shut out...Despite the loss, the Avs are 7-1-1 in their last nine home games. Prior to this setback, Colorado's last regulation loss at home was on November 9 against Calgary...This was Quick's 11th career shutout...Four of Richardson's five goals this season have been scored against the Avs...The Kings were 1-for-3 on the power play. The Avs had three chances with the extra skater.

description.hltext_display: “十一五”农村沼气建设资金212亿元 实现跨越式发展
description.content:
“十一五”期间是我国农村沼气投入最大、发展最快、受益农户最多的时期，中央累计投入农村沼气建设资金达212亿元。在中央投资的带动下，农村沼气建设数量不断扩大、投资结构不断优化、服务体系逐步健全、沼气功能进一步拓展、沼气产业迅速发展，进入建管并重、多元发展的新阶段，形成了农村户用沼气、养殖场大中型沼气工程、养殖小区和联户沼气工程、秸秆集中供气沼气工程、农村中小学校沼气工程等多种模式的建设格局；以沼气装备、沼气施工、沼气科技、沼气服务为主要内容的农村沼气产业化体系初步形成；秸秆沼气技术、沼气工程控制自动化、沼气发电、沼气工程清洁发展机制（CDM）项目等均取得重大突破。
来自农业部的数据显示，预计至2010年底，全国户用沼气将达到4000万户，占全国适宜农户的33%，各类沼气工程超过6万处，其中养殖小区等小型沼气工程2万多处、大中型沼气工程4700多处，受益人口达1.55亿人；产业规模不断壮大，全国沼气生产工达27万多名，各类沼气生产和服务企业4000多个，实现年产值260多亿元。农村沼气已成为新时期最重要的民生工程之一和新农村建设的一大亮点，被誉为中国应对气候变化最有效、最普遍的两大行动之一，在改善农村生产生活条件，促进农业发展方式转变，推进农业农村节能减排以及保护生态环境等方面发挥了重要作用。
农村沼气上承养殖业，下启种植业，一头连着生产，一头连着生活，综合效益十分显著。既为农民提供优质生活用能，优化农村能源消费结构，又减少了温室气体排放，促进了低碳经济发展；既是转变农业农村发展方式、促进生态、循环农业发展的有效措施，又是改善农村环境卫生状况、提高农民生活质量的重要基础设施建设。建设一个8立方米的户用沼气池，年产沼气385立方米，可满足3－5口之家一年80%的生活燃料需求。农村沼气年产量达164亿立方米（约为全国天然气年消费量的13%），相当于替代1840万吨左右标准煤，可减排二氧化碳5000多万吨，有利于促进全国控制温室气体排放行动目标的实现。特别值得强调的是，农村沼气年均生产有机沼肥近4亿吨，通过推广以沼气为纽带的“猪－沼－果（菜、粮、茶）”、“四位一体”和“五配套”等能源生态循环模式，可减少20%以上农药、化肥施用量，改良土壤8000万亩，有利于推动生态养殖业和高效种植业发展。
户用沼气实现了庭院美化、厨房亮化、圈厕净化，大中型沼气工程则带动了农村面源污染的治理，实现了养殖场畜禽粪污的“内循环、零排放”和向农民集中供气，减少了农民家庭日常支出，使农村劳动力从家务劳动中腾出更多时间学习新技能，拓宽了农民增收渠道。据不完全统计，每年仅沼气施工和服务网点就能使30多万名农民实现就地转移就业。按一户沼气池年均减少燃料、用电、化肥等支出1000元、建设一户户用沼气池需支付工资400元计，4000万户用沼气年可实现节支增收400多亿元，“十一五”期间户用沼气建设为农民增加工资性收入88亿多元。同时，农村沼气在发展“高产、优质、高效、生态、安全”的现代农业以及消除疾病传染源、降低疫病发生率等方面作用日益突显。
国家发改委有关负责人透露，“十二五”期间，中央将进一步加大农村沼气投资力度。同时，综合考虑农民实际困难、物价上涨和资金可能，在现有基础上进一步提高户用沼气补贴标准。进一步优化投资结构，在继续支持户用沼气和小型沼气建设的同时，加大向农户集中供气的大中型沼气工程支持力度，发展“产业沼气”，不断提高沼气发展的综合效益。
农业部有关负责人表示，当前我国农村沼气发展正从解决农村能源和环境卫生的需求向在改变农业农村发展方式中发挥基础性作用转变，从户用沼气建设为主向户用沼气与大中型沼气工程建设并重转变，从分散建设管理向产业化和社会化服务转变，迫切需要在政策、技术、服务、规范以及统筹协调上确定新的原则和措施，以利于农村沼气进一步快速健康发展。“十二五”期间，农业部将按照国家发展绿色经济、建设资源节约型社会和社会主义新农村的总体要求，围绕“巩固成果、优化结构，建管并重、强化服务，综合利用、提高水平”的思路，把农村沼气作为发展现代农业、推进新农村建设，促进节能减排，改善农村环境、提高农民生活水平的一项全局性、战略性、长远性的系统工程，进一步加大建设力度，促进农村沼气发展上规模、上水平，让更多农民受益。同时，也要进一步加强沼气人才队伍建设，加强后续服务管理，建管用并举，确保沼气综合利用效益的全面发挥。积极加强与有关部门的合作，研究建立对沼气科技投入的长效机制，围绕沼气发展的技术瓶颈，开展新产品、新技术、新材料的研发，加快技术转化，全面推进沼气产业化；进一步加强沼气国际合作交流，借鉴德国等沼气发达国家经验，开展沼气工程终端补贴和先建后补改革试点，调动养殖场业主和社会资本投入沼气工程的积极性，推动农村能源走上良性发展轨道。

description.hltext_display: Season to Give: Martha O'Bryan Center adds flood aid to its services
description.content:
Dianne Clayton had come to the realization that whatever FEMA money she would be eligible for to help rebuild her flood-damaged home wouldn't be nearly enough.
"A total roller coaster,'' is how Clayton remembers the months after the flood, trying to get her Inglewood home restored. "I was at my wit's end because I knew I couldn't afford what needed to be done at my house.''
That predicament is similar to many impacted by the flood who were without, or did not have enough, flood insurance.
But one of the many phone calls Clayton made in the months after the flood got her to the Martha O'Bryan Center — an East Nashville-based integrated human services nonprofit that serves more than 4,000 clients each year through early learning education, kindergarten through college youth development, WorkReady job placement and as a family resource center. The O'Bryan Center operates a new Assistance and Outreach to Flood Survivors program that networks volunteer help and other resources to assist flood victims in Davidson County.
'Now I have hope'
Clayton, forced to rent since the flood, called the center and spoke with case manager Miranda Masters in October. She had an appointment the following week and initial work began quickly thereafter through the flood survivors program.
Church organizations with active volunteer disaster relief teams who work on homes and other nonprofits that do home reconstruction, such as Rebuilding Together, are the kind of partners the O'Bryan Center program affiliates with. The volunteer organization, Westminster Presbyterian Disaster Assistance, has worked on Clayton's home.
More extensive rebuilding projects such as Clayton's are done when proper help and resources are available, Masters said.
But the program also directs flood victims to other forms of help such as replacing furniture, clothing, food and other needs. The Community Resource Center has been a source for furniture and mattresses, Masters said.
"What's interesting is that for the first time people who have never had to ask for help are doing it,'' Masters said. "We have homeowners who are hungry now.''

event_or_fact.property: The Community Resource Center has been a source for furniture and mattresses
More extensive rebuilding projects such as Clayton's are done when proper help and resources are available

description.hltext_display: Gesetzliche Konsequenzen nach Schneechaos gesucht
description.content:
Berlin/Frankfurt/Main (dpa) - Das Schneechaos auf vielen Straßen lässt die Rufe nach politischen Konsequenzen lauter werden. Die Deutsche Polizeigewerkschaft (DPolG) forderte ein winterliches Tempolimit für Lastwagen.
Hessens Verkehrsministers Dieter Posch (FDP) plädierte zudem für eine Nachbesserung bei der Winterreifenpflicht für Autos. «Ein M+S-Reifen mit 1,6 Millimeter Profil reicht halt nicht aus», sagte Posch der Nachrichtenagentur dpa.
Spätestens zum nächsten Winter müsse klar definiert werden, was ein Winterreifen im Sinne der Straßenverkehrsordnung ist, mahnte Posch in Frankfurt. Die Kennzeichnung «M+S» sei nicht geschützt und sage nichts über die Wintertauglichkeit der Reifen aus. Weitere Symbole wie die Schneeflocke oder das Bergpiktogramm müssten künftig einheitlich verwendet werden. Darüber hinaus seien auch die Mindestprofiltiefe und die Laufflächenmischung festzuschreiben.
Die Polizeigewerkschaft machte sich dafür stark, dass Lkw bei Schnee und Eis auf allen Straßen höchstens 50 Stundenkilometer fahren dürfen. Außerdem müsse in den Wintermonaten ein generelles Überholverbot für Laster gelten, sagte DPolG-Chef Rainer Wendt in der «Neuen Osnabrücker Zeitung». «Nur so lässt sich bei extremen Wetterverhältnissen verhindern, dass Menschen im Verkehr massenhaft zu Schaden kommen.»
In den vergangenen Tagen war bereits über eine Schneekettenpflicht für Lkw und eine verschärfte Winterreifenpflicht debattiert worden. Der Deutsche Speditions- und Logistikverband (DSLV) sieht hingegen die Räumdienste stärker in der Pflicht und beklagt einen vielerorts nicht ausreichenden Winterdienst.
Während der Städte- und Gemeindebund dafür kürzlich die klammen Kassen der Kommunen verantwortlich gemacht hatte, lässt man dieses Argument beim Deutschen Landkreistag nicht gelten. «Wir sind für die Sicherheit auf den Straßen verantwortlich», betonte Hans-Günter Henneke, Hauptgeschäftsführer beim Landkreistag. Die Aufgabe, für freie Straßen zu sorgen, ist seiner Ansicht nach auch lösbar: «Wir haben keine Katastrophe, wir haben Winter.»

description.hltext_display: 女の子だから・・・ - ひょっとしてトピ主さんの仰りたいことは…。
Failed Apprentice facing court
description.content:
A former contestant in Lord Sugar's hit Apprentice show is due to appearing in court charged with fraud.
Mortgage broker Christopher Farrell will appear before magistrates in Plymouth charged with four counts of fraud by false representation.
Farrell, 29, from The Wirral, Merseyside, was originally arrested in August, shortly before the current series of the BBC 1 show - which finished on Sunday - aired.
The former Royal Marine, who heard "You're Fired" from Lord Sugar in week eight of the show, made a guest appearance on Sunday night's final when he was part of winner Stella English's team creating, marketing and selling an alcoholic drink.
His Apprentice profile said he claims to show no emotion, likes to be pushed and as a former Royal Marine is not afraid to give people a "kick up the backside".
A keen golfer and health and fitness fanatic, he also claims to be "focused and driven".
He told BBC executives: "I've been to the other side of things where friends lose legs, lose limbs, so I know I'm lucky to be where I am.
"I was a sniper in the Royal Marines and I take that killer instinct across into business."

description.hltext_display: Brüderle: Null-Neuverschuldung 2014/2015 möglich
description.content:
Berlin (dpa) - Dank des wirtschaftlichen Aufschwungs kann der Bund nach Einschätzung von Wirtschaftsminister Rainer Brüderle bereits 2014/2015 ohne neue Schulden auskommen.
Sollte sich das Wachstum als robust erweisen, könne die Rückführung der Neuverschuldung auf Null bis dahin realistisch sein, sagte er der «Rheinischen Post». Auch der FDP-Politiker Otto Fricke hält das für realistisch. Voraussetzungen seien neben Wachstum aber eine weiter sinkende Arbeitslosigkeit und eine Stabilisierung des Euro.

description.hltext_display: Lakers' Jackson still down on Christmas games
description.content:
Phil Jackson says humbug to the NBA's Christmas schedule.
The 11-time NBA champion coach restated his longtime opposition to Christmas games Tuesday night before his Los Angeles Lakers faced the Milwaukee Bucks in their final tuneup before Saturday's visit from the Miami Heat.
"It's like Christian holidays don't mean to them anything any more," Jackson said. "Just go out and play and entertain the TV. It's really weird, but it is what it is. We have to go to work and make the best of it."
Jackson is the son of two Christian ministers, and he famously wrote a book on his spiritual growth related to basketball.
The Lakers have played on every Christmas since 1999, including three straight games against the Heat during Shaquille O'Neal's tenure after his trade from Los Angeles. Kobe Bryant has played on Christmas in 13 of his 15 NBA seasons _ not including the 1998-99 season, which didn't begin until the new year due to the lockout.
Jackson hates the Lakers' annual spot in the showcase, noting the NHL and most other major sports usually take Christmas off.
"I don't think anybody should play on Christmas Day," Jackson said. "I don't understand it."
The coach doesn't sound interested in voicing those concerns in person to commissioner David Stern, however.
"He'll see it," Jackson said with a grin.
Jackson also objects to the proliferating number of Christmas games in recent seasons, after many years with a single or two holiday games. The NBA has scheduled five for Saturday, with Bryant's showdown against LeBron James and the revamped Heat at center stage.
Jackson said the timing of the game _ and the 2 p.m. local start time, 5 1/2 hours earlier than the Lakers' usual tip-off _ will reduce its importance.
"It's going to be Christmas, and you're going to have little kids putting batteries in toys and putting their Christmas presents together," Jackson said. "There's all kinds of crazy stuff going on, and now your head has got to get focused on the game, in the middle of the afternoon on Christmas Day."
Jackson believes the Lakers got overly amped about last season's Christmas meeting with the Cleveland Cavaliers, leading to a painful loss that ended with fans throwing dozens of novelty foam hands onto the court. A year earlier, Los Angeles snapped the Boston Celtics' 19-game winning streak in a rematch of the 2008 NBA finals.
Jackson would prefer to see those historic moments on other calendar dates.
"When I was in the CBA, we had a commissioner who scheduled a Christmas Eve game. I had to call him up and say, 'That's the holy time,'" Jackson said. "You just have to keep reminding them that this is a special day."

description.hltext_display: 妊婦気持ちのすれ違い（愚痴） - 私も同じでした。
description.content:
にゃーこ
妊娠4ケ月に入ったばかりの新米妊婦です。
妊娠してから主人と気持ちのすれ違いが増えたように感じます。
主に発端は家事についてです。
私は今はパートをしており8ケ月くらいまでは働く予定でいます。
元々主人にはごみ捨てだけをしてもらっていましたが妊娠を機に少し家事の負担をお願いしました。
しかし私が思う様にはしてくれません。
例えば犬の散歩。安定期に入るまでお願いしましたが、少し残業で遅くなると今日は疲れたから行かない・・・。
犬は大切な家族です！特にうちの犬の犬種は運動量が多く毎日散歩に行かないとストレスが溜ります。
見かねた私が行かないのを前提として（残業の日は）行きます。
別に一生行ってと頼んでる訳でもないのになぜたった1ケ月間の事が出来なのかとイライラしてしまいます。
その他もつわりが一切ないせいか妊娠前と何も変わらず、横で掃除をしてようが洗濯をしてようが皿洗いをしてようが手伝う素振は一切
ありません。
疲れて横になっていても休んでなよ！と言いつつ自分はゲームです。
せめてお米をといでセットしてくれるぐらい出来るでしょうとついつい思ってしまいます。
そして溜っていたものが爆発し喧嘩になりました。もう2回目です。
私も言い方がキツイので主人もイラッとしてしまうのでしょうが、もう少し気を使ってくれてのいいなになぁとガッカリしてしまいます。
確かにお金を稼いでくれているのは主人です。
でもも少し思いやりがほしいものです。
ユーザーID：7021124434
お気に入り登録数：0
古いレス順
レス数：5本
タイトル
投稿者
ぴよたまご
2010年12月22日 11:33
生後３カ月の赤ちゃんがいます。
妊娠中、私も仕事をしていましたが、夫は「無理しないで」というものの、具体的に何もせず、PCに向かっていましたね。つわりの辛さなんて全然わからないみたいで、吐いていてもテレビ見て笑ってたり。料理も「手を抜いていいよ」といいつつ、餃子をリクエストしたり！んな、臭いのきついもの作れないつーの。
文句をいうのはあきらめて、ガンガン手を抜きました。料理は冷凍食品やお弁当ばかりでした。掃除もほとんどしませんでした。さすがに、何週間目かで「掃除してないから体がかゆい気がする」と訴えてきましたが、だったら自分で掃除機かければいいのにね。
これを教訓に私はあえて里帰りしませんでした（帝王切開だったのですが）。里帰りすると夫は子育ても参加しないだろうと思ったので。
私を心配してくれた義母が、夫に「妻を手伝え」とガンガンメールしてくれたのと、貧血で真っ青と傷口をかばってヨタヨタあるく私を前に夫も子育てに積極的に参加せざるを得なかったようで、今のところ妊娠中何もしなかった夫とは別人のように子育てにかかわってくれてます！

description.hltext_display: Desharnais has four points, Sanford stops 38 shots as Bulldogs blank Aeros
description.content: Sanford was particularly impressive in the second period, when he was shelled with 23 shots and stopped them all. Desharnais now leads the AHL with 40 points (10 goals, 30 assists). Dustin Boyd, Olivier Fortier and Ryan Russell also scored for Hamilton (19-9-4), which leads the North Division by six points over Toronto. Houston starting goaltender Anton Khudobin allowed all five goals on 17 shots before being replaced at the 13:02 mark of the second period. Matt Hackett stopped all 12 shots he faced in relief for the Aeros (16-15-3). The Bulldogs opened the scoring at 9:12 of the first period. Boyd grabbed the rebound of a Brendon Nash shot and fired it past Khudobin. Hamilton went up 2-0 at 11:26 of the first while on a power play. Gabriel Dumont received a pass from Desharnais before centring the puck to the front of the net. Fortier skated up and whacked the puck past Khudobin. Desharnais gave Hamilton a 3-0 lead at 12:59. Russell fed the puck to Desharnais, who ripped a shot that sailed over the right shoulder of Khudobin. Russell increased the Hamiltons lead to 4-0 at 2:51 of the second period, then Desharnais scored his second short-handed goal of the game at 6:58. Desharnais stickhandled past Khudobin and scored, ending the goaltenders night.

description.hltext_display: Bruce Levy sues forensics company for $5 million
description.content:
Nashville's former chief medical examiner is suing the company he once worked for, saying they reneged on an exit deal worth about $1.6 million when he left the business.
In dispute is whether Dr. Bruce Levy resigned or was terminated in March, shortly after he was arrested on a marijuana possession charge in Mississippi, and what, if anything, he's entitled to for his 14 percent stake in the company. Levy is suing his former employer, Forensic Medical, demanding more than $5 million in pay, benefits and damages in Davidson County Chancery Court.
John Voigt, attorney for Forensic Medical, said they had only just received the lawsuit Tuesday and were still reviewing it. Levy's attorney, Kenneth Jones, declined to comment.
The suit stems from Levy's trouble in March, when authorities intercepted a package of marijuana bound for his Madison County, Miss., hotel room. Authorities said they searched his room and found more marijuana, some of it in evidence bags from the Metro Medical Examiner's Office, leading to Levy being charged with official misconduct in Tennessee.
According to the lawsuit, Levy quickly worked out an exit deal with Forensic Medical's parent company, Associated Pathologists, where he would resign but retain his salary for a month, some benefits and he would receive up to $1.5 million for his 14 percent stake in the company. But shortly after Levy sent in his resignation, Forensic Medical responded that the company's board had already expelled him and that he would receive nothing of the sort, according to court filings.
More accusations lobbed
Letters between Jones and Voigt also indicate that Forensic Medical had accused Levy at one point of receiving "unauthorized compensation and benefits" and allowing other doctors within the company to receive the same. Levy's attorney denied the accusation in a letter to Forensic Medical, pointing out that a $50,000 bonus he received in January was actually part of his 2009 bonus.
The letters do not elaborate on the accusations.
Levy has since gone into a pretrial diversion program in Mississippi and recently pleaded guilty to official misconduct in Tennessee, in connection with the marijuana having been taken from an evidence locker. If he completes his probation, both charges will be removed from public view.
In another court case, Levy indicated that he was courting clients to continue consulting on forensics matters with a new company he has formed.
Forensic Medical maintains its contract in Nashville and Mississippi and recently promoted longtime Deputy Medical Examiner Amy McMaster to the agency's top spot.

description.hltext_display: Explosão em obra da transposição deixa 3 mortos
description.author: Agência Estado
description.content:
Uma explosão no início da noite de ontem no lote 12 do canteiro de obras da transposição do Rio São Francisco, no município de Sertânia, a 316 quilômetros do Recife, provocou a morte de três trabalhadores. Outros 10 ficaram feridos, três deles em estado grave. De acordo com o delegado de plantão da área, Édson Augusto Lins de Andrade, até as 23 horas os corpos ainda não haviam sido removidos do local, aguardando a chegada de peritos do Instituto de Criminalística. "Somente depois da perícia, os corpos serão removidos para o Instituto de Medicina Legal (IML) de Caruaru", afirmou ele.
Inquérito policial será instaurado para investigar de que forma ocorreu a explosão, o tipo de explosivo usado e se houve algum tipo de negligência. Lins de Andrade preferiu não especular sobre o que teria motivado o acidente. Cauteloso, disse que qualquer informação seria "precipitada antes do laudo pericial".
A área foi isolada por bombeiros e policiais civis. Os feridos foram socorridos para o Hospital de Sertânia. Em estado grave, três deles foram removidos para o hospital de Arcoverde, na região. O canteiro de obras integra o Eixo leste da transposição, - uma das principais obras do governo federal - que terá 220 quilômetros de canais que irão captar água do rio em Itaparica (BA) para abastecer o agreste de Pernambuco e Paraíba. O Eixo Norte terá 400 quilômetros e vai captar água em Cabrobó (PE) para abastecer o sertão de Pernambuco, Paraíba, Ceará e Rio Grande do Norte. A previsão é de que na sua totalidade, quando concluída, a obra irá beneficiar 12 milhões de pessoas nos quatro Estados.

description.hltext_display: 子供のカサカサ肌 - 皮膚炎？
description.content:
うちの長男が乾燥肌？というか、一部分だけ肌がカサカサになるんです。
鼻と目の下くらいのカサカサが酷くて、皮膚科に行ってヒルドイドソフト軟膏を処方してもらい、塗ってますが、一向にカサカサが改善されません。
（普通のカサカサというか、パリパリに近いかも）
乾燥肌＆敏感肌なお子様をお持ちも方、乾燥する季節はどんなことをしてますか？
何かよい薬や保湿剤を知ってたら教えてください！
なんでも良いので、色々教えてください！
後、よい皮膚科の見分け方なども聞きたいです。
私は皮膚科にお世話になることが無かったタイプなので、わからないんです。
それとも皮膚科に行かずかかりつけの小児科に行った方がよいのか？とも悩み中です。
長男は６歳、年長さんです。
ユーザーID：0761925130
お気に入り登録数：5
古いレス順
レス数：3本
タイトル
投稿者
超感想肌
2010年12月21日 12:30
私自身が超乾燥肌で、長年冬場の乾燥には苦しんできました。
そんな私の息子（３歳）は私以上の乾燥肌です。
ヒルドイドソフトは子供に処方されることが多い保湿剤のようですが、個人的には保湿力が低いように感じます。
息子の場合はお風呂あがりにかなりべったりと塗っても、翌朝にはまた乾燥してかゆがってました。
なので今は違う保湿剤を塗っています。
最近、顔はベビーバーユを塗っています。
これだと夜まで保湿が効いてていい感じです。
口に入っても大丈夫な成分なので、お子さんにはいいと思いますよ。
小さいタイプも売ってるので、お試しもしやすいのではないでしょうか？
ユーザーID：7718871152
なみえ
2010年12月22日 7:20
薬を変えられたらいかがですか？同じ病院でもいいし、病院をかえてみてもいいと思います。合うものはつけたら、数日間で治ると思います。病院行くことをオススメします。治ったら、毎日の保湿をしっかりとです。うちは皮膚科のクリームを親子で顔、体に使ってます。安い上乾燥知らずです。毎年悩んでたのが嘘のよう！！

description.hltext_display: Foodies fight with film school for space in LA
挑戦者「亀田大に勝つために来た」／ＢＯＸ
Quick makes 23 saves, Brown has 4 points as the Kings top Avalanche 5-0.
description.content: Jonathan Quick stopped 23 shots for his third shutout of the season, Dustin Brown had two goals and two assists, and the Kings beat Colorado 5-0 on Tuesday night to end the Avalanches six-game winning streak. "This might have been the best 60 minutes weve played all year," Quick said. It came at a good time for the Kings, who won three times on their five-game road trip. All three wins were by five goals, including a 5-0 win at Detroit on Dec. 13. "Overall this trip was a tough one with the teams we were playing," Brown said. "We were a little disappointed in our efforts, especially in St. Louis and Chicago, but looking back, taking three out of five isnt bad." Rob Scuderi had a goal and an assist, Brad Richardson scored a goal, and Anze Kopitar and Drew Doughty had two assists apiece for the Kings. Craig Anderson had 27 saves for Colorado, which was shut out for the first time this season. The last time the Avalanche were blanked was a 3-0 loss at Los Angeles on Feb. 13 ? a span of 55 games. "Theyre probably one of the top-ranked power plays and the highest-scoring offence in the league, and at times they did get pressure, but we still managed to keep the scoring chances to a minimum," Quick said. Colorado leads the NHL with 121 goals but couldnt solve Quick or the Kings. Los Angeles didnt give the Avalanche many opportunities, and the chances they had were gobbled up. "Quickie had to make maybe two really difficult saves, and he made them," Brown said. "That might have been our best 60 minutes, especially on the defensive side of the puck." The Kings took a 1-0 lead in the first period on Scuderis first of the season. Anderson saved Scuderis initial shot from the point, but the puck ricocheted to the right circle where Scuderi picked it up and slid a backhander past Anderson with 7:34 left. "I think he had three or four shots on that shift," Kings coach Terry Murray said. "You keep putting pucks to the net, a lot of traffic, you find a way to get it done." It stayed that way until early in the second period. Doughty took a shot from the top of the right circle that Richardson deflected past Anderson with the blade of his stick to make it 2-0 with 13:29 remaining. It was Richardsons fifth goal, and fourth against Colorado. "Hes a bit of an Avs killer, I guess," Brown said. Both goalies made big saves. Quick stopped Matt Duchene on a chance midway through the second, and Anderson made key stops late in the period. The last came on Kopitars shot from the left with a minute remaining in the period. Duchene nearly spoiled the shutout midway through the third but his wrist shot from the left circle rattled off the post. Quick covered the rebound. "Their goalie played very well for them," Duchene said. "He made some huge saves, and they got some bounces, too. Its a tough loss." Brown iced the game with two goals in the third period, his 12th and 13th. Justin Williams scored a power-play goal with 2:11 left, his 12th goal of the season. "We didnt dictate the type of game that we wanted," Colorado coach Joe Sacco said. "They did." NOTES: St. Louis is the only team that hasnt been shut out this season. ... Brown has 22 points in 20 games. ... The Avalanche had scored at least three goals in their previous eight games. ... Scuderis goal was his first since Oct. 4, 2008, when he was with Pittsburgh.

We didnt dictate the type of game that we wanted; They did.

I think he had three or four shots on that shift; You keep putting pucks to the net, a lot of traffic, you find a way to get it done.

Overall this trip was a tough one with the teams we were playing; We were a little disappointed in our efforts, especially in St. Louis and Chicago, but looking back, taking three out of five isnt bad.

description.hltext_display: Bieber spendeert Kerstmis met familie
description.content:
ADHESE IMU (in artikel) - 2K - NIET VERWIJDEREN
ADHESE TEXTLINK - NIET VERWIJDEREN
Alles over
De tienersensatie kijkt erg uit naar de feestdagen
Justin Bieber kijkt, in tegenstelling tot Lady GaGa, erg uit naar de kerstperiode met zijn familie. De tienersensatie bracht het afgelopen jaar vooral door op de weg en hij kan amper wachten om terug huiswaarts te keren naar Canada om de feestdagen met zijn geliefden door te brengen. Hij zei: 'Wat staat er aan de top van mijn verlanglijstje? Dat ik de feestdagen mag vieren met mijn familie.' Bieber is er dan ook van overtuigd dat hij door zijn goede gedrag doorheen het jaar, vele kerstcadeautjes zal krijgen. 'Ben ik stout geweest of braaf? Ik zie mezelf graag als braaf', grapte Justin. Justin kon terugkijken op zijn succes van het voorbije jaar terwijl hij zijn autobiografie First Step 2 Forever: My Story neerpende. Hij vond het naar eigen zeggen een superervaring, omdat hij zich op die manier erg close voelde met zijn fans: 'Het boek was echt cool, omdat ik in staat was om mensen mee te nemen in mijn wereld en in mijn gedachten.'

description.hltext_display: Euro/franco in caduta libera. Ergo: cala la fiducia sull'Eurozona
description.content:
Il cross considerato un benchmark che misura il sentiment degli operatori verso l'Europa. Al momento nessun motivo per sperare. La rottura di nuovi supporti spiana la strada per ulteriori ribassi. Causati anche dalle vendite dei titoli europei.
Fonte: FXCM ITALIA
Commentato: 0 volte

Così così

0%
VOTA
INVIA
STAMPA
NEWSLETTER
SCRIVI A WSI
(WSI)- Sebbene le borse asiatiche si muovano in maniera altalenante da inizio settimana, arrivano buone notizie dal Giappone. Tutti siamo al corrente delle varie problematiche che stanno affliggendo l’economia mondiale e che stanno avendo effetti più o meno diretti sul mercato dei cambi.
Ebbene, quando si creano degli squilibri di medio periodo sul mercato valutario, uno dei primi effetti si verifica sul commercio internazionale. A volte, l’eccessiva svalutazione o forza di una valuta, rispetto ad altre divise mondiali, può portare ad avere benefici piuttosto che problemi all’economia interna del Paese interessato, soprattutto a causa delle esportazioni ed importazioni.
In questa fase, ci troviamo al cospetto di molte situazioni del genere, una delle quali si sta verificando proprio in Giappone, dove sia contro euro, ma soprattutto contro il dollaro americano, lo yen ha raggiunto dei livelli di forza considerati dalla maggior parte degli analisti preoccupanti.
Il fatto che la divisa nipponica sia vista ancora come valuta rifugio dal mercato, ha fatto sì che step by step, durante tutti i periodi in cui l’avversione al rischio ha determinato le mosse degli investitori (che vendevano rischio ed acquistavano safe heaven), si siano raggiunti livelli tali di sopravvalutazione da mettere in pericolo l’unica parte dell’economia giapponese che dal dopoguerra ha tenuto in piedi il paese: le esportazioni.
Se una valuta è forte rispetto a quella che gira nelle nostre tasche, andare ad acquistare nel Paese che detiene questa forza fa sì che si spendano più soldi rispetto a quelli che si sarebbero spesi se il rapporto di cambio tra le due divise fosse stato più bilanciato. Questo, nel momento in cui una delle maggiori entrate per il Paese è rappresentato dalla vendita di beni e servizi all’estero, può minare gli interi equilibri di funzionamento di un Paese.
EurChf – grafico settimanale
In Giappone, il dato sulle esportazioni per il mese di novembre ha fatto segnare un buon +9.1% (si tratta di una rilevazione tendenziale, ossia rispetto al mese di novembre del 2009), in crescita rispetto al +7.8% rilevato in ottobre. Le esportazioni sono cresciute soprattutto verso l’area euro ed in Cina e grandi colossi industriali come Komatsu e Honda prevedono che esse cresceranno ancora nei confronti dei vicini. Questa crescita dell’export è dovuta alla crescita globale, che sta ricominciando ad accelerare, anche se lievemente.
I dati sostanzialmente non malvagi che arrivano dagli Stati Uniti ed il settore manifatturiero che in Cina è cresciuto per il quarto mese di fila, danno buone speranze al Paese del sol levante.
Un’altra situazione che vede una valuta in posizione di forza eccessiva nei confronti dell’euro e del dollaro americano è il franco svizzero. Abbiamo già avuto modo di ragionare sui possibili effetti di questa forza di franchi sull’economia elvetica nella newsletter di ieri, ora vogliamo soltanto notare come siano stati rotti ulteriori supporti dall’EurChf e la strada sembra ormai aperta verso ulteriori indebolimenti della moneta unica, che potrebbero accentuarsi anche a causa delle vendite di titoli di stato europei contestualmente alle vendite di euro contro franchi.
E’ interessante notare sul grafico anche la linea azzurra in sovrapposizione al grafico a candele, che ci mostra l’andamento del UsdChf. Questo ci fa comprendere come la pesantezza dell’euro, durante le ultime settimane, si sia fatta sentire in maniera particolare su EurChf, che può essere, come già sostenuto in precedenza, considerato a nostro parere come un benchmark di fiducia sull’area euro.
Passiamo ora ad osservare la situazione della moneta unica, nei confronti del dollaro americano.
In questo caso è ulteriormente riscontrabile la debolezza evidenziata nei giorni scorsi, con un eurodollaro che gravita nei pressi di 1.31. Ancora una volta ci affidiamo a ciò che ha "funzionato" bene nel recente passato: in questo caso troviamo una possibile resistenza odierna a 1.3180 (più volte supporto e resistenza statica), allargata sino a 1.3225 dalla linea di tendenza negativa che stiamo osservando da qualche giorno, con origine all’inizio di settimana scorsa.
Se la tendenza attuale dell’euro, chiaramente indirizzata a ribasso, nel breve non dovesse essere oltrepassata, ai livelli visti sopra, potremmo assistere ad un ritorno al di sotto di 1.30 figura, precisamente al minimo visto a cavallo tra novembre e dicembre, 1.2970.
Ancora nulla di nuovo è emerso, parlando del cambio UsdJpy. Continuiamo ad insistere sulla tendenza positiva iniziata quasi due mesi fa, che per oggi indica un livello di supporto a 83.45, mentre la resistenza chiave si trova al di sopra di 84.15. Ancora una volta suggeriamo di prestare la massima attenzione poiché il trading range si è ulteriormente ridotto.
Nuova prova di rottura del cambio EurJpy del minimo toccato già lunedì a 109.60. Il rimbalzo perfetto, andato a confermare quanto già visto all’inizio di dicembre, rafforza i valore di questo livello. Anche in questo caso ci dobbiamo ripetere, indicando in 110.50 il livello obiettivo più importante nel breve.
Situazione molto a rischio quella in cui si trova il cable. La pubblicazione infatti delle minute dell’ultima riunione della BoE, oggi alle 10.30 (ore italiane), potrebbe infatti, se dovesse emergere un tono minimamente negativo, far accelerare ulteriormente il movimento negativo iniziato la settimana scorsa: un movimento di questo tenore potrebbe andare a concludere la propria corsa sul livello di minimo visto dal cambio a settembre, 1.53 figura.
Il discorso potrebbe essere differente se, ovviamente, dovessero emergere dei risvolti positivi: in questo caso avremmo l’allontanamento dall’area di ritracciamento di Fibonacci a cui ci stiamo affidando da giorni (1.5490, 38.2% del movimento rialzista compreso fra 1.4225 e 1.63).
Passiamo ad osservare il cambio GbpJpy, dove siamo giunti prossimi al supporto di 129.30-50, minimo di fine novembre e dei primi di dicembre. Il rimbalzo, seppur lieve, registrato sino ad ora potrebbe far ben sperare sulla tenuta di questo livello, che potrebbe ricondurre i prezzi nel breve sino a 130 figura.
Ancora qualche passo in avanti, per il dollaro australiano nei confronti del biglietto verde. Per un definitivo superamento del livello chiave della parità ci attendiamo che tenga il supporto di breve a 0.9940-50.
Concludiamo con il cambio UsdCad, dove abbiamo visto ancora ieri quanto il livello di 1.02 sia sentito dal mercato. Consideriamolo ancora come livello più importante per assistere ad una ripresa del biglietto verde, mentre sino a che non sarà superato estensioni ribassiste in direzione della parità sono sempre dietro l’angolo.

description.hltext_display: Sharks edge Oilers
description.content:
Antero Niittymaki was sharp with 26 saves and helped lead San Jose to a 2-1 win over the Edmonton Oilers at the Shark Tank.
Logan Couture and Dan Boyle scored for the Sharks, who have won three straight and four of their last six games overall. San Jose has now captured nine of its last 10 games against the Oilers.
"We talked about putting a string of wins together," Boyle said. "We really want to win this next one."
Dustin Penner scored for Edmonton, which has dropped three of its last four games.
Nikolai Khabibulin allowed two goals on 30 shots in the losing effort.
The Sharks opened the scoring at the 13:15 mark of the second period on Couture's 18th goal. Ryan Clowe held the puck in the lower portion of the right slot and sent a backhand pass into the crease area for a successful tip- in redirection tally by Couture.
Later in the middle stanza, a power-play tally by Boyle gave the Sharks a two-goal edge. After Ryan Whitney was whistled for holding the stick at 14:48, the Sharks went to work in their offensive zone with the extra skater but several scoring attempts were thwarted by Khabibulin.
With time dwindling on the power play, Boyle corralled the puck near the centerpoint, drifted into the high slot and buried a wrist shot that made its way through heavy traffic and into the back of the cage with 3:17 remaining before the second intermission.
Penner's 11th goal cut Edmonton's deficit in half with 1:59 to play in regulation -- with an extra attacker on the ice in favor of Khabibulin -- with a deflection goal from in close, but the Sharks used several late clears and held on for the win.
"It's just one of those special teams games that's been killing us for awhile now," Whitney said.
Game Notes
San Jose was 1-for-4 on the power play, while Edmonton failed to score on either of its power-play chances...It was Boyle's fourth goal...Couture continued his lead atop the rookie list for goal scoring. He also now holds sole possession of the top spot for points among rookies with 25.

description.hltext_display: Culturele manifestatie Centree ook in 2011
description.content:
ZIERIKZEE - Het bestuur van stichting Centree heeft besloten om culturele manifestatie Centree voort te zetten in 2011, ondanks het feit dat de Gemeente Schouwen-Duiveland afziet van enige vorm van financiële en bemoedigende steun voor Centree.
Het bestuur vindt dat Centree buitengewoon belangrijk is voor de 'BE-LEEFbaarheid' van Schouwen-Duiveland en Zierikzee in het bijzonder. Een duurzaam cultuurplein met een structureel karakter is het doel. De locaties die hierbij gebruikt worden zijn het plein bij de Nieuwe Kerk, de Nieuwe Kerk zelf, de Weverij en de Dikke Toren. Het behoud daarvan en het aftasten van nieuwe functies van het cultureel erfgoed zijn belangrijke doelstellingen voor Centree. Daarom wil de stichting ook haar steentje bijdragen aan de ontwikkeling van de Nieuwe Kerk. "Alle investeringen van de afgelopen vijf jaren en de al behaalde resultaten brengen de verantwoordelijkheid met zich mee om de ingeslagen weg te vervolgen" aldus het bestuur van Centree.

description.hltext_display: 夫への朝ごはん - 夫のお世話て…
description.content:
毎朝大体、５時くらいに息子が起き、授乳→抱っこをし、寝たらそのまま私も寝ます（寝てくれているうちに私も睡眠をとっておこうと）
そうすると６時くらいに夫が起きるのですが、朝ごはんやお世話ができません。がんばってすればいいのですが、やはり寝れるうちに寝ておこうと思い寝てしまいます。
その後、大体９時〜１０時位に息子が起き、一緒に起きるというペースで過ごしています。
起きた後、やはり夫が残した食器類などを見ていると、やっぱりお世話した方がいいかな・・と罪悪感がせまってきてしまいます。
同じようなご家族の方々は、旦那様の朝ごはんや朝のお世話などはどうしていらっしゃいますか？？

そんな時妻が「ありがとう」「ごめんね」「いってらっしゃい！」と言ってくれるだけで満足でした。
そんな大変な時期もあともう少しですから感謝と笑顔をみせてください。

主さま偉いです。
でも、寝れる時に寝るのも重要ですから
だんな様には思っている事を伝えて
ごめんね
で良いのではないでしょうか。
子育て頑張ってください！

第2子妊娠中です。
一人目の時は
トピさんと似たようなパターンでしたが
朝ごはんとお弁当作ってました。
あとは昼間
寝こけてましたね
でも寝られるうちに
寝ておきたい時期なので
そこは旦那さんに
ちょっとだけガマンして
貰っていいのでは？
それでも気になるなら
朝ごはんは作っておいて
ごめんねのメモでも
添えておくとか…
ウチはどちらかというと
三人で寝てたので
夜中の授乳の度に一緒に起きられて
寝不足と言うので
別室に行け!と
言ったにもかかわらず
やめないので
結局一緒に起きてしまう
パターンでしたが。
ダンナさんは
どういう風に言ってるのでしょうか？

タマタク
2010年12月21日 17:37
今一歳四ヶ月の男の子がいます。私も出産してから子供が夜中に何度も起きて寝不足なので朝起きませんでした。朝食は夫に昨晩多めに作っておいた味噌汁をあたためてもらい、魚を焼いて食べてもらっていましたよ。幸い料理好きな夫なので苦ではなかったようです。
ユーザーID：4602266051
私の20年前と同じ
2010年12月21日 17:48
朝の授乳後だけがんばって起きて、朝ごはんにつきあっていました。
子供が寝なければそれもよしで、夫に子供をみてもらいます。
（面倒をみるというのじゃなくて、子供と接する時間）
泣いてても、それだけたいへんだなーとわかってくれるので
いいですよ。
そのかわり、夜は起きていられません・・
それでも、朝がんばっているおかげで、夜は寝ていてもいたわってくれます。
朝ごはんか、夜ごはんのどちらか、
ご主人と相談してみて、ご主人が望む方だけがんばってみてはいかが？
あとは、「ごめんね〜幼稚園にいったらもうパパ中心だからね、それまでがまんしてね」などと
期間限定なんだよ、ほんとはあなたが一番好き、と毎日毎日伝えていました。
浮気防止、ですね。
一日一回の夫へのお勤め？と
ごめんね〜、の言葉であとは一日自由でいられて家庭円満になるなら、
軽い軽い、と思っていました。
ユーザーID：7003832519
ゆかな
2010年12月21日 18:15
夫は成人していて、しかも五体満足なのでしょう？
どうお世話が必要なのでしょうか。
お世話をされないと、生きていけない人なんですか？
あなたは自分のお子さんの面倒をみればいいのですよ。
夫も世話をされる側ではなく、する側なのです。
ご飯くらい適当に食べて行ってもらって、出来れば食器なども
ザッと洗ってもらい、あまり手がかからないように勤めて貰いましょう。
そういう考え方に、逆に驚きです。
ユーザーID：6712613690
雪ん子
2010年12月21日 19:03
思い出しました。しませんでした。
産後一ヶ月は私の母が来てくれ、私の睡眠が第一と支度してくれました。
母が帰ってからは主人は朝食抜きで私を起こさぬように出勤！
第二子のときは、主人が上の子と朝食取ってましたねぇ。文句ひとつ言わずに。私は昼夜逆転で寝ていて。
嗚呼主人よ、ありがとう！
ユーザーID：8808606628
朝寝坊妻
2010年12月21日 22:27
子供が生まれてから夫から「大変そうだから用意しなくていい」と言ってもらったので、何も用意してません。
夫が一人で飲み物とパンとヨーグルトで簡単に済ませてくれています。
お弁当も夜のうちに用意して冷蔵庫に入れておくと勝手に持って行ってくれているので朝弱い私は夫に感謝しています。
トピ主さん、ご主人がどう思われているのか聞いてみられましたか？
案外、一人の時間楽しんでおられるかもしれませんよ？（うちはそうです）
食器くらい、トピ主さんが起きてから洗えばいいのですから気にしなくていいのでは？
育児、大変な時期ですからお体お大事に。
ユーザーID：0500775507
息子二人
2010年12月21日 22:58
主人は朝はしっかり食べるので、ちゃんと作っていました。
うちは完全母乳で、２〜３時間毎に起きて授乳でした。
長男は夏産まれでしたので、朝は、６時〜６時半に起きてました。
寝室は２階で台所は一階だったので、一緒に抱っこして連れて行きました。
赤ん坊をスイングチェアーに乗せて料理していました。
長男の時には昼寝を一緒にしたりして睡眠時間を確保していました。
その後平屋に引っ越し、次男が産まれたのですが、次男は１２月産まれのせいもあり、８時に自分で起きるまで寝ていました。
長男は早起きが癖になり、今家族で一番の早起きです。
８時〜９時に寝て、５時半〜６時には起きています。
次男は子供の頃の癖なのか、お寝坊さんになりました。
８時〜９時に寝て、６時半〜７時すぎに起きています。
寒い時期で辛いですが、早起き、親子、夫婦共に大切なような気がします。
ご主人の帰宅時間が遅くて大変なのでしょうか？
無理せず、少しずつ頑張ってみてはいかがですか？
ユーザーID：2017503275
imagine
2010年12月22日 0:06
妊娠出産育児とフル回転の日々なのでしょう。眠れる時に眠って気力体力温存もやむを得ないと思います。
ご主人は文句なく朝の身支度や朝ご飯を自分でやっているなら、そのまま甘えても良いと思いますよ。
常識ある男なら、妻は日々臨戦態勢で夫よりも子供に注力するのは仕方ないとわきまえているはずです。
ただ、時にはご主人が不満に思う時もあるかもしれません。
あまりに「今は赤ちゃんに掛かりきりだから夫の面倒なんて見れなくて当然よ。仕方ないでしょ。」みたいな態度を振りかざされるのも嫌なものです。
ですから、日頃妻を起こすことなく朝の支度をしていってくれるご主人に感謝やお詫びの気持ちを、時には言葉にして伝えると良いと思います。
思っているだけでは伝わらないかもしれなので、言葉できちんと伝えることで「僕の方にも気持ちを向けてくれているのだな」という満足感をご主人に与えることができると思うのですね。
このような後ろ盾があればこそ、ご主人もさらに奥様を思いやり、自分の出来ることは自分でするなど、協力する気持ちが強くなると思います。

description.hltext_display: Seattle ships C Rob Johnson to San Diego
description.content:
The Seattle Mariners have traded catcher Rob Johnson to the San Diego Padres for a player to be named later or cash considerations.
Seattle and San Diego made the deal on Tuesday.
Johnson had been designated for assignment by the Mariners on Dec. 13 after the Mariners signed designated hitter Jack Cust and needed a spot on the 40-man roster.
Johnson was Seattle's opening day starter behind the plate in 2010 but his struggles at the plate eventually led to his demotion to Triple-A Tacoma. The 28-year-old Johnson played in 61 games last season with Seattle, but hit just .191.
He also struggled with an American League-high nine passed balls in less than a half-season.
Johnson never played for the Mariners after Aug. 1. In 18 games at Tacoma, Johnson hit .297.
Johnson was originally the Mariners' fourth-round pick in 2004 and played parts of four seasons in Seattle.

description.hltext_display: คืบหน้าอุบัติเหตุรถนักท่องเที่ยวไทยคว่ำในมาเลเซีย
description.content:
ความคืบหน้าของอุบัติเหตุ รถทัวร์ท่องเที่ยวชาวไทยในมาเลเซียพลิกคว่ำยอดผู้เสียชีวิตอยู่ที่ 27 คน เป็นชาวไทย 25 คน มาเลเซีย 2 คน โดยนาย "จุรินทร์ ลักษณวิศิษฎ์" รัฐมนตรีว่าการกระทรวงสาธารณสุข เปิดเผยว่า มีผู้ได้รับบาดเจ็บ 10 ราย อยู่ที่โรงพยาบาล"ราชาสมัยซูหลี" โดยล่าสุด ผู้บาดเจ็บได้ออกจากโรงพยาบาลแล้ว 4 คน เหลือ 6 คน และอยู่ในไอซียู 1 คน เบื้องต้นได้มีการส่งทีมแพทย์ จากโรงพยาบาลหาดใหญ่เข้าไปดูแลแล้ว ส่วนรายชื่อผู้เสียชีวิตที่ได้รับการเปิดเผย คือ นางมะลิวัลย์ เมฆมหาพรหม วัย 53 ปี และสามี นาง"ณัฐิยา อินทร์ยิ้ม"อายุ 50 ปี ส่วนนาง"ธัญวรัตน์ พูลแสง" ได้รับบาดเจ็บ ซึ่งทั้งหมดเป็นเจ้าหน้าที่ของกระทรวงสาธารณสุข
นาย"ธานี ทองภักดี" รองอธิบดีกรมสารนิเทศ เปิดเผยว่า ในวันนี้เวลา 8 นาฬิกาเครื่องบินซี 130 ของกองทัพอากาศจะเดินทางออกจากสนามบิน บน.6 พร้อมกับรองอธิบดีกรมการกงสุล เจ้าหน้าที่กระทรวงการต่างประเทศ คณะแพทย์ และตัวแทนของญาติพี่น้องคนไทยที่บาดเจ็บ และเสียชีวิตรายละ 1 คน ไปยังมาเลเซีย เพื่อรับศพ และผู้บาดเจ็บ ที่สามารถเคลื่อนย้ายกลับประเทศได้ โดยญาติสามารถติดต่อได้ที่ กองคุ้มครอง และดูแลผลประโยชน์ของคนไทยในต่างประเทศ หมายเลข 02-575-1050
ส่วนค่าใช้จ่ายในการรักษาพยาบาล และญาติๆ ที่เดินทางไปเยี่ยม ทางการมาเลเซียจะออกให้ทั้งหมด โดยทางกองคุ้มครองดูแลผลประโยชน์คนไทยในต่างประเทศ กรมการกงสุล และกระทรวงการต่างประเทศ จะดูแลเรื่องการเรียกร้องค่าสินไหมทดแทนจากอุบัติเหตุในครั้งนี้ด้วย

description.hltext_display: Dead woman was stabbed weeks ago
description.content:
An autopsy revealed that a woman found dead Monday in an apartment unit on Murfreesboro Pike was stabbed.
Police believe Vickie Webb, 19, had likely been dead for weeks before she was discovered by maintenance staff for the apartment complex.
Because of decomposition, positive identification had to be made through dental records. The autopsy today showed the victim did suffer stab wounds.
Webb's family had not heard from her in several weeks, police said.
Her apartment rent was two months overdue, multiple rent notices from management were unanswered, and the electricity to the apartment was turned off.
Hermitage Precinct detectives are pursuing leads in the case. Anyone with information is asked to contact Detective Johnny Crumby or Detective Andrew Injaychock at 862-7727 or Crime Stoppers at 74-CRIME.

description.hltext_display: 'Kruisboogkannibaal' krijgt levenslang
description.content:
ADHESE IMU (in artikel) - 2K - NIET VERWIJDEREN
ADHESE TEXTLINK - NIET VERWIJDEREN
Alles over
Een Britse man die zichzelf de 'kruisboogkannibaal' noemt is dinsdag in Leeds veroordeeld tot een levenslange celstraf voor de moord op drie prostituees.
De 40-jarige Stephen Griffiths pleitte drie keer schuldig voor de rechtbank in Leeds. Rechter Charles Openshaw omschreef de moorden die de man pleegde als 'ziek en monsterlijk'. 'Ik twijfel er niet aan dat de beklaagde een levenslange celstraf verdient', aldus Openshaw.
Griffiths bekende dat hij drie prosituees om het leven bracht. De vrouwen werkten in de buurt van zijn woning in Bradford. De 43-jarige Susan Rushworth verdween in juni 2009. In april van dit jaar werd Shelley Armitage (31) als vermist opgegeven. Griffiths werd uiteindelijk opgepakt na zijn laatste moord in mei. Een bewakingscamera legde toen vast hoe hij Suzanne Blamires (36) om het leven bracht met een kruisboog.
Kannibalisme
Griffiths vertelde na zijn arrestatie dat hij vlees van zijn eerste twee slachtoffers gekookt had. Hij beweerde ook dat hij zijn derde slachtoffer 'rauw' had opgegeten.
De politie vond uiteindelijk 81 stukken van het lichaam van Suzanne Blamires terug in de rivier Aire. In haar schedel zat een mes en een pijl van een kruisboog. In de rivier werden ook delen van het lichaam van Shelley Armitage gevonden. Van het lichaam van Susan Rushworth is nog steeds geen spoor.
Toen Griffiths 17 was viel hij een bewakingsagent van een winkel aan met een mes. Sindsdien werd hij behandeld door verschillende psychiaters, die concludeerden dat hij 'gevaarlijk maar niet ziek' was.

description.hltext_display: ARAY's CyberKnife Extension OKed - Analyst Blog
description.content:
Leading radiosurgery systems maker Accuray Incorporated (ARAY) has secured approval of the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) to market a new component of its CyberKnife VSI robotic radiosurgery System for the treatment of patients with lung cancer.
The approved component, dubbed “Lung Optimized Treatment,” will benefit lung cancer patients who are inoperable or ineligible for invasive treatments. According to Accuray, radiosurgery has been found to be effective for inoperable patients given its ability to offer good local control and survival rates.
Treatment of medically inoperable lung cancer patients is complex due to the movement of tumors (especially central and chest wall tumors) with breathing and their proximity to critical anatomical structures. Radiation oncologists place tiny gold seeds (implanted through incision) called “fiducial markers” for real-time tracking of the tumor position, which help them to deliver therapy while safeguarding surrounding healthy tissues.
However, implantation of fiducial markers is associated with a high risk of pneumothorax (a collapsed lung). Lung Optimized Treatment has been designed to offer physicians an accurate, more flexible and safe therapy alternative for lung cancer patients, especially those who are ineligible for fiducial implantation and are at high risk of pneumothorax. It enables treatment without a single incision while protecting nearby healthy tissues and structures.
As such, CyberKnife radiosurgery with Lung Optimized Treatment offers physicians a non-invasive therapy option while eliminating the need for fiducial markers. Its unique motion management capabilities, including the revolutionary tracking system, enables real-time monitoring and correction of tumors that move with a patient's breathing patterns and those near to critical structures.
California-based Accuray is a global leader in the field of radiosurgery and provides a non-surgical treatment option for patients diagnosed with cancer. In the radiation oncology market, the company competes head-to-head with Varian Medical (VAR) and TomoTherapy (TOMO).
CyberKnife leverages a technology that differentiates it from traditional treatments. It is a non-invasive alternative to traditional surgery and is the first and only commercially available intelligent robotic radiosurgery system designed to treat solid tumors anywhere in the body.
CyberKnife continues to gain significant traction in the global medical communities, thereby boosting Accuray’s sales. Till date, more than 100,000 people have been treated with CyberKnife globally.
Accuray has provided a conservative guidance for fiscal 2011 with a sizable sales deficit, expected to be a drag on the top and bottom lines for the year. Moreover, the CyberKnife system faces stiff challenge from competitive product offerings, especially from Varian.
Currently, we have an Underperform recommendation on the stock. Accuray currently retains a Zacks #5 Rank, which translates into a short-term Strong Sell recommendation.

Man and boy killed in house blaze
description.content:
A man and a young boy have died after a house fire caused by a chip pan left unattended on a cooker, emergency services said.
West Midlands Ambulance Service said both victims were confirmed dead shortly after their arrival at hospital following the blaze in the Lower Stoke area of Coventry.
An ambulance service spokesman said three ambulances and a paramedic officer were sent to the property in Hollis Road after several 999 calls.

description.hltext_display: Once upon a time on Alamosa Ranch.... - As I see it
description.content:
“The one about the trees, the cottonwood trees...”
“Well, it is kind of a sad story.”
“Pleeeeeaaase...”
“OK, I will tell it to you as I heard it at the San Luis Valley Ecosystem Council Board Meeting:
“Once upon a time in the land of the San Luis Valley and in the kingdom of Alamosa there was an area called the Alamosa Ranch. It was owned by the kingdom of Alamosa, which means it was owned by the citizens of Alamosa.
“Over 100 acres of land on the Alamosa Ranch was dedicated as a wildlife area for cottonwood tree regeneration. The area was filled with trees and wildlife, such as deer, birds, raccoons, and, at least one person claims, mountain lions.
“All was quiet and happy in the wildlife area until the boy scout entered the picture.
“Now, it is important to understand that what is happening is not the boy scout’s fault. He was merely looking for a community project to improve the community with the added benefit of allowing him to move up in the scout hierarchy. He had no idea that his idea would result in the degrading of a wildlife area. But I’m getting ahead of myself. Back to the story...
“There was a boy scout looking for a community project to work on. He wanted something that would benefit the young people of the community. Something they didn’t already have. He settled on a Frisbee, or disc, golf course.
“He took his idea to the kingdom of Alamosa governing body and a majority agreed that it was a fine idea. The search was on for an appropriate location for the disc course.
“According to the Professional Disk Golf Association, the Valley already has two disc courses: the Rio Grande River Retreat, Monte Vista, with 18 holes, and the nine-hole Challenger Golf Course in Crestone.
“According to professional disc course designers, one acre per hole is acceptable, so for the proposed 18-hole Alamosa course a 20-acre site would be about right. These experts also note that trees might have to be removed to construct the fairways on the disc course.
“Many citizens of the kingdom of Alamosa were not too happy with the council’s decision to take the 20 acres from the middle of the cottonwood tree regeneration area, but once the kingdom governing body voted for it there was not much they could do except keep an eye on the project.
“Rumors of extending the degradation of the wildlife area beyond the 20 acres of the disc course started surfacing. One group allegedly wants to make the area amenable for cross country track running.
“Even more intrusive is the alleged suggestion that a campground be cut out of the wildlife area.”
The story must have been getting boring because the little one fell asleep.
It is just as well, because the end of this story has not yet been written. It will ultimately be up to the kingdom of Alamosa ruling body, the council members, to vote on how the area will be used.
As elected officials, they should be responsive to the desires of the citizens, the people whose views they are supposed to represent, so it is up to the citizens to let their council representatives know how they want this wildlife area to be used.
It is the responsibility of the citizens to write the end to this story.

description.hltext_display: Community celebrates Congressman Salazar
description.content:
ALAMOSA — More than 70 community members gathered in Alamosa on Sunday, December 19 for a luncheon to celebrate and honor the congressional service of San Luis Valley native son, John Salazar.
Having served three terms as Representative of the Third Congressional District, Salazar is returning to his family ranch near Manassa and looking forward to spending time working the farm and livestock operations.
An outpouring of appreciation for the congressman’s many accomplishments was topped by a letter from President Barack Obama and sent by Colorado Democratic Chair Pat Waak. Read aloud to the gathering by Salazar’s wife Mary Lou, the President thanked Salazar for his service and dedication to Colorado and the nation.
President Obama noted, “As one of only a few people in congress who are currently farmers, you are regarded as a champion of America’s family farmers and our agricultural heartland. You govern with compassion and understanding, seeking to help middle class families to succeed by creating economic opportunities for all Americans. And as a key member of the House Committee on Appropriations, you have been a valuable ally in the fight to get America and our economy back on track. In addition, you are recognized as an unparalleled advocate for military families and veterans in Colorado. Your hard work and dedication to their welfare has resulted in many gains for service members and their families and for those who were able to overcome challenges to access needed benefits.”_
These sentiments were shared by many others on Sunday, as a proclamation from Mayor Kathy Rogers from the City of Alamosa was read by Colorado House District Representative Edward Vigil. A proclamation from Denver Mayor and Governor-Elect John Hickenlooper was read by Senate District 5 Senator Gail Schwartz, honoring Salazar’s accomplishments and contributions to the community and the state and declaring December 19th through 25th to be “Congressman John Salazar Week.”
Senator Mark Udall also sent a letter of appreciation to John Salazar and the entire Salazar family. Udall’s letter expressed a common theme of the day, that he will continue to call upon Salazar in the time ahead to work on shared goals and to help address the issues and opportunities that are important to the region and to Colorado.
Others honoring Salazar included his staffers. Erin Minks who has run the Congressional office in the San Luis Valley for several years, was also singled out with great appreciation for all of her contributions. She listed just a few of the many successes that Salazar achieved on behalf of the Valley, from assistance with the Army Corps of Engineers for the town of Creede, to help for new runway in Rio Grande County, to assistance with the Platoro Reservoir, to establishing potatoes as a specialty crop to help Valley farmers market their produce, to forming a task force to address the shipments of nuclear material through Antonito in Conejos County, and many more.
Former Salazar staffer Sal Pace, who now represents Pueblo and was recently elected to be Minority Leader in the Colorado State House, thanked Salazar for helping him get a start in politics and including him as a member of their extended family.
Joined by many members of the Salazar family, including John’s brother LeRoy and their wives and children, the celebration was a mix of laughter and tears.
While the gathering included a mix of political affiliations, it was hosted by the Alamosa Democratic Committee at Trujillo’s restaurant and Democratic Chair Mike Garcia expressed the group’s appreciation of John Salazar while sharing their disappointment over his loss in the fall election.
Salazar encouraged everyone to be sure to work with their new Representative, Scott Tipton of Cortez. But he also implied that he might just run for the office again in two years, and that he is considering other possible positions in public service where he could continue to contribute to the causes he cares about.
“I will never regret a single vote,” Salazar declared, acknowledging that some of his votes were controversial in his district. While his votes for health care reform and for the stimulus package that brought substantial funds to help sustain Colorado through the economic challenges may have hurt him in the election, he stood up for his belief that they were the right thing to do.
As an Army veteran, working to ban funds for the proposed expansion of the Army base at Pinon Canyon on the eastern plains was an especially difficult choice for Salazar, but he stands by the decision.
The closing of President Obama’s letter summed up the sentiment of the gathering: “I am thankful - and Colorado is lucky - to have had your sound counsel, your energetic support, and your hard work in the United States Congress. I wish you and your family the best of luck in the future. Thank you again for all you have done for the state of Colorado.”

event_or_fact.property: ?As one of only a few people in congress who are currently farmers, you are regarded as a champion of America?s family farmers and our agricultural heartland
some of his votes were controversial in his district.

description.hltext_display: Couture, Boyle score in Sharks 2-1 win over Oilers
description.content: Couture and Dan Boyle scored 3:28 apart in the second period, leading the San Jose Sharks past the Edmonton Oilers 2-1 on Tuesday night. "I dont get to see the others play every other night but for me, hands down hes the best rookie this year," Boyle said of his teammate. "Hes been playing so well and hes a two-way player. He does it on both ends. You can say hes been our best player this year." Antero Niittymaki stopped 26 shots to beat the Oilers for the third time this season and give the Sharks their first three-game winning streak. Dustin Penner scored for the Oilers, who lost for the third time in four games. Nikolai Khabibulin made 28 saves, but Edmontons three-game winning streak on the road ended. Couture scored his fourth goal in three games against fellow NHL rookie of the year contenders Jordan Eberle and Taylor Hall. Eberle had four goals in his previous three games, and Hall had three assists in the Oilers 6-3 victory over Columbus on Thursday. "Hes a great player and hes a go-to guy for a team like the Sharks," Hall said. "That says a lot. He has the puck a lot and hes strong down low." Couture created his own scoring opportunity, stealing the puck from Linus Omark in the neutral zone and executing a give-and-go with Ryane Clowe. Clowe got one defenceman to commit before passing across the crease, giving Couture, who has an NHL-high 10 goals in December, a clean shot to the stick side past Khabibulin. "The guy turned the puck over, and I got it to Ryane," Couture said. "There arent too many players in this league who can make the play he made." The Sharks killed off a 5-on-3 power play midway through the second period. "That was the turning point," Boyle said. Couture drew a penalty at the end of the two-man advantage, leading to both Sharks goals. "When you dont score on a 5-on-3 you dont deserve to win," Oilers defenceman Ryan Whitney said. "All of a sudden its 2-0 and one of them was on a power play." Boyle scored a power-play goal after skating into the slot and firing a shot past Khabibulin, who was screened by Dany Heatley. Joe Thornton earned an assist to give him six against Edmonton in three games this season. The Sharks scored a power-play goal for a fourth straight game, their longest streak since opening the season with a six-game run. Penner, who has at least one point in five of six games, scored on a redirect from Whitney. Whitney has a team-high 25 points, all assists. NOTES: Boyle set the franchise record for most power-play goals by a defenceman with his 17th. ... Jacques returned after being a healthy scratch the previous two games. ... Sharks D Doug Murray took part in the morning skate but sat out a fifth straight game because of a lower back injury. ... The Oilers have won seven games in which Hall has recorded a point. He has recorded a point in 12 of 13 overall. ... Clowe has at least one point in nine of 12 games.
