description.hltext_display: 公司称“教师证不用考” 一群求职者钱财打水漂
description.content:
拿到教师资格证，就向当“老师”的梦想迈进了一大步。为了拿到这张证书，李小姐向长沙彼岸教育咨询有限公司(以下简称彼岸教育机构)交了3600元钱，然而时过一年，她不仅没能等来证书，这笔钱也很可能打了水漂。21日，在该公司紧闭的大门外，她发现，有同样遭遇的人还不少。 学员留下手机号欲联合举报
21日上午，长沙市韶山北路，兴威名座30楼，长沙彼岸教育机构的大门紧闭。门边的墙上，有人用笔写着“骗子”、“请上当同学一起举报”等字样，不远处留着手机号码或QQ。
学会计的李小姐去年大专毕业，她希望今后能当名老师。她告诉记者，毕业前夕，她见有人在学校附近发传单，说通过彼岸教育机构能很顺利拿到教师资格证，去年10月，她交了3600元报名费，工作人员发了两本教育学和心理学的辅导书，“当时，他们说，到时会提前通知我去参加考试，去年年底，他们又说，不用考试了，今年会把资格证书给我办下来，让我别关手机，保持联络通畅。”李小姐信以为真，不料，一直等到现在，证书还没影，她这才急了，21日，找到这家公司，才发现大门紧闭。21日，同样吃了闭门羹的还有小薇(化名)等3人。
“和我一样上当且知道名字的学员就有5个，交了1800元至3600元不等的报名费。”小薇说，大家都是最近找公司退钱时认识的。
都是冲不用考试能拿证来的
“听工作人员说不用考试也有办法拿到证书后，尽管我也知道这是弄虚作假，但犹豫过后，还是去报了名。” 小薇说，交了2700元后，去年10月，她去上了两天课，“当时，和我一起上课的，有近200人，除长沙市的，还有不少是外地人。估计，还有不少人现在还蒙在鼓里呢。”
小薇说，培训、体检后，她多次拨打任某(负责接待)的手机，“他开始也是让我等，最后他就不接电话了。有一次，我给他打电话时偷偷录了音，他答应退还2700元钱。”小薇说，交钱后，对方连张收费票据都没给她开。
公司：想退钱还要再等
兴威物业公司张主任告诉记者，这家公司目前还欠下了960元物业管理费，他也无法联系上负责人。
下午，记者终于拨通了任某的手机，接电话的人显得很警惕，他称任某已经辞职了，自己姓唐，前不久才开始接手任某的工作，“你是我们的学员吗？如果还没拿到证书，想退钱的话，还要再等等。”当记者亮明身份，他立即称，公司只是对学员进行培训，学员必须通过考试才能拿到证书。至于为何去年交钱的学员今年还没培训、还没参加考试？他说，不清楚情况、不方便向记者透露。记者再问其他情况，他都沉默以对。
部门说法
工商：
这家公司无培训资质
记者从长沙市工商局雨花分局了解到，长沙彼岸教育机构于2008年6月份取得工商登记核准，股东为杨某和黄某，法人代表是其中的杨某，经营范围是教育咨询、市场调查、企业形象策划。
在得知李小姐等人的遭遇后，雨花分局注册登记科蒋主任很重视。在仔细查看了长沙彼岸教育机构的工商注册登记等相关资料后，她告诉记者，这家公司没有培训资质，却收取了学员教师资格证报考费并进行培训，这些行为已属超范围经营，工商部门可以查处。三湘都市报

description.hltext_display: BB&T's Ratings Lowered by Moody's - Analyst Blog
description.content:
On Monday, BB&T Corp.’s (BBT) senior debt and long-term deposit ratings were downgraded by Moody's Investors Service, the ratings arm of Moody's Corp. (MCO), as a result of concerns related to the company’s weaker credit profile.
Moody’s cut BB&T’s long-term deposit rating to “A1” from “Aa3” and senior debt rating to “A2” from “A1”. The ratings agency also lowered the company’s banking subsidiary’s unsupported bank financial strength rating to “B-” from “B”.
Moody’s lowered the ratings in spite of BB&T’s sustained profitability and consolidating capital ratios over the last three quarters. According to the ratings agency, the company faces a number of challenges – shift from real estate to other assets, more reliance on the wholesale funding and credit costs from commercial real estate portfolio – reflecting weaker credit quality.
Though BB&T’s growth in several portfolios have remained above average compared with many other regional banks, Moody’s observed that simultaneous fast paced growth in multiple assets can be very difficult to manage for the company and the bondholders are, thus, exposed to incremental risk.
However, Moody’s have confirmed its short-term ratings for BB&T and its subsidiary at “Prime-1”, observing the outlook as stable. Moody’s also commented that BB&T remains a well-managed company by reporting positive results through the financial crisis.
On December 14, Fitch Ratings affirmed the long-term and short-term issuer debt ratings (IDRs) of BB&T at “A+” and “F1”, respectively, reflecting the company’s strong fundamentals. Fitch also revised its outlook to “Stable” from “Negative”, expecting the company to use its position in the banking sector to pursue acquisitions as the industry consolidates.
Though credit quality remains a major concern for the company, BB&T currently retains a Zacks #3 Rank, which translates into a short-term “Hold” rating. BB&T’s peers SunTrust Banks Inc. (STI) and State Street Corp. (STT) also share the same rank.

description.hltext_display: Tillbakablickar och nu är det snart dopparedagen
description.content:
tllbakablickar blev det inte så många jag hoppats på här för jag har fått ligga pall i sängen med hög feber och halsont men dagar före dopparedagar lär det bli fler av.
Nu tar jag julledigt och inte för att fira Kalle Anka (som en viss person uttryckt vårt julfirande, här på Fs och som jag tycker var roligt).
Jag är ingen julmänniska eller jag är ingen vän av julen. Det har enligt mig blivit alldeles för mycket av det. Jag ska försöka att ta dagen som den kommer eller fånga dagen, vilket jag ibland tycker har blivit svårare och svårare att göra ju fler dagar man trampat omkring här på jorden och det borde egentligen vara tvärtom.
Vi borde födas välstrukturerade och målmedvetna, inte leka och busa. Vi borde sköta undan allt det där som förväntas av oss, bestämma vilken karriär vi vill satsa på, göra karriär, skaffa partner, bilda familj, skaffa barn, när allt detta är överstökat på en komprimerad tid kan vi börja fånga dagar och leva livet , tappa kontrollen och inte bry oss så mycket om allt, passa på att njuta. Men är det inte precis så här vi lever? Jo kanske, förutom att ju äldre vi blir eller ju fler dagar vi trampat omkring, desto svårare har vi att leka och busa eller bryta invanda mönster.
Så nu halkar jag iväg på en slingrig väg för att fånga en dag före dopparedag, passar på att önska er alla en God Dopparedag och hälsa Kalle Anka!
Jag lovar, jag ska inte köra mer än 70.
(Logga in för att skriva en kommentar)

description.hltext_display: "Blitzaktion": ARD sendet jetzt doch für die deutschen Soldaten
description.content:
ARD sendet jetzt doch für die deutschen Soldaten
Nach scharfer Kritik an der Abschaltung ihres Programms für die Soldaten in Afghanistan will die ARD den Sendebetrieb wieder aufnehmen.
Buch-Tipp Anzeige
Die sonderbare Welt der Bundeswehr:
Weggetreten
bei Amazon.de
„In einer Blitzaktion“ sei es gelungen, eine Sondervereinbarung mit dem Satelliten-Betreiber SES-Astra in Luxemburg abzuschließen, teilte der ARD-Vorsitzende Peter Boudgoust in Stuttgart mit. Damit könnten die Soldaten noch vor Weihnachten wieder das ARD-Programm empfangen, das bereits im Juni aus Kostengründen abgeschaltet worden war. „Wir hatten bereits geraume Zeit nach Lösungen für dieses komplexe juristische Problem gesucht“, sagte Boudgoust. Jetzt sei eine kostenneutrale Lösung gefunden worden.
Das Bundeswehrlager in Kundus
Foto: clemens wergin Ein deutscher Ort: Bundeswehr-Soldaten verbringen im deutschen Lager Kundus ihre Freizeit.
Foto: dpa Nach den Einsätzen in dem umkämpften Land genießen die Soldaten vor dem Laptop die Ruhe.
Foto: clemens wergin Die Strandbar der Belgier, die sich im deutschen Lager eingemietet haben.
Foto: clemens wergin In der Kantine kommen Kohlrouladen und dunkles Brot auf den Tisch - gegen das Heimweh.
Foto: picture-alliance/ dpa/ddp_pool Verteidigungsminister Karl-Theodor zu Guttenberg (CSU) war im Lager in Kundus auch schon zu Gast.
Foto: dpa In ihrer vorübergehenden Heimat halten die Soldaten gemeinsame Gottesdienste ab.
Foto: clemens wergin Für die gefallenen Kameraden steht im Lager ein Ehrenmal.
Foto: clemens wergin Über einen Flugplatz in Usbekistan erreichen die Bundeswehr-Militärflieger ...
Foto: clemens wergin .... das deutsche Lager im Hindukusch.
Foto: clemens wergin Das Lager ist streng gesichert, ...
Foto: dpa ...der Eingang kontrolliert.
Foto: clemens wergin Hier können sich die deutschen Soldaten frei bewegen und sind größtenteils vor Anschlägen geschützt.
Bundesverteidigungsminister Karl Theodor zu Guttenberg (CSU) begrüßte die Entscheidung. „Ich danke der ARD für diese unbürokratische Entscheidung“, sagte er der „Bild“-Zeitung. „So rückt unseren Soldaten im Einsatz die Heimat über die Festtage ein kleines Stück näher.“ Auch der Intendant des MDR, Udo Reiter, zeigte sich erleichtert: „Unsere Soldaten in Afghanistan sollten selbstverständlich Zugang zu möglichst vielen Fernsehsendungen aus der Heimat haben.“
Zuvor hatten der Bundeswehrverband, der Wehrbeauftragte und mehrere Politiker die ARD für das Abschalten kritisiert. „Die ARD sendet ihr Programm nicht mehr, dafür aber ein sehr unschönes Signal an alle Menschen in der Bundeswehr“, sagte der stellvertretende Bundesvorsitzende der Soldatenvereinigung, Wolfgang Schmelzer, in Bonn. Der Ausstrahlungsstopp erschwere den essenziellen Kontakt der Truppe in die Heimat. Er zeigte sich optimistisch, dass die ARD ihr Vorgehen überdenken werde.
1 von 10
Deutsche Politiker in Afghanistan
Afghanistan gehört zu den außereuropäischen Ländern, die von Spitzenpolitikern aus der Bundesrepublik am häufigsten besucht werden. Die deutsche Botschaft in Kabul zählte in diesem Jahr mehr als 40 Delegationen von Ministern, Staatssekretären oder Bundestagsabgeordneten.
Bundeskanzlerin Angela Merkel (CDU) reiste am Samstag zum ersten Mal im Jahr 2010 nach Afghanistan. Sie war in ihrer Amtszeit zuvor 2007 und 2009 zu Blitzbesuchen an den Hindukusch gekommen.
Am Samstag wurde die Kanzlerin von Verteidigungsminister Karl-Theodor zu Guttenberg (CSU) begleitet, der erst am vergangenen Montag deutsche Soldaten im Norden des Landes besucht hatte. Es ist Guttenbergs achte Visite seit Amtsantritt im Herbst 2009. Er hat sich vorgenommen, die deutschen Soldaten im Einsatz alle zwei Monate zu besuchen.
Außenminister Guido Westerwelle und Entwicklungsminister Dirk Niebel (beide FDP) besuchten Afghanistan bislang je zwei Mal
Innenminister Thomas de Maizière (CDU) und Bauminister Peter Ramsauer (CSU) je ein Mal.
Im Frühjahr war Horst Köhler als erster Bundespräsident dort. Eine umstrittene Äußerung in einem Interview auf dem Rückweg wurde später zu einem Grund für Köhlers Rücktritt.
Der zweite Mann im Staat, Bundestagspräsident Norbert Lammert (CDU), informierte sich im August erstmals direkt über den Einsatz der deutschen Soldaten.
Seit einigen Jahren werden die Reisen aus Sicherheitsgründen bis zur Ankunft geheim gehalten.
Die Besuche beschränken sich meistens auf die Bundeswehrstandorte im Norden des Landes und die Hauptstadt Kabul.
Der Wehrbeauftragte Hellmut Königshaus war bei seinem Besuch im Sommer allerdings ausnahmsweise auch in Kandahar im gefährlichen Süden des Landes. Dort sind rund ein Dutzend Bundeswehrsoldaten stationiert, die für die Nato Fernmeldeleitungen betreiben.
Der Wehrbeauftragte des Bundestages, Hellmut Königshaus (FDP), sagte der „Bild“-Zeitung: „Es ist ein Unding, wie die ARD mit unseren Soldatinnen und Soldaten in Afghanistan umgeht. Das ist nicht akzeptabel. Etwas Patriotismus würde einer öffentlich- rechtlichen Sendeanstalt schon gut tun.“ SPD-Fraktionschef Frank- Walter Steinmeier kritisierte in der „Bild“-Zeitung: „Das kann doch wohl nicht wahr sein, dass man den Soldaten im gefährlichen Auslandseinsatz das TV-Programm abdreht.“
Guttenberg hatte am Montag gesagt: „Die Soldaten wären sicher dankbar, wenn die ARD einige Sendeformate wie die Tagesschau oder regionale Sendungen zur Verfügung stellen könnte, damit wir diese ins Einsatzgebiet übertragen.“ Aus der CDU kam ebenfalls Unterstützung. Verteidigungsexperte Ernst-Reinhard Beck: „Die Soldaten zahlen ihre GEZ-Gebühren wie alle anderen auch. Es ist daher mehr als ärgerlich, dass sie aus Kostengründen vom Programm ausgeschlossen werden.
So leben Soldaten im Feldlager Kundus
Video abspielen

description.hltext_display: Illegal to ‘shake the faith of a Muslim,’ yet growing interest in Gospel
description.content:
NORTH AFRICA (BP)—They broke in at night to finish the job they’d begun weeks earlier. A group of Muslim radicals poured gasoline over everything inside the Kabylie church—chairs, Bibles, equipment—and then set it ablaze.
The church’s pastor, Karim,* could see the glow of the flames from his rooftop. Five years earlier, he’d started the church in his home with just three people. It had grown to more than 400 members. The congregation had worshipped in the new building for two months.
Attacks like this are a frightening reality for many Kabylie Christians. The Kabyles—more than 10 million of them—are one of North Africa’s indigenous people groups. Most practice folk Islam, a mixture of Islam and traditional pagan beliefs.
Sam and Rachel Houston* have spent more than 20 years working among them. These Southern Baptist missionaries understand the harsh sacrifices many Kabyles make when they choose to follow Jesus.
Common punishments range from verbal and physical abuse to ostracism by one’s family. The latter is particularly hard on Kabylie women, many of whom depend on male family members for basic needs. Houston says an unbelieving husband or father may choose to lock a Kabylie Christian woman in her room until she reaffirms her faith in Islam, or withhold food, money or access to friends or schooling. Martyrdom is also a possibility.
But persecution doesn’t come only from Islamic zealots. In one North African country, it is illegal to do any­thing that could “shake the faith” of a Muslim. Penalties include a $1,200 fine and a three-year prison sentence. Ironically, the law has actually increased interest in the Gospel.
“Anytime the government tells you something is bad, everybody wants to go find out about it,” Houston says. “It’s given the Christians a far higher level of visibility than they ever had before. … Every week there are people knocking on the doors of the churches … saying, ‘What is this about Jesus?’”
Despite such obstacles, Christian growth among the Kabyles is strong. From almost no believers or churches 50 years ago, today more than 21,000 Kabylie Christians and 120 Kabylie churches exist. Houston credits the growth to the movement of the Holy Spirit and decades of faithful prayer. He adds that Southern Baptists have played a small but important role, including translation and widespread distribution of the Kabylie New Testament, partnership with Kabylie radio ministries and training for Kabylie pastors.
Despite the loss of his church building and threats against his life, Karim says he’s not afraid. He quotes Scripture about believers expecting persecution on Christ’s behalf and says no harm can come to him unless God allows it.
“He asks us to follow, and to be persecuted, and to preach the Gospel, so I will,” Karim says. “Jesus was persecuted; we will be persecuted also. We are disciples just the same.”
Expecting confrontations with the Muslims radicals to continue, he plans to make the most of it.
“We have decided to love them and preach the Gospel to them,” he says.
*Name changed
You must be login before you can leave a comment. Click here to Register if you are a new user.

description.hltext_display: 参院選見直しの西岡議長試案要旨
description.content:
Tweet 参院選挙制度見直しの西岡武夫議長試案の要旨は次の通り。
１票の格差是正は国民の基本的人権にもかかわる喫緊の課題で、早急に取り組む必要がある。しかし現行の都道府県単位の選挙区を前提とした場合、格差是正には限界がある。
現行の都道府県単位の選挙区を廃止し、現在の定数２４２について、全国９ブロック単位に人口比例で定数を配分した上で非拘束名簿式比例代表制で選出する。定数１当たりの有権者数は最小の北海道を１とした場合、東京の１・１５倍が最大。
政党に属さない個人の立候補を認めるかどうか、総定数を削減するかどうかは今後検討する。
来年の統一地方選前までに参院の各会派で検討し、「選挙制度の改革に関する検討会」の協議を踏まえて立法化作業に入り、来年の通常国会中に公選法改正案の成立を目指す。 （共同通信社）

description.hltext_display: Key test vote in Senate for 9/11 health bill
description.content:
WASHINGTON - The Senate is headed for a key test vote on a bill that would provide up to $6.2 billion to aid people who became sick after being exposed to toxins at the World Trade Center ruins.
Bill supporters say they're confident they have the 60 votes needed to prevail on the vote expected Wednesday. But they worry that Republicans who oppose the measure could try to stall a final vote as the holidays near and the current session of Congress winds down.
The bill would provide medical and economic benefits over 10 years to survivors and responders to the Sept. 11, 2001, terrorist attacks.
It also would have to be approved by the House. New York lawmakers are pressing the House to remain in session for the vote.

description.content: Ferozepur, Dec 22 (IANS) A couple killed their son and daughter-in-law here last week due to strained relationship, Punjab Police said Wednesday. While the husband was arrested, the woman is on the run.

Man Sought in Break-In
description.author: Huntington Patch
description.content:
Suffolk County Crime Stoppers and Second Squad Detectives are asking for the public's help to identify and locate the person who broke the glass front door and burglarized a store in Huntington.
On Saturday, Nov. 20, at approximately 3:10 pm, an unknown male broke the glass front door of Tariq Auto Sales, Walt Whitman Road, Melville.
Once inside the store, the man took cash, cigarettes, and phone cards.
The man then fled south on Walt Whitman Road in a dark Jeep Grand Cherokee.
The man is described as a light-skinned male with a mustache.﻿

description.hltext_display: EQT Partners: EQT V buys Hafslund Fibernett
description.content:
EQT V has agreed to acquire Hafslund Fibernett AS (?HFN? or the ?Company?) from Hafslund Venture for an equity value of NOK 1,477 million. HFN is owner and operator of the largest independent optical fiber network in Norway covering the Greater Oslo area.
HFN serves around 150 customers including Internet Service Providers (ISP), large corporate customers and municipalities. Sales in 2010 are expected to reach approximately NOK 180 million with an EBITDA of approximately NOK 127 million. The Company has grown more than 30% annually over the past three years. Internet traffic continues to increase rapidly and EQT V?s ambition is to substantially expand HFN?s network. Gunnar Asp will take the role of Chairman of the Board of HFN. Gunnar Asp is Industrial Advisor to EQT and Chairman of, among others, EQT-owned KBW, a leading German cable network operator. Gunnar Asp was also the CEO of StjärnTV and ComHem, two former EQT investments in the cable sector. ?There are many opportunities for developing HFN including continued build-out of the network around Oslo, geographical expansion, as well as potential add-on acquisitions. Our focus is to support management to accelerate growth and ensure the customers receive the best possible service?, says Gunnar Asp. The transaction is subject to approval from the Norwegian Competition Authority.
EQT V has been advised by Nordea Corporate Finance, Arctic Securities, Bain & Company, PwC and BAHR.
About EQT
EQT is the leading private equity group in Northern Europe with around EUR 13 billion in raised capital and multiple investment strategies. Together with a superior network of Industrial Advisors, EQT implements its business concept by acquiring or financing good medium-sized to large companies in Northern and Eastern Europe, Asia and the United States, developing them into leading companies. Development is achieved by applying an industrial strategy with focus on growth. Since inception, EQT has invested EUR 8.9 billion in more than 80 companies and exited around 40. EQT-owned companies have more than 500,000 employees.
EQT V makes control investments in high-quality, market leading, medium-sized to large companies in growing industries in Northern and Eastern Europe with a potential for top-line growth.
EQT Partners, acting as investment advisor to the managers of each EQT fund, has more than 100 investment professionals with an extensive industrial and financial competence. EQT Partners has offices in Copenhagen, Frankfurt, Helsinki, Hong Kong, Oslo, London, Munich, New York, Shanghai, Singapore, Stockholm, Warsaw and Zurich.
More information can be found on www.eqt.no
About Hafslund Fibernett
Hafslund Fibernett (HFN) owns and operates the largest independent dark fiber network in Norway, covering the urban areas in central eastern Norway. HFN serves around 150 customers including Internet Service Providers (ISP), large corporate customers and municipalities with dark fiber. HFN is headquartered at Skøyen in Oslo and has 20 employees.
HFN was founded in 2004 as a part of Hafslund Tokom and has subsequently grown its infrastructure rapidly both organically and through acquisitions. In 2005 Bredbåndsfabrikken was acquired from Telenor and later Priority Telecom Norway and Nittedalsnettet were also added.
EQT V is part of the leading private equity group EQT (being existing EQT funds or any successor funds advised directly or indirectly by EQT Partners or its subsidiaries, collectively ?EQT?). This information was brought to you by Cision http://www.cisionwire.com

description.content: Christmas 2010 is not going to be what Carolyn Decker had in mind. As others prepare to celebrate with family and friends, she may not even put up a tree in the living room this year.

description.hltext_display: 大阪、「甘い処分」と検察を批判 府警の暴言取り調べ
description.content:
Tweet 大阪府警東署の警部補（３４）が取り調べで３０代の男性会社員に暴言を吐いたとして２１日に脅迫罪で略式起訴された事件で、男性の代理人弁護士が２２日記者会見し、「警察をかばった甘い処分だ」と検察側を批判した。
男性は、聴取の様子をＩＣレコーダーで録音。１０月、警部補と同席していた巡査部長（３２）の２人を特別公務員暴行陵虐容疑などで大阪地検特捜部に告訴していた。
大阪区検は「暴行が認められなかった」とし、特別公務員暴行陵虐罪の適用は見送った。
起訴状などによると、警部補は遺失物横領事件の容疑者として９月３日、男性を約３時間にわたり任意聴取した際、「殴るぞ」「手出さへんと思ったら大間違いやぞ」などと大声で怒鳴り、脅迫したとされる。 （共同通信社）

description.hltext_display: Patrimoine des députés : Copé mine la transparence

description.hltext_display: Philly police: No vigilantism against strangler
description.author: KATHY MATHESON
description.content:
PHILADELPHIA ? The serial killer who police say sexually assaulted and strangled three women, and possibly attacked three others, in a city neighborhood rife with drugs and prostitution might want to hope that authorities find him before the neighbors do.
Residents of Kensington, who once severely beat a suspected rapist based on a police photo, have posted hundreds of comments and theories about the case on a Facebook page titled "Catch the Kensington Strangler, before he catches someone you love."
One post that falsely identified a suspect led to an angry crowd outside the man's home. Fearing vigilantes, he called police - who later cleared him, and then chastised residents.
"We will not tolerate anyone taking vigilante action," Police Commissioner Charles Ramsey warned. "If you see someone suspicious, call 911. We will get there. We will handle."
Police on Tuesday linked a third slaying to a predator who they say raped, beat and strangled two women over the past few weeks. Three other women have reported being sexually assaulted; two of them said they were choked into unconsciousness.
So far, police only have a composite sketch and grainy surveillance photo of a possible suspect; $37,000 in reward money is being offered.
Once a middle-class neighborhood of rowhomes a few miles northeast of downtown, Kensington has become a high-crime area with a culture of open-air drugs and prostitution. But it also boasts a nascent gentrification effort as young homeowners and artists move in, attracted by the affordable prices.
Lifelong resident Edward Neisser, 62, angrily blamed the neighborhood's ills on too many halfway houses and abandoned, overgrown properties.
"It's a disgrace what's going on around here," Neisser said. "The city could turn around and clean up these lots so none of this stuff happens."
But Jayme Guokas, a relative newcomer, said he was unwilling to write off the neighborhood where he has spent the past six years.
"It's one person who's doing these things," Guokas, a 35-year-old carpenter, said of the strangler. "That's counteracted by a lot of working people who are trying to invest in the neighborhood and make it better."
Guokas lives a few doors down from where police found the body of 35-year-old Nicole Piacentini of Philadelphia on Nov. 13. Twenty-one-year-old Elaine Goldberg of Philadelphia had met the same fate 10 days earlier; the body of Casey Mahoney, 27, of East Stroudsburg, was found Dec. 15.
The women, all of whom have been described as struggling with drug addiction, were found within 10 blocks of each other.
And yet even with the murders, police said drug sales and prostitution continue unabated.
"It is somewhat disturbing that, in light of all this information, all of this warning, that women and men are still frequenting this area and engaging in high-risk behavior," Deputy Commissioner William Blackburn said.
Authorities have arrested 120 people involved in prostitution in Kensington since Nov. 19 and obtained DNA swabs from many of them, Blackburn said. More than 40 have been cleared, and tests are pending on the rest.
Police stressed that neighbors who see something suspicious should call 911 and not take matters into their own hands. In another Kensington case last year, a man suspected of raping an 11-year-old girl was severely beaten by angry neighbors who recognized him from a police photo. He was later charged and pleaded guilty.
Mayor Michael Nutter, speaking on Tuesday just steps from where Piacentini's body was found, pleaded for information from residents who might be keeping quiet out of fear or loyalty.
He offered $30,000 for information that leads to the arrest and conviction of the perpetrator. Separately, the local Fraternal Order of Police and Councilman Frank DiCicco have offered $7,000 for help simply leading to an arrest with a DNA match.
"We strongly believe that someone - possibly in the neighborhood - someone, somewhere in the city of Philadelphia knows who this person is, or knows about them," Nutter said. "We are serious about getting this psycho off the streets."

event_or_fact.property: It's one person who's doing these things; That's counteracted by a lot of working people who are trying to invest in the neighborhood and make it better.
Authorities have arrested 120 people involved in prostitution in Kensington since Nov. 19 and obtained DNA swabs from many of them
It is somewhat disturbing that, in light of all this information, all of this warning, that women and men are still frequenting this area and engaging in high-risk behavior
It's a disgrace what's going on around here; The city could turn around and clean up these lots so none of this stuff happens.
he was unwilling to write off the neighborhood where he has spent the past six years

We strongly believe that someone - possibly in the neighborhood - someone, somewhere in the city of Philadelphia knows who this person is, or knows about them; We are serious about getting this psycho off the streets.
We will not tolerate anyone taking vigilante action; If you see someone suspicious, call 911. We will get there. We will handle.

description.hltext_display: FCC rules aim to level field for Web content
description.content:
WASHINGTON_— The Federal Communications Commission on Tuesday adopted first-ever regulations for broadband Internet service, rules designed to foster the fast-evolving market for TV and movies over the Web.
The network neutrality rules are meant to prevent broadband operators such as Comcast and AT&T from favoring their own content over rival online video sites such as Netflix, or wireless companies from blocking Internet phone applications such as Skype.
Consumers increasingly are using their Web connections to watch their favorite TV shows and movies at a fraction of the cost of a cable subscription — a threat to Internet providers that also have lucrative pay-TV
franchises they want to protect.
The rules are designed to give Internet entrepreneurs the peace of mind that they will have unfettered access to Web users without having to negotiate with broadband networks owners for access to their pipes.
The regulations, approved in a 3-2 vote, would bar broadband companies from managing their networks in ways that unfairly discriminate against competitors.
Internet providers would also have to disclose how they are managing traffic over their networks — exposure that FCC Chairman Julius Genachowski believes would head off bad behavior.
Wireless Internet operators would be subject to somewhat more lenient regulations.
The rules could be tested in a few ways. A complaint could be filed alleging a violation, which the FCC could investigate under an expedited process.
Or, opponents could
challenge the regulations
in court, arguing that
the commission lacks authority under telecommunications law to enact the regulations.

description.hltext_display: 原国家总督学呼吁:把学生从考试束缚下解放出来
Afghan official rebukes NATO for civilian deaths
description.content:
KABUL, Afghanistan
The office of the governor of Helmand province said in a statement Wednesday that the five civilians killed during the clash a day earlier included three women and two children. NATO says it is investigating the deaths, which Afghan officials say occurred during a Taliban raid on an Afghan national police checkpoint.
Afghan officials have repeatedly spoken out about civilian deaths, arguing that the international forces are not being careful enough to avoid such casualties as the war nears its tenth year. Insurgents also try to use the civilian death toll as a way of rallying support for their cause.

description.hltext_display: １１年度の国債発行額が過去最大 財政再建険しく (12月22日 09:21)
小沢氏元秘書に聴取要請 石川被告側「拒否」
Suspected gas leak at drug plant kills 2 in India
description.content:
HYDERABAD, India - Police say a suspected gas leak in a drug manufacturing plant in southern India has killed at least two workers.
Police officer Sunder Kumar Das says another four workers were hospitalized early Wednesday in Bolrum. The industrial township is on the outskirts of Hyderabad, the capital of Andhra Pradesh state.
The suspected leak occurred in the plant of Dr. Reddy's Laboratories, which has over 100 generics for sale in emerging markets.
Other details are not immediately available. Police are investigating.

event_or_fact.property: another four workers were hospitalized early Wednesday in Bolrum
has killed at least two workers

description.hltext_display: Tribun Soccer : The Young Guns Barca Buang Peluang
description.content: BARCELONA, TRIBUN - Bagi mayoritas tim kuat, pentas turnamen kerap menjadi sarana untuk menambah pengalaman sekaligus mengasah kemampuan para pilar mudanya. Itu pun dilakukan raksasa Primera La Liga, Barcelona, dalam pentas Copa Del Rey. Terbukti, pada leg 1 babak 16 Besar Copa Del Rey, menghadapi tamunya, Athletic Bilbao, Rabu (22/12) dinihari WIB, arsitek el Blaugrana, Josep Guardiola, menurunkan para young guns-nya dan mengistirahatkan sejumlah pilarnya, seperti Victor Valdes (kiper), Carles Puyol (defender), dan dua mesin gol ulungnya, David Villa serta Lionel Andres Messi. Walau begitu, para pemain muda Barca tetap menunjukkan permainan impresif. Mereka tetap menerapkan attacking football. Akan tetapi, Barca gagal memanfaatkan peluangnya sebagai tuan rumah untuk mengais kemenangan. Itu karena Barca harus puas bermain imbang 0-0 dengan Bilbao. Padahal, secara kolektivitas permainan, raksasa Katalan itu lebih unggul. Mereka pun memiliki sejumlah peluang untuk mencetak gol. Sayangnya, Barca gagal memaksimalkan setiap peluang yang mereka miliki. Sebaliknya, Bilbao beberapa kali mencoba melakukan penyerangan. Namun, seperti halnya Barca, Bilbao juga tidak mampu memanfaatkan momentum dan peluang untuk mengemas gol. Karenanya, hingga sang pengadil lapangan, Mateu L Lahoz, meniupkan peluitnya sebagai tanda bahwa laga selama 90 menit usai, Barca dan Bilbao tidak mampu mencetak satu pun gola. Keduanya harus puas berbagi angka 0-0. Meski gagal meraih kemenangan, hasil imbang 0-0 dengan Bilbao bukan berarti peluang Barca memasuki babak perempatfinal menjadi tertutup. Barca masih berpeluang merangsek babak 8 Besar. Syaratnya, meraih kemenangan pada leg kedua yang bergulir 23 Januari 2011. (win/SOCCERNET)

description.hltext_display: Nog die Muntendammers opgepakt
description.content: MUNTENDAM - De politie heeft dinsdag(avond) drie Muntendammers, in de leeftijd 24, 27 en 29 jaar, aangehouden. Ze worden verdacht van betrokkenheid bij de mishandeling van een 18-jarige Veendammer.

description.hltext_display: 小偷蜗居学校仓库1个月 顺走200多双旅游鞋
description.content:
“200多双鞋短短10多天就莫名消失，开始还以为是运输途中发生问题，没想到竟然是小偷‘潜伏’在自己仓库里，现在当场被抓这才真相大白，终于可以松口气了！”这就是前天晚上10点，发生在南京工业大学虹桥校区体育馆仓库内的一幕。目前，嫌疑人已被南京中央门派出所处理。 鞋子又不会自己“长腿跑”，怎么会莫名其妙消失呢？该不会是运输途中发生问题？近日，在南京从事鞋类批发生意的李老板被接二连三丢失货物所困扰。开始，只是少个几双鞋，对于批发户来说也没太在意，总以为是自己清理货物时点错了。可后来情况越来越严重，鞋子十几双，甚至上百双的少，李老板这才意识到问题的严重性。仓库晚上都是大门紧锁，会不会是运输途中出现问题，可查了半天也没发现任何蛛丝马迹。为了避免打草惊蛇，李老板并没报案，而是一直悄悄蹲守在自己仓库内，可连续几天都没动静。李老板这下可着急了，鞋子难不成真会“自己走路”，为了弄清真相，前天晚上，他不得已开始清理自己仓库。整个体育馆如果翻个“底朝天”恐怕要到天亮了。
正当李老板“郁闷”时，突然听见体育馆阁楼上方似乎有动静，顺着声音找到一间房间，打开后发现，竟然有一名男子躺在床上瑟瑟发抖。面对询问，男子始终不语，但在男子床下，发现一双还没拆开包装的运动鞋。当然，男子穿着的运动鞋也是李老板所经营的品牌。证据面前，该男子最终承认自己偷窃仓库运动鞋的事实，并希望拿出一万块钱作为补偿，希望老板不要报警。200多双鞋，1万块钱补偿就能了结此事，简直太天真了。老板愤然报警。
警方赶到现场后，发现该男子面容清秀，穿着整齐，也不像是流浪人员。经过调查发现，男子姓艾，20多岁，南京人。开始，大家都以为该男子是本校学生，可后来才发现，男子已经毕业多年，一直在外打工，但工作做得不好，家人经常指责他，他一气离家出走。一个月前，他混进了该校体育馆内，在小阁楼里开始了“窝居”生活，当他发现楼下有“免费”运动鞋后，不禁窃喜，开始还只是自己“试穿！”可后来胆子也就越来越大，经常趁夜将鞋子“顺走”不少。当李老板追问200多双鞋子下落时，艾某只是告诉警方，鞋子也不是他一个人拿的，毕竟知道这个地方有“免费鞋”的不只有他一人。李老板告诉记者，他是两个月前租下校方体育馆临时做仓库的，由于货物太多，平时也疏于管理，没想到竟然给人钻了空子，在自己眼皮底下将鞋子偷走。
目前，南京中央门派出所已将嫌疑人带走。具体案情，警方仍在调查中。(任国勇 吴胜)

description.hltext_display: "Financial Times" apeluje: UE nie powinna przyjmować Chorwacji za wcześnie

description.hltext_display: Euro a bit higher despite downgrade fears
description.content:
BERLIN
The euro was up to $1.3128 in Wednesday morning European trading from $1.3095 in New York late Tuesday.
Moody's Investors Service warned on Tuesday that harsh cuts in government spending could harm Portugal's prospects for growth, while Fitch ratings agency warned of a possible downgrade of Greek bonds. That helped push down the euro.
The British pound was up Wednesday to $1.5483 from $1.5465. The dollar edged down to 83.69 Japanese yen from 83.77 yen.

description.hltext_display: Karo Bios emission fulltecknad
description.content:
Resterande 1,7 procent tilldelades utan stöd av rätter.
Totalt inkom anmälningar om teckning utan stöd av rätter för drygt 103 miljoner aktier, eller 44 procent av emissionen.
Det framgår av ett pressmeddelande.
Emissionsbeloppet uppgår till cirka 325 miljoner kronor.

description.hltext_display: 明石花火事故で公判前整理 元副署長側「予測できず」
description.content:
Tweet ２００１年に１１人が死亡した兵庫県明石市の花火大会事故で、業務上過失致死傷罪に問われた県警明石署の元副署長榊和晄被告（６３）の公判前整理手続き第５回協議が２２日、神戸地裁（奥田哲也裁判長）で開かれた。
弁護側は「事故を予測することはできなかったし、回避することもできなかった」と主張する書面を地裁に提出。協議終了後に記者会見し「当時、明石署には事故の発生に気付くような現場の詳しい状況は入ってこなかった」と述べた。
一方、検察官役の指定弁護士は、公判で争点となるとみられる業務上過失致死傷罪の公訴時効（５年）の成立をめぐり、刑事訴訟法を専門とする大学教授の意見書などを証拠として取り調べ請求した。 （共同通信社）

description.hltext_display: Paterno celebrates 84th birthday with practices
description.content:
No special plans for Joe Paterno on his 84th birthday -- just two Penn State practices.
STATE COLLEGE, Pa. -- No special plans for Joe Paterno on his 84th birthday -- just two Penn State practices.
The Nittany Lions spent Tuesday drilling in the morning and afternoon in Clearwater, Fla., as they get ready for the Outback Bowl against Florida on Jan. 1. Penn State is preparing this week at the spring training home of the Philadelphia Phillies before moving to Tampa this weekend.
It's not all business for JoePa -- he will at least get a birthday cake at the team dinner Tuesday night.
Major college football's winningest coach is wrapping up his record 45th season on the sideline.
He's also the all-time leader in bowl wins with 24. Paterno is under contract through the 2011 season.

description.hltext_display: Großbritannien: Wirtschaftsminister Cable erklärt Murdoch "den Krieg"
description.content:
Wirtschaftsminister Cable erklärt Murdoch "den Krieg"
Der britische Wirtschaftsminister Vince Cable wurde von Reportern reingelegt und löst mit Indiskretionen eine Koalitionskrise aus.
Dass Vince Cable der Zusammenarbeit mit den Konservativen in der britischen Koalitionsregierung skeptisch gegenübersteht, war bereits bekannt. Nun aber störte der liberaldemokratische Wirtschaftsminister nachhaltig den Weihnachtsfrieden der britischen Hauptstadt. In einem heimlich aufgezeichneten Gespräch mit zwei jungen Journalistinnen, die sich als interessierte Bürgerinnen ausgaben, plauderte der 67jährige nicht nur über den "Krieg" in der Koalition.
Foto: Reuters/REUTERS Keith Rupert Murdoch ist ein in Australien geborener amerikanischer Medienunternehmer
Er liess sich auch zu einer Bemerkung über den Presse-Zaren Rupert Murdoch hinreissen, die sich als politisch tödlich erweisen könnte: "Ich habe Herrn Murdoch den Krieg erklärt, und ich glaube, wir werden gewinnen." Die Labour-Opposition verlangte umgehend Konsequenzen. Der Firma News Corporation des US-australischen Medien-Unternehmer gehören auf der Insel nicht nur Auflagenstarke Zeitungen wie The Sun, News of the World und The Times, sondern auch 39 Prozent am Satelliten-Sender Sky.
Die restlichen 61 Prozent will News Corp für 7,8 Milliarden Pfund erwerben. Dagegen haben eine Reihe von Wettbewerbern Einspruch eingelegt. Die EU-Kommission erteilte dem Deal ihren Segen. Von grösserer Bedeutung ist die Haltung der britischen Wettbewerbsbehörden, die letzte Entscheidung trifft der Wirtschaftsminister in einer quasi-richterlichen Funktion. Dementsprechend heikel ist die Tatsache, dass Cable seine Voreingenommenheit stolz zur Schau stellt.
Cable verlor erste Zuständigkeiten
Ein NewsCorp-Sprecher zeigte sich "bestürzt" über Cables Äusserungen: "Das wirft ernste Fragen zur Fairness des Verfahrens auf." Cable verlor die Zuständigkeit nicht nur für die Entscheidung über News Corp, sondern über sämtliche Telekom- und Medienpolitik. Diese wird zukünftig im Kulturministerium unter dem Tory Jeremy Hunt angesiedelt. Cameron: "Cables Äusserungen sind vollkommen unangebracht und inakzeptabel."
Cable schilderte in dem Gespräch mit den Undercover-Reportern das Leben in der Koalition als "Krieg". Leider fehlten ihm konventionelle Waffen; dafür habe er aber die "Nuklearoption" seines Rücktritts: "Wenn ich die Regierung verlasse, bricht sie zusammen."
Tatsächlich gilt der frühere Sozialdemokrat als Galionsfigur des linken Parteiflügels, der dem Vorsitzenden Clegg misstraut. Vor der Wahl im Mai gewann Cable regelmässig die Umfrage nach dem populärsten Politiker auf der Insel. Der Minister habe sich in der morgendlichen Kabinettssitzung "ausführlich entschuldigt", sagte Premier Cameron und fügte hinzu: "Das ist auch richtig so." Gleichzeitig lobte er die Zusammenarbeit mit den Liberaldemokraten: "Wir sind nicht immer einer Meinung, aber die Koalition arbeitet zum Wohl des Landes gut zusammen."

description.hltext_display: Filipino gunmen free 2 Malaysians after 10 months
description.content:
MANILA, Philippines - Filipino gunmen with ties to al-Qaida-linked militants, under pressure from pursuing police commandos, have freed two Malaysian labourers from 10 months of jungle captivity, police said Wednesday.
The hostages were seized Feb. 8 from a seaweed farm in Malaysia's Sabah state and whisked away in a speedboat to nearby Philippine waters in a pattern similar to past kidnappings-for-ransom blamed on the notorious terrorist group Abu Sayyaf.
Police commandos, who have been searching for the captives, recovered the two men near Bongao town in the southernmost island province of Tawi-Tawi late Tuesday, national police chief Raul Bacalzo told reporters.
He said the gunmen abandoned the hostages after they were encircled by government forces. The kidnappers escaped and the Malaysians, Chen Yui Chung, 48, and Lai Wong Chun, 46, were flown to Manila. They will be turned over to the Malaysian Embassy after being debriefed by Philippine authorities and checked up in a hospital at police headquarters in the capital.
Wearing baseball caps, the two appeared to have lost weight as they walked into a hospital emergency room from an ambulance. One wore combat boots. Policemen kept journalists and photographers from coming near.
Interior Secretary Jessie Robredo said the two told him they were not harmed by their captors and were fed well.
"Thank you very much," Robredo quoted the Malaysians as repeatedly telling officials.
"We're all so happy. This is the best Christmas gift to their families," Robredo told The Associated Press.
The kidnappers had demanded ransom but Robredo said he was unaware of any payment, as was the case with past abductions.
Malaysian and Philippine authorities were initially unsure if the hostages were still in Malaysia or the southern Philippines, where the Abu Sayyaf and other Muslim rebel groups have carried out kidnappings for ransom.
Officials in Tawi-Tawi, about 620 miles (1,000 kilometres) southwest of Manila, had ordered a search in the far-flung province in June after police monitored a cellphone call made by one of the captives to his family in Malaysia, according to a Philippine security official.
The official, who helped oversee the search, declined to be named because he was not authorized to talk to the media.
"They were brought from Tawi-Tawi to Jolo and back and we did not know where to look for them," Tawi-Tawi Gov. Sadikul Sahali said.
Chen Yui Chung's brother-in-law, Chong Man Tung, told The Associated Press in June that his relative had called him weeks after the abduction saying the two were being held by gunmen on an unspecified Philippine island.
The kidnappers apparently had moved the captives from Tawi-Tawi to nearby Jolo Island and back to evade the Philippine military and police manhunt, the security official said.
The Abu Sayyaf has gained notoriety for high-profile kidnappings, beheadings and bomb attacks. Battle setbacks, arrests and surrenders have reduced the group's strength to more than 300 from more than 1,000 guerrillas during its heyday in 2000, the military says.
That year the militants abducted 21 Asian workers and Western tourists from Malaysia's Sipadan diving resort and brought them to Jolo. They were freed in batches in exchange for huge ransoms.
Hundreds of U.S. troops have been providing weapons, training and intelligence to Philippine forces in the south for years to help eradicate the Abu Sayyaf, which is on Washington's list of terrorist organizations.

event_or_fact.property: he was unaware of any payment, as was the case with past abductions
his relative had called him weeks after the abduction saying the two were being held by gunmen on an unspecified Philippine island.
the gunmen abandoned the hostages after they were encircled by government forces
the two told him they were not harmed by their captors and were fed well
We're all so happy.; This is the best Christmas gift to their families
They were brought from Tawi-Tawi to Jolo and back and we did not know where to look for them
Police commandos, who have been searching for the captives, recovered the two men near Bongao town in the southernmost island province of Tawi-Tawi late Tuesday

description.hltext_display: 评论：苹果为何不参加CES国际消费电子展
description.content:
CES── 国际消费电子展（Consumer Electronics Show)是全球规模最大的消费科技产品交易会之一，许多IT巨头都会参加这个展会来对自己的产品进行推广和宣传，同时此展会上每年还会有许多新生产品亮相，更可以吸引大众的关注，并会对整个IT市场产生引导作用。
首届CES于1967年6月在纽约举办，而2011年的CES展会将于1月6日-9日在美国举行，CES官网关注：http://www.cesweb.org/
而苹果将不会以官方形式出席明年的CES展会，最为IT业界的巨头之一，更是最受媒体关注的IT企业，苹果的缺席会另很多人不解。当然，苹果也有自己的原因，下面来简单说一下。
首先，在明年1月6日苹果已经安排好自己的重要“约会”了。没错，肯定有很多网友都记得苹果之前已经官方宣布过。将于1月6日推出全新Mac App Store，全新的电脑软件购买方式，将会产生多大浪潮呢，真的让人值得期待。虽然和CES开幕撞车，可能Steve Jobs就是故意安排到这个“撞车”的日子呢。
此外，根据可靠消息，美国电信巨头Verizon将会出席CES开幕展，并会推出自己新产品和新服务，什么新产品？对了，就是之前谣言不断的Verizon版iPhone。此新版本iPhone将适用于Verizon的Mifi网络以及网络套餐，而作为特殊版本的iPhone，外观上是否会有重新设计更值得期待。这样，苹果同样在CES拉风！
之前的报道提到过，微软CEO Steve Ballmer将会在明年的CES展上继续推广Windows Phone 7智能手机和平板设备，CES上Android也将成为万众瞩目的焦点，而各大财团的分析师对苹果下一代iPad的销量预测又是那么的高，看来明年的平板电脑市场真的是风云莫测。
虽然苹果不会在明年CES上官方出席，不过要是去了CES展会的人发现到处都是iPad和 iPhone也别太惊讶，CES官方都推出了iPhone的App程序，而CES展上也少不了Mac的身影，苹果这么拉风，即使Steve Jobs不去做Keynote展示，也没有人会忽略苹果的。

description.hltext_display: India tests nuclear-capable missile
description.content:
BHUBANESHWAR, India - India on Wednesday successfully tested a short-range, nuclear-capable missile with a range of 220 miles (350 kilometres), an official said.
The army twice fired the surface-to-surface missile Prithvi II from a range in Chandipur in the eastern state of Orissa, said S.P. Dash, a senior official at the range. "The test was successful," Dash told The Associated Press.
The missile, which mainly would target military installations, can carry a warhead weighing up to 1,100 pounds (500 kilograms), Dash said.
It already has been tested more than a half-dozen times. However, a test of the same missile three months ago failed due to technical problems.
India and longtime rival Pakistan routinely test-fire missiles, and usually notify each other ahead of the launches.
New Delhi has said it developed its current crop of missiles — including the short-range Prithvi, the anti-tank Nag and the supersonic BrahMos — as a deterrent against neighbours China and Pakistan.
India's Agni-II missile, with a range of up to 1,250 miles (2,000 kilometres), can put areas of southern China within striking distance. And the Agni-III, successfully tested last year, can carry nuclear warheads across much of Asia and the Middle East.

event_or_fact.property: The army twice fired the surface-to-surface missile Prithvi II from a range in Chandipur in the eastern state of Orissa
The missile, which mainly would target military installations, can carry a warhead weighing up to 1,100 pounds (500 kilograms)

description.hltext_display: Mountaineers' top CB Hogan out vs. N.C. State
description.content:
West Virginia will have to face Russell Wilson and the North Carolina State Wolfpack passing game without its best cornerback Brandon Hogan.
West Virginiawill have to face Russell Wilson and the North Carolina State passing game without its best cornerback.
Senior Brandon Hogan has officially been ruled out of the Dec. 28 Champs Sports Bowl with a torn ACL in his left knee.
He suffered the injury in the season-ending win over Rutgers. Hogan, who was suspended for one game earlier this year after a DUI arrest, had 37 tackles and three interceptions this season.
He is considered by many to be the best cornerback in the Big East.
"It just kills me, but not near as bad as it kills him," West Virginia coach Bill Stewart said. "Brandon Hogan played with a bicep injury, one in which many wouldn't have played with -- that's how tough the kid is. I was holding out hope that he would be ready to play in this football game, for his sake and for the seniors' sake. He's such an important cog on this defense."
Stewart said the Mountaineers may change some of their defensive schemes to make up for the loss of Hogan, such as blitzing more.
West Virginia will start either sophomore Pat Miller or redshirt freshman Brodrick Jenkins in the bowl game.
Brian Bennett covers Big East football for ESPN.com.

event_or_fact.property: the Mountaineers may change some of their defensive schemes to make up for the loss of Hogan, such as blitzing more
It just kills me, but not near as bad as it kills him
